name: violet
interpret: adj.紫色的；n.紫罗兰
example: 单词 violet 的例句||||She likes to wear violet dresses. 他喜欢穿紫色的衣服。||||Violet is the color of wisdom, peace and strength. 紫色是智慧的，和平的和力量的颜色。

name: chase
interpret: vt.追逐，追赶，追求；n.追赶
example: 单词 chase 的例句||||The police grabbed the robbers after a long chase. 警察经过长距离追赶后逮住了抢劫犯。||||Would you chase me if I did? 如果我逃开了，你会来追吗？

name: crisp
interpret: adj.脆的；清新的；扼要的；n.[pl.]油炸土豆片
example: 单词 crisp 的例句||||What a crisp voice she has! 听她的嗓音多脆！|||These pears are sweet and crisp. 这种梨又甜又脆。

name: hay
interpret: n.(用作饲料或覆盖的)干草
example: 单词 hay 的例句||||Cows feed on hay. 奶牛以干草为生。||||They usually keep the hay in the barn. 他们通常将干草存放在谷仓中。

name: log
interpret: n.记录，圆木，日志；vt.伐木，切，航行；vi.伐木
example: 单词 log 的例句||||They log for a living. 他们以伐木为生。||||And then what do you do with that log? 然后你要拿那些记录做什么呢？

name: detective
interpret: adj.侦察(用)的；n.侦探
example: 单词 detective 的例句||||I enjoy reading detective stories. 我爱读侦探小说。||||He wrote detective stories for magazines. 他给杂志写侦探故事。

name: puppet
interpret: n.木偶，玩偶；傀儡
example: 单词 puppet 的例句||||That indicates you're merely a puppet. 这说明你只不过是一个傀儡。||||Yes, only a rat puppet beat them out. 没错，只有一个老鼠木偶打败过他们。

name: rug
interpret: n.毯子，地毯，旅行毯
example: 单词 rug 的例句||||The rug can double up. 这条地毯能卷起来。||||It will be more beautiful if you work some blue into the rug. 如果你再织些蓝色的图案，这毯子会更好看。

name: extraordinary
interpret: adj.非常的，特别的，非凡的
example: 单词 extraordinary 的例句||||Her strength of will was extraordinary. 她的意志力是非凡的。||||What an extraordinary hat! 多么奇特的帽子!

name: fried
interpret: adj.油煎的；油炒的
example: 单词 fried 的例句||||I ate everything fried. 所有油炸的我都吃。||||I prefer fried peanuts. 我选择炸花生。

name: oven
interpret: n.烤炉；烤箱
example: 单词 oven 的例句||||You put food inside an oven to cook it. 你把食物放进烤箱里热一下。||||She baked bread in an oven. 她用烤炉烤面包。

name: appreciate
interpret: vt.欣赏，感激，赏识；vt.领会，充分意识；vi.增值
example: 单词 appreciate 的例句||||I really appreciate the danger of this job. 我真的认识到了这份工作的危险。||||I appreciate your help very much. 我非常感谢你的帮助。

name: reservoir
interpret: n.水库，蓄水池；(人才等的)储藏，汇集
example: 单词 reservoir 的例句||||The town is supplied with water from a reservoir. 该城镇由小山中的一座水库供水。||||A large quantity of water is stored in the reservoir. 水库存了大量的水。

name: twinkle
interpret: n.闪烁，闪耀，眨眼，瞬息；vt.闪烁，使...闪耀，眨眼，迅速移动；vi.闪烁；发亮
example: 单词 twinkle 的例句||||The twinkle of distant town lights was very beautiful. 远处城镇灯火闪烁，煞是好看。||||At night, lights twinkle in distant villages across the valleys. 夜间，山谷那头的遥远村落里灯光闪闪。

name: principal
interpret: adj.主要的；n.负责人，校长，资本
example: 单词 principal 的例句||||When he saw the principal, he raised his hand in salutation. 他看到校长时举手敬礼。||||Their school gave a reception to their new principal. 他们学校为新校长举办了一个招待会。

name: bounce
interpret: n.弹，反弹；冲劲，冲力；vt.（使）弹起（跳起）；vi.弹跳；弹起，反跳；弹回
example: 单词 bounce 的例句||||The ball gave a high bounce. 那球弹得很高。||||She's got a lot of bounce. 她浑身都是劲。

name: cucumber
interpret: n.黄瓜
example: 单词 cucumber 的例句||||This cucumber plant is climbing. 这棵黄瓜爬蔓了。||||Let me eat a cucumber. 让我吃一根黄瓜。

name: bloom
interpret: n.花，花期；vi.开花；容光焕发，显露出健康
example: 单词 bloom 的例句||||The park is a picture when flowers are in bloom. 当鲜花盛开时，这个公园的景色美极了。||||The flowers in the garden are now in full bloom. 花园里的花正在盛开。

name: volcano
interpret: n.火山
example: 单词 volcano 的例句||||The volcano unexpectedly blew up early in the morning. 火山一早突然爆发了。||||It is most risky to go and examine an active volcano. 去探察活火山是非常危险的。

name: nap
interpret: n.(白天)打瞌睡，打盹；细毛；孤注一掷
example: 单词 nap 的例句||||The nap of the coat has been worn off. 外衣上的绒毛已经磨掉了。||||Don't bother me while I am taking my nap. 我小睡的时候不要打扰我。

name: curl
interpret: n.(一绺)鬈发；卷曲；vt.卷曲；vi.卷曲；缭绕
example: 单词 curl 的例句||||She put her hair in rollers to make it curl. 她用卷发夹子把头发弄卷曲。||||Does her hair curl naturally? 她的头发是天然卷曲的吗？

name: wicked
interpret: adj.邪恶的，恶劣的，缺德的；淘气的
example: 单词 wicked 的例句||||Let everyone know all the wicked things she has done. 把她干的坏事给大家抖搂抖搂。||||The wicked must be wiped out. 恶人必须除掉。

name: knot
interpret: n.结，难题，一小群；vi.打结；vt. 把...打成结，系牢，捆扎
example: 单词 knot 的例句||||He made a knot in the rope. 他在绳子上打了个结。||||The knot has come untied. 扣儿开了。

name: bet
interpret: vt.打赌，以(与)...打赌；vi.打赌；n.赌注，赌金；打赌
example: 单词 bet 的例句||||I bet you can't do this puzzle. 我敢说，你解决不了这个难题。||||I offered to bet with him. 我提出与他打赌。

name: execute
interpret: vt.执行，实行，实现，实施；处死，处决
example: 单词 execute 的例句||||Never once did I doubt that I would be able to execute my plan. 我从未怀疑过我能执行自己的计划。||||The general gave the word to execute the deserters. 将军下令处决逃兵。

name: excess
interpret: n.过量，过度；超越；adj.过量的，附加的
example: 单词 excess 的例句||||He advised his son never to spend in excess of his income. 他劝儿子开支不可超过收入。||||You're too fat, try and run off all those excess pounds. 你太胖了，要跑跑步减肥。

name: capable
interpret: adj.有能力的，有才能的
example: 单词 capable 的例句||||The new woman secretary was extremely clever and capable. 这位新来的女秘书很是精明强干。||||Jim is capable at sports. 吉姆擅长运动。

name: skillful
interpret: adj.灵巧的，熟练的
example: 单词 skillful 的例句||||Soon they became very skillful in answering such questions. 很快他们就会很熟练地回答这种问题了。||||It was very skillful of you to repair my bicycle. 你修好了我的自行车，技术真好。

name: whisky
interpret: n.威士忌酒
example: 单词 whisky 的例句||||I'm sure this whisky has been watered down. 我敢肯定这瓶威士忌掺过水了。||||She poured herself a large tot of whisky. 她给自己倒了一大杯威士忌。

name: loudspeaker
interpret: n.扬声器，扩音器
example: 单词 loudspeaker 的例句||||The loudspeaker's stopped working. 扩音器不响了。||||There is a loudspeaker in a radio. 收音机里有个喇叭。

name: pat
interpret: n.轻拍，拍打声；vt.轻拍，拍打；vi.轻跑，轻击；adv.适时，彻底；adj.油腔滑调的，恰好的，合适的
example: 单词 pat 的例句||||Could you hear the pat? 你能听到轻轻的拍击声吗？||||He gave her a reassuring pat on the shoulder. 他轻拍了一下她的肩膀让她放心。

name: tick
interpret: vi.（指钟表等）滴答滴答地响
example: 单词 tick 的例句||||The clock goes'tick-tock, tick-tock'. 时钟发出滴答滴答的声音。||||They could hear the regular tick of the clock. 他们能听见时钟有规律的滴答声。

name: barn
interpret: n.谷仓，饲料仓，牲口棚
example: 单词 barn 的例句||||That big building is a barn for keeping the grain. 那幢大房子是存放粮食的谷仓。||||The cows were driven into the barn. 牛被赶进了牲口棚。

name: subtract
interpret: vt.减去，扣除
example: 单词 subtract 的例句||||Subtract four from nine and you have five. 九减四得五。||||In their first year at school, most children learn to add and subtract. 入学第一年，多数孩子都学加减法。

name: ax
interpret: n.斧子
example: 单词 ax 的例句||||He cut a hole through the wall with an ax. 他用斧子在墙上砍出一个洞。||||He carried a large ax. 他带了一把大斧。

name: chop
interpret: n.厚肉片，排骨，砍，交换，戳记，商标；vt.剁碎，砍，切，割断；vi.砍，突然转向
example: 单词 chop 的例句||||He struck off the branch with a single chop of the ax. 他一斧子就砍掉了那根树枝。||||She cut down the seedling with one chop. 她一刀就把小苗砍倒了。

name: horror
interpret: n.惊骇，恐怖，惨事，极端厌恶
example: 单词 horror 的例句||||The public has been awakened to the full horror of the situation. 公众完全意识到了这一状况的可怕程度。||||The thought of working nights fills me with abject horror. 一想到要夜间工作我就觉得惨兮兮的。

name: horizontal
interpret: adj.与地平线平行的，平的，水平的
example: 单词 horizontal 的例句||||The lake has a horizontal surface. 湖面呈水平状。||||On a map there are horizontal lines and vertical lines. 在地图上有水平的线和垂直的线。

name: loyal
interpret: adj.忠诚的，忠心的
example: 单词 loyal 的例句||||He is a loyal friend. 他是一位忠诚的朋友。||||I judge him to be loyal. 我认为他很忠诚。

name: setting
interpret: n.背景
example: 单词 setting 的例句||||The play has its setting in Vienna. 该剧以维也纳为背景。||||Where and when a story takes place is called the setting. 故事发生的地点和时间称为故事背景。

name: workman
interpret: n.工人，工匠，技工
example: 单词 workman 的例句||||A bad workman finds much fault with his tools. 蹩脚的工匠总是埋怨自己的工具不好。||||There was a workman up the ladder. 有一个工人在梯子上工作。

name: shed
interpret: n.车棚，小屋，脱落之物，分水岭；vt.使流出，放射，脱落，散发，摆脱；vi. 流出
example: 单词 shed 的例句||||There are a lot of straws in the shed. 棚子里有许多稻草。||||His nose told him that he was getting near the cow shed. 他的嗅觉告诉他，他正走近牛棚。

name: cheerfully
interpret: adv.高兴地，愉快地
example: 单词 cheerfully 的例句||||The train rolled cheerfully into the station. 火车欢呼着驶进车站。||||He takes our advice quite cheerfully. 他欣然接受我们的劝告。

name: instance
interpret: n.例，例证，实例
example: 单词 instance 的例句||||Can you quote me a recent instance? 你能给我举一个最近的例子吗？||||He's a greedy boy, yesterday, for instance, he ate all our biscuits! 他是个贪吃的孩子――比如，他昨天把我们的饼干都吃了！

name: width
interpret: n.宽度，阔度，广度；宽阔，广阔
example: 单词 width 的例句||||The hall is 15 metres in length and 8 in width. 这个大厅长15米，宽8米。||||Use a ruler to measure the width of that cloth. 用尺子量一下那块布的宽度。

name: gramme
interpret: n.克(重量单位)；（=gram）
example: 单词 gramme 的例句||||So how did we end up at $10 a gramme? 那么我们为什么能拿到每克10美元的价格呢？||||Our recipes are not written down to the exact gramme so we rely on our chefs. 我们的食谱并非精确到克，所以我们要依靠大厨。

name: tremendous
interpret: adj.巨大的，极大的；很好的，非常好的
example: 单词 tremendous 的例句||||This book was the outcome of a tremendous amount of scientific work. 这本书是大量科学研究工作的成果。||||There is a tremendous difference between them. 他们之间有着极大的差别。

name: bang
interpret: n.巨响，猛击；vi.砰砰作响；vt.砰地敲，猛击
example: 单词 bang 的例句||||Pack it up, you kids; or I'll bang your heads together! 住手，你们这些小孩，再弄就揍你们! ||||She fell and got a nasty bang on the knee. 她摔倒了，膝盖猛撞在地上。

name: porter
interpret: n.搬运工人；守门人，门房
example: 单词 porter 的例句||||The hotel porter will help you. 旅馆的门童可以帮你的忙。||||The porter and I looked at each other and smiled. 我和脚夫微笑着你看着我，我看着你。

name: accidentally
interpret: adv.偶然地；意外地
example: 单词 accidentally 的例句||||Mary accidentally let out that her mother had telephoned. 玛丽无意中说出她的母亲来过电话。||||As I turned around, I accidentally hit him in the face. 我转身时不经意撞了他的脸。

name: joint
interpret: adj.联合的，共同的；n.关节，接合处；vt.连接，贴合；vi. 贴合；生节
example: 单词 joint 的例句||||I had a bad fall, which put my shoulder out of joint. 我重重地摔了一跤，肩膀脫臼了。||||We wrote a letter in joint names. 我们联名写了封信。

name: participate
interpret: vi.参加，参与；分担，分享；有几分；vt.分享；分担
example: 单词 participate 的例句||||The people are demanding a chance to participate more in government. 人民要求更多的参与政事的机会。||||You may well participate with us in our gains. 你们完全可以跟我们共享利益.

name: enormous
interpret: adj.巨大的；庞大的
example: 单词 enormous 的例句||||An enormous sum of money is injected each year into teaching. 每年都有大量资金投入到教学中。||||They wield enormous political power. 他们行使巨大的政治权力。

name: excursion
interpret: n.远足，短途旅行
example: 单词 excursion 的例句||||I have arranged with my classmates for an excursion to the beach. 我已经跟同学们商量好去海滩远足的事。||||Our class will make an excursion to the seaside. 我们班将去海边旅行。

name: impatient
interpret: adj.不耐烦的，急躁的；热切的，急切的
example: 单词 impatient 的例句||||He was so impatient that I could hardly hold him back. 他是那样急躁，我简直拉不住他。||||With an impatient gesture he thrust the food away from him. 他不耐烦地把吃的东西猛地推开。

name: fancy
interpret: n.想像力，幻想；喜好，爱；adj.想像的，时髦的，华丽装饰的，奢侈的；技巧的；vt.想象，自认为，喜好
example: 单词 fancy 的例句||||He seemed to have taken quite a fancy to her. 他似乎相当喜欢她。||||I have a fancy that it's going to rain. 我想大概要下雨。

name: uncover
interpret: vt.揭露，暴露；揭开…的盖子
example: 单词 uncover 的例句||||Please uncover the pot. 请拿掉锅盖。||||In spring we uncover the swimming pool. 春天我们移去游泳池的覆盖物。

name: overtake
interpret: vt.追上，赶过，超过；袭击，压倒；vi.超车
example: 单词 overtake 的例句||||I had to walk very fast to overtake you. 我不得不快走才能赶过你。||||No one could overtake him. 没有人能超过他。

name: enclose
interpret: vt.围住，包住；把…装入信封，附入
example: 单词 enclose 的例句||||I'll enclose his letter with mine. 我将他的信装入我的信中寄出。||||I enclose two tickets along with this letter. 我随信附上两张票。

name: Congress
interpret: n.(代表)大会；(C-:美国等国的)国会，议会
example: 单词 Congress 的例句||||There were some days to wait before the Congress. 大会的召开还有几天时间。||||After 18 years in Congress, he intented to return to private life. 在国会供职18年后，他打算告老还乡。

name: mechanic
interpret: n.技工，机(械)工，机修工
example: 单词 mechanic 的例句||||The mechanic made the necessary adjustments to the engine. 机械师对发动机作了必要的调整。||||He is a mechanic who buys and sells cars on the side. 他是一个兼营买卖汽车的技工。

name: mobile
interpret: adj.可移动的，易变的，机动的；n.运动物体
example: 单词 mobile 的例句||||The old lady sits on a mobile chair every morning. 那位老妇人每天上午坐在一把可携带使用的椅子上。||||She's much more mobile now that she's bought a car. 自从她买了汽车后，活动量就大多了。

name: lump
interpret: n.块状，瘤，很多；vt.使...成块状，混在一起，忍耐；vi.结块
example: 单词 lump 的例句||||I thanked him with a lump in my throat. 我哽咽着向他道谢。||||If you don't like it, you may lump it. 你不喜欢，也得容忍一下。

name: shilling
interpret: n.先令
example: 单词 shilling 的例句||||He handed each of them a shilling. 他给了每人一个先令。||||I bet people will pay a shilling to see this. 我想人们一定愿意花一先令来看它这样子。

name: chimney
interpret: n.烟囱，烟筒；玻璃罩
example: 单词 chimney 的例句||||The chimney blew out a cloud of black smoke. 烟囱里喷出一团黑烟。||||His father is a chimney sweeper. 他的父亲是一位扫烟囱的工人。

name: upside-down
interpret: adj.颠倒的，混乱的；adv.颠倒，倒置
example: 单词 upside-down 的例句||||They left the room upside-down. 他们把房间弄得乱七八糟。||||The world had turned upside-down. 整个世界陷入一片混乱之中。

name: grant
interpret: vt.同意给予，授予，承认；n.拨款；补助款
example: 单词 grant 的例句||||If you grant my request, you will earn my thanks. 如果你答应我的要求，就会得到我的感谢。||||He requested that the premier grant him an internview. 他要求那位总理接见他一次。

name: indoors
interpret: adv.(在)室内，(在)户内
example: 单词 indoors 的例句||||Because of the coldness of the weather we stayed indoors. 我们因天气寒冷呆在家里。||||It is very cold outside, you'd better come indoors across the board. 外面很冷，你们所有人最好都进屋。

name: stir
interpret: n.感动(激动，愤怒或震动)，搅拌，骚乱；vt.激起，惹起，搅和；vi.挪动，活动，离开，搅拌，激动
example: 单词 stir 的例句||||Give the soup a stir. 把汤搅拌一下。||||Don't stir up trouble between them. 不要在他们之间惹麻烦。

name: pence
interpret: n.便士；名词penny的复数形式
example: 单词 pence 的例句||||She counted out fifteen pence and passed it to the salesgirl. 她数出15个便士交给女店员。||||These apples are selling at 40 pence a kilo. 这些苹果售价每公斤40便士。

name: cement
interpret: n.水泥；胶结材料；vt.粘结；巩固
example: 单词 cement 的例句||||We need 100 tons of cement at most for this project. 这项工程满打满算有一百吨水泥就足够了。|||| Let's cement the parts together. 咱们来把这些部件粘接在一起吧。

name: cooperation
interpret: n.合作，协力，合作社
example: 单词 cooperation 的例句||||I require cooperation of you. 我需要你们的合作。|||| I need your cooperation in this subject. 在这个项目上我需要你的合作。

name: living-room
interpret: n.起居室，客厅
example: 单词 living-room 的例句||||He keeps a parrot in a birdcage in his living-room. 他在客厅的鸟笼里养了一只鹦鹉。||||The living-room connects with the toilet. 客厅与卫生间相连。

name: grocer
interpret: n.食品商；杂货商
example: 单词 grocer 的例句||||Go down to the grocer's and get me some sugar. 去杂货店给我买点糖来。||||That grocer always overcharges. 那个杂货商总是要高价。

name: robbery
interpret: n.抢劫；抢劫案
example: 单词 robbery 的例句||||A man is being questioned in connection with the robbery. 一名男子就那起抢劫案接受查问。||||The police are offering a big reward for information about the robbery. 警方出大笔赏金要求提供那起抢劫案的破案线索。

name: slippery
interpret: adj.滑的；油滑的，狡猾的，不可靠的
example: 单词 slippery 的例句||||We found it very slippery under foot. 我们感到地上很滑。||||Mind out, the steps are slippery! 注意，台阶很滑！

name: nuisance
interpret: n.讨厌的东西，讨厌的人
example: 单词 nuisance 的例句||||The dog is a terrible nuisance. 这只狗真令人讨厌。||||What a horrid nuisance! 真讨厌！

name: protest
interpret: vt.&vi.反对，抗议；宣称；n.抗议；宣称
example: 单词 protest 的例句||||I can't pass the matter by without a protest. 我不能对此事视而不见，我要提出抗议。||||We translated his silence as a protest. 我们把他的沉默解释为抗议。

name: stripe
interpret: n.线条，条纹
example: 单词 stripe 的例句||||Cut chicken breast into stripe. Season with the pepper and salt. 鸡胸肉切条状，以胡椒及盐调味。||||The plates have a blue stripe round the edge. 这些盘子边缘上有一道蓝线。

name: crawl
interpret: vi.／n.爬行，匍匐行进；缓慢(费力)地行进
example: 单词 crawl 的例句||||We learn to crawl before we learn to walk. 我们学会走路之前先要学会爬。||||She slowed the car to a crawl. 她把车开得很慢。

name: fleet
interpret: n.舰队；船队，机群
example: 单词 fleet 的例句||||He made his money with a fleet of moving vans. 他靠一队家具搬运车赚钱。|||| He was placed in command of the fleet. 他被任命为舰队司令。

name: surrender
interpret: vi.投降，自首；屈服；交出，放弃；vt.使投降；放弃；交出；听任
example: 单词 surrender 的例句||||He preferred to die rather than surrender to the enemy. 他宁死也不愿向敌人投降。||||Liu Hulan would rather die than surrender before the enemy. 刘胡兰在敌人面前宁死不屈。

name: calculation
interpret: n.计算；计算结果
example: 单词 calculation 的例句||||The machine will read out the result of the calculation. 机器将读出计算结果。||||He is absorbed in the calculation of that difficult maths problem. 他全神贯注地在算那道数学难题。

name: mechanical
interpret: adj.机械(学)的；力学的；机械似的；手工操作的；呆板的；
example: 单词 mechanical 的例句||||He borrowed a mechanical book from me. 他从我这儿借了一本力学方面的书。||||He looks very mechanical. 他看上去非常呆板。

name: circuit
interpret: n.电路，线路；环行，环行道
example: 单词 circuit 的例句||||Join those two ends of wire and you'll make a circuit. 把那两个导线连接起来即构成一个电路。||||Where does this line tie in with the main circuit? 这条线在哪里跟主线路连接在一起呢？

name: tray
interpret: n.盘，托盘，碟
example: 单词 tray 的例句||||There were two glasses of champagne on the tray. 托盘里有两杯香槟酒。||||A waitress came in, carrying tea on a tray. 一名女侍者走进来，手端放着茶的托盘。

name: inherit
interpret: vt.继承(金钱等)，经遗传而得(性格、特征)
example: 单词 inherit 的例句||||He intended that his son should inherit his business. 他打算让他的儿子继承他的生意。||||We must inherit in a critical way. 我们要以批判的方式继承。

name: treason
interpret: n.叛逆，通敌，背叛，叛国罪
example: 单词 treason 的例句||||The Congress shall have power to declare the punishment of treason. 国会有权宣布如何惩罚叛国罪。||||She was arraigned for high treason. 她被控叛国罪。

name: Parliament
interpret: n.议会，国会
example: 单词 Parliament 的例句||||She won a seat in Parliament at the election. 她在选举中赢得了议会中的席位。||||The drug was banned by an act of parliament. 议会的法案明令禁止该药品。

name: boast
interpret: vt.自夸；以拥有…而自豪；吹嘘；vi. 自吹自擂；n.自吹自擂
example: 单词 boast 的例句||||It is nothing to boast of. 这没有什么可夸耀的。||||Talent is his boast. 他以有才自豪。

name: inhabitant
interpret: n.居住者；居民；栖居的动物
example: 单词 inhabitant 的例句||||The inhabitant of the island is friendly. 岛上的居民很友善。||||The old inhabitant who answered was a tall, gaunt woman. 这个答话的本地老住户是一个高个儿，瘦身材的女人。

name: diameter
interpret: n.直径
example: 单词 diameter 的例句||||The circle has a diameter of 6 inches. 这个圆直径六英寸。||||A diameter passes through the center of a circle. 直径从圆心穿过。

name: hollow
interpret: adj.空的，中空的，空心的；空洞的，无价值的
example: 单词 hollow 的例句||||The boys scraped out a hollow place for planting trees. 那些孩子挖了个坑准备栽树。||||Bamboo is a sort of hollow plant. 竹子是一种中空的植物。

name: Englishman
interpret: n.(pl.Englishmen)英国人；英国男人
example: 单词 Englishman 的例句||||I was astonished that he was not an Englishman. 我很惊讶，他竟不是英国人。||||She stared thoughtfully at the Englishman across the table. 她若有所思地盯着桌子对面的那个英国人。

name: alike
interpret: adj.同样的，相像的；adv.一样地；同程度地
example: 单词 alike 的例句||||The twins are so alike that I can't tell which is which. 这对双胞胎一模一样，我分辨不出谁是谁。||||All stories seemed dreadfully alike no matter who told them. 看来，不管谁讲，故事都是千篇一律的。

name: blade
interpret: n.刀刃，刀片；叶片
example: 单词 blade 的例句||||Blade and handle are the component parts of a knife. 刀身和刀柄是一把刀的组成部分。||||He is a good blade. 他剑术高明。

name: mould
interpret: n.模子，模型，霉，霉菌，气质；vt.浇铸
example: 单词 mould 的例句||||He will mould a child into an excellent basketball player. 他把孩子造就成为一个优秀的篮球运动员。||||This is a mould of pudding. 这是做布丁的模子。

name: germ
interpret: n.细菌，病菌，微生物；(想法等的)起源
example: 单词 germ 的例句||||I have the germ of an idea. 我有一个初步的想法。||||This was the germ of a book. 这是一本书的源起。

name: laboratory
interpret: n.实验室，化验室
example: 单词 laboratory 的例句||||She has donated money to establish a laboratory. 她捐款成立了一个实验室。||||Our laboratory equipment isn't perfect, but we must make do. 实验室设备是不够理想，但我们只好因陋就简。

name: lord
interpret: n.上帝，主；主人，长官；君主，贵族
example: 单词 lord 的例句||||I know the Lord will look after him. 我知道上帝会眷顾他的。||||How good of the Lord not to level it beyond repair! 上帝多么仁慈啊，竟没有让这所房子损毁得不可收拾！

name: roar
interpret: n.吼，咆哮，轰鸣，喧闹；vi.吼叫，大声说出，喧闹；vt.呼喊，使轰鸣
example: 单词 roar 的例句||||He began to roar when I took the chocolate away. 当我把巧克力拿走时，他大哭起来。||||The machines roar incessantly during the hours of daylight. 机器在白天隆隆地响个不停。

name: tame
interpret: adj.驯服的，柔顺的，乏味的；v.驯养，使...驯服
example: 单词 tame 的例句||||His job is to tame lions. 他的工作是驯狮。||||He is so tame that he agrees with everybody. 他很随和，总是顺从他人的意见。

name: nursery
interpret: n.托儿所；苗圃
example: 单词 nursery 的例句||||They have decided to start up a nursery in the factory. 他们已决定要在工厂里开办一个托儿所。||||Her company ran its own workplace nursery. 她的公司开办了内部的托儿所。

name: spade
interpret: n.铁锨，铲子，黑桃；vt.铲；把……弄实抹平；vi 铲
example: 单词 spade 的例句||||This spade is very handy. 这把铁锹使起来挺顺手。|||| He dug the ground with a spade. 他用锹挖地。

name: bubble
interpret: n.泡，水泡，气泡；泡影，妄想；vt.(使)起泡；vi.沸腾，冒泡；发出气泡声
example: 单词 bubble 的例句||||The water begins to bubble. 水开始起泡了。||||Their hopes of success have burst like a bubble. 他们成功的希望已经成了泡影。

name: calculator
interpret: n.计算者，计算机
example: 单词 calculator 的例句||||Don't forget to bring your calculator that day. 那天你可别忘了带计算器。||||I totaled my expenses with a calculator. 我用计算器算出开支的总金额。

name: crane
interpret: n.吊车，起重机；鹤；vt.&vi.伸长，探头；vi.迟疑，踌躇
example: 单词 crane 的例句||||We used a crane to lift the piano into the theatre. 我们使用起重机将钢琴搬进剧场。||||Crane is a kind of bird with very long legs and neck.鹤是一种腿和脖子都很长的鸟。

name: revolutionary
interpret: adj.革命的；大变革的；n.革命者；革命党人
example: 单词 revolutionary 的例句||||This is a revolutionary new way of growing rice. 这是一种全新的种稻方法。||||He joined a revolutionary organization. 他参加了一个革命团体。

name: jet
interpret: n.喷气发动机，喷气式飞机；vt.&vi.喷出，喷射
example: 单词 jet 的例句||||Put a match to the jet to light the gas. 将火柴放在煤气喷嘴上点燃煤气。||||I want to have a jet. 我想要一架喷气式飞机。

name: pigeon
interpret: n.鸽子
example: 单词 pigeon 的例句||||The pigeon homed from a distance of 100 miles. 鸽子从百英里之外返回窝巢。||||How many pigeon eggs do you need? 你要几个鸽子蛋？

name: tub
interpret: n.桶，塑料杯，纸杯；盆，洗澡盆，浴缸
example: 单词 tub 的例句||||The girl washed clothes in a tub. 那女孩把衣服放在木盆里洗。||||The tub needs fixing too. It leaks. 浴盆需要修了，总是漏水。

name: brick
interpret: n.砖；vt.用砖砌，用砖堵住
example: 单词 brick 的例句||||She stared blankly at the brick wall in front of her. 她面无表情地瞪着面前的砖墙。||||I bought a brick of ice cream for my daughter. 我给女儿买了块冰砖。

name: barber
interpret: n.理发员，美容师
example: 单词 barber 的例句||||She asked the barber to crop her hair short. 她叫理发师把她的头发剪短了。||||My Mum took me to the barber's. 我妈带我理发去了。

name: determination
interpret: n.决心，决定；确定，测定；意志坚强
example: 单词 determination 的例句||||The child's tears melted his determination. 孩子的眼泪使他的决心动摇了。||||Firm determination moves mountains. 坚定的决心可以移山。

name: Scotland
interpret: n.苏格兰
example: 单词 Scotland 的例句||||He has been hiking round Scotland for a month. 他围着苏格兰徒步旅行了一个月。||||Scotland is to the north of England. 苏格兰在英格兰之北。

name: rotten
interpret: adj.腐烂(朽)的；令人不愉快的；糟糕的
example: 单词 rotten 的例句||||The book was pretty rotten. 这本书糟透了。||||Rotten eggs give off a bad smell. 臭蛋散发出难闻的气味。

name: lawn
interpret: n.草地，草坪，上等细麻布
example: 单词 lawn 的例句||||The lawn was crawling with ants. 草坪上爬满了蚂蚁。||||They are lying on a grassy lawn. 他们躺在绿草如茵的草坪上。

name: absent-minded
interpret: adj.心不在焉的
example: 单词 absent-minded 的例句||||You are really absent-minded. 你真是心不在焉！||||He had an absent-minded manner. 他表现出心不在焉的样子。

name: tissue
interpret: n.组织；薄纱，薄纸，手巾纸
example: 单词 tissue 的例句||||As we age we lose muscle tissue. 肌肉组织会随着我们日趋衰老而萎缩。||||Athletes have hardly any fatty tissue. 运动员几乎没有什么脂肪组织。

name: Antarctic
interpret: adj.南极(区)的；n.(the A-)南极洲，南极圈
example: 单词 Antarctic 的例句||||The Antarctic is a mountainous area. 南极洲是一个多山的地区。||||It is well known that penguins live in the Antarctic. 企鹅生活在南极洲是众所周知的。

name: shocking
interpret: adj.令人气愤的；令人震惊的
example: 单词 shocking 的例句||||His attitude was shocking to her. 他的态度令她感到震惊。||||Such behaviour is really shocking. 这种行为真不像话。

name: nonsense
interpret: n.胡说，废话
example: 单词 nonsense 的例句||||Go along with you! What you say is all nonsense! 去你的！你说的全是废话！||||"Don't talk nonsense", she said sharply. ”别胡扯”，她严厉地说。

name: stuff
interpret: n.原料，材料，东西；vt.填满；吃饱
example: 单词 stuff 的例句||||We could supply you with the stuff in the raw tomorrow. 明天我们可以供应你原材料。||||He is not the stuff. 他不是这个材料。

name: temper
interpret: n.恶劣的心情，心绪焦躁；性情，脾气
example: 单词 temper 的例句||||The man lost his temper and struck out wildly. 那人因发怒而大打出手。||||One day the man flew at me in a temper. 一天，那个人冲着我大发脾气。

name: landing
interpret: n.登陆；着陆；楼梯平台
example: 单词 landing 的例句||||Owing to engine trouble the plane had to make a forced landing. 由于发动机出了毛病，飞机不得不进行迫降。||||When are we landing? 我们什么时候着陆？

name: saucer
interpret: n.茶碟，茶托，小圆盘
example: 单词 saucer 的例句||||A teacup should stand in a saucer. 茶杯应放在茶托上。||||I slopped tea in the saucer. 我把茶溅到了茶托里。

name: vague
interpret: adj.(思想上)不清楚的，含糊的，不具体的
example: 单词 vague 的例句||||The final letter is very vague; possibly an R or a K. 最后一个字母很不清楚，可能是R，也可能是K。||||Through the mist I could just make out a vague figure. 透过雾霭，我只能看见一个模糊的人影。

name: basically
interpret: adv.基本上，从根本上说
example: 单词 basically 的例句||||His heart is basically sound. 他的心脏基本上健康。||||Basically I agree with your plan. 我基本上同意你的计划。

name: occasion
interpret: n.场合，时机，机会，诱因，理由；vt.惹起，引起
example: 单词 occasion 的例句||||Her dress was too showy for such a formal occasion. 在如此正式的场合，她的服装过分华丽了。||||Her tears were fought back on such an occasion. 在这种场合下她忍住了眼泪。

name: wreath
interpret: n.花环，花圈，花冠
example: 单词 wreath 的例句||||She is weaving the flowers into a wreath. 她把花编成花环。||||She made a wreath for head. 她编了一个花冠。

name: rage
interpret: vi.(烈火)熊熊燃烧；发怒；怒斥；季风；n.愤怒；狂暴，肆虐；情绪激动
example: 单词 rage 的例句||||He went into a rage when he learned about it. 他听到这事后勃然大怒。||||Haines got into a rage. 海恩斯勃然大怒。

name: manufacturer
interpret: n.生产厂商，制造公司，厂主
example: 单词 manufacturer 的例句||||A manufacturer can amplify the demand of a product by advertising widely. 厂商能用大做广告的方法来扩大人们对产品的需求。||||Prices are laid down by the manufacturer. 价格是由厂商制定的。

name: visible
interpret: adj.看得见的，明显的，显然的；n.可见物
example: 单词 visible 的例句||||It is a visible star in the sky. 这是一颗在天空中可见的星星。||||The warning lights were clearly visible. 警示信号灯清晰可见。

name: veteran
interpret: n.老兵；经验丰富的人，老手
example: 单词 veteran 的例句||||My grandfather is a veteran of the Second World War. 我祖父是二战时的老兵。||||We often asked the veteran workers for advice. 我们常常向老工人求教。

name: planet
interpret: n.行星
example: 单词 planet 的例句||||Neptune is the furthest planet from the sun. 海王星是离太阳最远的行星。||||Rubbish, however, is only part of the problem of polluting our planet. 然而，垃圾只是我们这个星球的污染问题的一个方面。

name: worship
interpret: n.崇拜，礼拜；vt.崇拜，敬仰；做礼拜；vi.拜神；做礼拜
example: 单词 worship 的例句||||The Greeks used to worship several gods. 过去，希腊人崇奉好几种神。||||Blind worship must be ended. 盲目崇拜必须停止。

name: oblige
interpret: vt.强迫，迫使；责成；(使)感激，施恩于；vi.帮忙；施恩惠
example: 单词 oblige 的例句||||Please oblige me with a reply as soon as possible. 请尽早给予答复。||||Will you oblige me with your name and address? 敬请赐告你的姓名和地址好吗？

name: largely
interpret: adv.大部分，主要地
example: 单词 largely 的例句||||It is largely dependent on the weather. 这多半取决于天气情况。||||Their conclusions were largely founded on guesswork. 他们的结论大部份基于猜测。

name: glimpse
interpret: vt.瞥见；n.一瞥，一看
example: 单词 glimpse 的例句||||One glimpse at himself in the mirror was enough. 让他照着镜子看自己一眼就够了。||||She catches a glimpse of a car in the distance. 她一眼就瞥见了远处的汽车。

name: marvellous
interpret: adj.引起惊异的，不可思议的
example: 单词 marvellous 的例句||||It's marvellous how he's managed to climb that far. 他怎么能爬得那么远，真不可思议。||||She has a marvellous voice with an extraordinary range. 她歌喉甜美，音域奇广。

name: tropical
interpret: adj.热带的，热带的，炎热的
example: 单词 tropical 的例句||||You must grow these tropical flowers in a glasshouse. 你必须把这些热带花卉种在温室里。||||This disease is widespread in tropical areas. 这种疾病在热带地区蔓延很广。

name: examination
interpret: n.考试，考查，试题；检查，调查
example: 单词 examination 的例句||||Teachers always judge their students on the final examination. 老师常根据期末考试来评价他们的学生。||||He put up a good show in the final examination. 他在期末考试中表现得不错。

name: gum
interpret: n.牙龈；口香糖；树胶
example: 单词 gum 的例句||||We can stick these pictures into the book with gum. 我们可用胶水把这几张画粘贴在书里。||||Americans like to chew gum. 美国人喜欢嚼口香糖。

name: sharpen
interpret: vt.（使）变锐利，削尖；vi.尖锐；变锋利
example: 单词 sharpen 的例句||||This exercise will help students sharpen up their reading skills. 这个练习将帮助学生提高阅读能力。||||When you sharpen a pencil, you make chips. 你削铅笔时，会削下许多碎屑。

name: magnet
interpret: n.有强大吸引力的人或物；磁铁，磁体
example: 单词 magnet 的例句||||He picked all the pins up with a magnet. 他用磁铁捡起了所有的大头针。||||Dalian is a magnet for tourists. 大连是吸引游客的地方。

name: description
interpret: n.描述，记述；描绘，描写，刻划；种类
example: 单词 description 的例句||||Can you give me a description of the thief? 你能给我描述一下那个窃贼的模样吗？||||He gave a description of what he had seen. 他描述了他所见到的一切。

name: dump
interpret: n.垃圾场；vt.倾卸，切断电源，倾倒；vi.倒垃圾；突然跌倒或落下；卸货；转嫁（责任等）
example: 单词 dump 的例句||||Where can I dump this rubbish? 我将这些垃圾倒在什么地方？||||They wheeled the rubbish out to the dump. 他们把垃圾用车运到垃圾场去。

name: sticky
interpret: adj.粘的，闷热的，困难的，令人不满意的
example: 单词 sticky 的例句||||This paste is not sticky enough. 这糨糊不黏。||||Here is a sticky business! 这事真难办!

name: corridor
interpret: n.走廊，回廊，通路
example: 单词 corridor 的例句||||The corridor opens into Mr. Brown's office. 这条走廊通到布朗先生的办公室。||||There was a ring of laughter in the corridor. 走廊里传来响亮的笑声。

name: Negro
interpret: n./adj.黑人；黑人的
example: 单词 Negro 的例句||||It's impolite to call the black people Negro. 称呼黑人为Negro是不礼貌的。||||He was the first Negro ever to enroll there. 他是学院招收的第一个黑人学生。

name: cassette
interpret: n.卡式录音带盒；卡式胶卷盒，盒式磁带
example: 单词 cassette 的例句||||He inserted a cassette into the machine. 他把一盒录像带放入机器。||||And let's not forget our cassette player and some tapes. 还别忘了带上我们的卡式录音机和一些录音带。

name: clothe
interpret: vt.供给衣服，给…穿衣
example: 单词 clothe 的例句||||We clothe our thoughts in words. 我们用语言表达思想。||||She was on her own with two kids to feed and clothe. 她独自一个人要供两个孩子吃穿。

name: frank
interpret: adj.坦白的，直率的，真诚的
example: 单词 frank 的例句||||A frank discussion can help to clear the air. 坦率的谈论有助于消除隔阂。||||She is frank and outgoing. 她很爽朗。

name: grace
interpret: n.优雅，雅致，魅力，恩惠，慈悲
example: 单词 grace 的例句||||She is a beautiful girl with the grace and poise. 她是一位仪态优雅的佳丽。||||I hope the grace of God would descend on me. 我期望上帝的恩惠。

name: singular
interpret: adj.个人的，单数的，独一的，唯一的，非凡的；n.单数
example: 单词 singular 的例句||||The young man has a singular ear for music. 这个年轻人对音乐有非凡的欣赏力。||||The noun is in the singular. 这个名词是单数形式。

name: vacuum
interpret: n.真空，空间，真空吸尘器；adj.真空的，产生(利用)真空的；v.用吸尘器打扫
example: 单词 vacuum 的例句||||Sound waves will not travel through a vacuum. 声波在真空里不能传播。||||He sells vacuum cleaners. 他经销真空吸尘器。

name: composition
interpret: n.构成，成分；作文，作曲；(音乐等)作品
example: 单词 composition 的例句||||He played a piece of music of his own composition. 他演奏了一首自己创作的曲子。||||His composition has improved. 他的作文有进步。

name: toward
interpret: prep.对于，关于，接近，将近，向，朝
example: 单词 toward 的例句||||Suddenly I saw a tall figure approaching toward the policeman. 突然间我看到一个高大的身影朝警察靠近。||||Upon seeing her, I smiled and ran toward her. 看到她我笑了，并跑了过去。

name: profile
interpret: n.侧面，轮廓，人物素描；概要，人物简介；vt.描绘...轮廓，评论人物；vi.给出轮廓
example: 单词 profile 的例句||||I turned my head and saw the profile of a man. 我转过头，看见一个人的侧影。||||He drew her profile. 他给她画侧面像。

name: assembly
interpret: n.集会(不可数)；会议(可数)，装配(不可数)
example: 单词 assembly 的例句||||He took his seat in an unobserved corner of the assembly room. 他在会议室一个不为人注意的犄角坐下来。||||It was very quiet in the assembly hall. 会场里静悄悄的。

name: overall
interpret: n.工作服，工装裤；全面的，全体的
example: 单词 overall 的例句||||The shop assistant was wearing a white overall. 那店员穿着白色的工作服。||||How much will it cost overall? 一共多少钱？

name: sole
interpret: adj.惟一的；独一无二的，专用的；独占的
example: 单词 sole 的例句||||She is my sole trust. 她是我惟一信赖的人。||||My sole purpose is to help you. 我唯一的目的是帮助你。

name: cashier
interpret: n.出纳员，收银员
example: 单词 cashier 的例句||||The young cashier gave a patient sigh. 年轻的出纳员忍耐地叹了一口气。||||One brother is a cashier and the other sells. 两个兄弟一位当出纳，另一位当店员。

name: throne
interpret: n.御座，宝座；王位，王权
example: 单词 throne 的例句||||He was the legal heir to the throne. 他是王位的合法继承人。||||The throne was footed with gold. 这御座是用黄金做的脚。

name: bug
interpret: n.虫子；故障；窃听器；vt.纠缠；装窃听器
example: 单词 bug 的例句||||There is a bug in the system. 系统出了故障。||||The bird caught a bug on the fly. 那鸟在飞行中捉住了一只昆虫。

name: tortoise
interpret: n.龟，乌龟
example: 单词 tortoise 的例句||||The tortoise wins the race while the hare is sleeping. 兔子正睡觉时，乌龟赢得了比赛。||||A tortoise has a shell on his back. 乌龟背上有硬壳。

name: coincidence
interpret: n.巧合，同时发生
example: 单词 coincidence 的例句||||Did you think it was coincidence? 你以为这是巧合吗？||||She and I both arrived at the same time by pure coincidence. 我和她同时到达纯属巧合。

name: thoughtful
interpret: adj.思考的，沉思的，体贴的，关心的
example: 单词 thoughtful 的例句||||She is thoughtful for her friends. 她很体贴她的朋友们。||||This is a thoughtful essay. 这是一篇具有思想性的随笔。

name: paw
interpret: n.手掌，手爪；vi.以蹄扒地，翻找；vt.抓，扒；亲昵地抚摸
example: 单词 paw 的例句||||He served as a cat's paw. 他充当爪牙。||||Don't paw at everything you see. 别见什么摸什么。

name: secondary
interpret: adj.中级的，中等的，次要的；n.次要位置，副手
example: 单词 secondary 的例句||||It's a question of secondary importance. 这是个次要的问题。||||Secondary school means junior school and high school. 中学是指初中和高中。

name: hip
interpret: n.臀部，髋；屋脊
example: 单词 hip 的例句||||The thigh bone is connected to the hip bone. 股骨连着髋骨。||||The new coats blouse gracefully above the hip line. 新外套在臀围线上优美地打着褶皱。

name: upright
interpret: adj.直立的；正直的；adv.挺直着，竖立着
example: 单词 upright 的例句||||He stood himself upright. 他笔直地站着。||||An upright man is respectable. 正直的人是值得尊敬的。

name: softly
interpret: adv.柔和地，静静地，温柔地
example: 单词 softly 的例句||||He speaks too softly for her to hear. 他讲话声音太轻，她听不见。||||She breathed her advice softly. 她低声劝告。

name: snowstorm
interpret: n.雪暴，暴风雪
example: 单词 snowstorm 的例句||||After several weeks of travel, snowstorm hit us first. 我们旅行了几个星期，初次碰上了暴风雪。||||A severe snowstorm blocked up railroads. 一场暴风雪使铁路中断。

name: arithmetic
interpret: n.算术，算法；adj.算术学的，算术的
example: 单词 arithmetic 的例句||||The waiter got his arithmetic wrong. 服务员算错了账。||||John was competing against James for the prize in arithmetic. 约翰和詹姆斯比赛争夺算术奖。

name: adjective
interpret: n.形容词；adj.形容词的，用作形容词的
example: 单词 adjective 的例句||||Don't apply that adjective to me. 不要用那个字眼来形容我。||||The adjective loose has several senses. 形容词loose有几个义项。

name: agency
interpret: n.经办；代理；代理处
example: 单词 agency 的例句||||This disease is spread through the agency of insects. 这种疾病是通过昆虫媒介传播的。||||He spoke in the person of Xinhua News Agency. 他代表新华社讲话。

name: crown
interpret: n.王冠，王权，顶点；vt.使...成王，加冕，居...之顶
example: 单词 crown 的例句||||He won the crown in 1973. 他荣获1973年冠军称号。||||They wanted to crown Caesar king. 他们想立凯撒为王。

name: donation
interpret: n.捐赠，捐献，捐助；捐赠物
example: 单词 donation 的例句||||She made a personal donation to the fund. 她以个人名义向基金会捐款。||||The next big donation of musical instruments came from Germany. 第二笔音乐乐器的大型捐助来自德国。

name: evil
interpret: n.邪恶，不幸，罪恶；adj.邪恶的，不幸的，有害的，诽谤的
example: 单词 evil 的例句||||We pray to God to deliver us from evil. 我们祈求上帝把我们从罪恶中拯救出来。||||Love of money is the root of all evil. 爱钱是邪恶的根源。

name: frame
interpret: n.框架，结构，体格；vt.构成，设计，制定，使适合，陷害； 框架，（是指在数据链路层中，将网络层数据包加上开始与结尾信息包组成一个框架）
example: 单词 frame 的例句||||The house has a wooden frame which is faced with brick. 这个房子是木质结构的砖瓦房。||||We must frame up that picture. 我们必须给那幅画装上框。

name: resort
interpret: n.凭借，手段，常去之地，胜地；vi.求助，诉诸，采取（某种手段等），常去
example: 单词 resort 的例句||||He couldn't have passed the exam without resort to cheating. 他要不是靠作弊是通不过这次考试的。||||Beidaihe is noted for its summer resort. 北戴河以避暑胜地而著称。

name: shepherd
interpret: n.牧羊者，牧师，指导者；vt.看守，领导，指导
example: 单词 shepherd 的例句||||The shepherd boy waited for his sheep to drink. 牧童等羊喝水。||||The shepherd and his dog gathered in the sheep. 牧羊人和牧羊狗把羊群赶到一块。

name: punch
interpret: vt.用拳猛击；用打孔机打孔；vi.用拳猛击；n.冲压机；打洞器；钻孔机
example: 单词 punch 的例句||||The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose. 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳。||||He laid his opponent low with a single punch. 他一拳猛击便把对手打倒在地。

name: cabin
interpret: n.(结构简单的)小木屋；船舱，机舱
example: 单词 cabin 的例句||||They threw up a new cabin in a couple of hours. 在几小时之内他们就建起了一座新的小屋。||||It's very hot in the cabin; let's go on deck. 舱室内很热，我们到甲板上去吧。

name: laser
interpret: n.激光
example: 单词 laser 的例句||||We keep a laser record. 我们保存激光唱片。||||Laser beams are also used in surgery. 激光束还可用于外科手术。

name: odd
interpret: adj.奇特的；临时的；奇数的；n.[pl.]机会
example: 单词 odd 的例句||||She looks a bit odd. I wonder what has happened to her. 她的神色有些异样，不知出了什么事。||||He's an odd character and no mistake! 他的确是个怪人！

name: academy
interpret: n.(高等)专科院校；学术社团，协会，研究院
example: 单词 academy 的例句||||This is an academy of music. 这是一所音乐专科学院。||||I visited Chinese Academy of Sciences yesterday. 我昨天去访问了中国科学院。

name: calculate
interpret: vt.计算，核算；估计，推测；计划，打算
example: 单词 calculate 的例句||||He must calculate the probability of failure. 他必须计算一下失败的概率。||||I'll calculate what it will cost. 我要估计一下那要花多少钱。

name: accurate
interpret: adj.正确无误的；准确的，精确的
example: 单词 accurate 的例句||||He has made an accurate measurement of my garden. 他准确地丈量了我的花园。||||He is always accurate in what he says and does. 他说的和做的总是正确无误。

name: beam
interpret: n.横梁；光束；vi.发光，发热
example: 单词 beam 的例句||||The load on this beam is more than it will bear. 横梁上的负荷比它能承受的要大得多。||||I could see the beam of his flashlight waving around in the dark. 我可以看到他的手电筒光在黑暗中上下舞动。

name: avenue
interpret: n.林荫道；大街；途径，手段
example: 单词 avenue 的例句||||This is a shady avenue. 这是条林阴大道。||||He drove slowly. The avenue was crowded with people. 他慢慢地开车，因为大街上挤满了人。

name: daring
interpret: adj.大胆的，勇敢的，敢作敢为
example: 单词 daring 的例句||||It was a daring attempt but he carried it off. 那是个大胆的尝试，而他成功了。||||Man's first landing on the moon was a feat of great daring. 人类首次登月是一个勇敢的壮举。

name: client
interpret: n.委托人，当事人，顾客
example: 单词 client 的例句||||She can't come to the telephone; she's serving a client. 她不能来接电话，她正在接待一位顾客。||||The lawyer produced a clever defence of his client. 律师机智地为委托人辩护。

name: cliff
interpret: n.悬崖，峭壁
example: 单词 cliff 的例句||||The cliff edge is dangerous and should be railed. 崖边危险，应该用栏杆围起来。||||He took the measure of the cliff before he climbed it. 他把悬崖的高度估量一下后再攀登。

name: clumsy
interpret: adj.笨手笨脚；不圆滑的，缺乏技巧的
example: 单词 clumsy 的例句||||He is clumsy with his hands. 他的一双手很笨。||||Its body looks heavy and clumsy when it has eaten its fill. 它步态蹒跚，吃饱了的身体更显得笨拙可笑。

name: assist
interpret: vt.协助，帮助，促进；vi.帮忙，参加
example: 单词 assist 的例句||||He asked us to assist him in carrying through their plan. 他要我们帮助他实施他们的计划。||||We'll assist at your wedding. 我们将出席你们的婚礼。

name: code
interpret: n.代码，代号，密码；法典，法规，规划
example: 单词 code 的例句||||What's the code for Tianjin? 天津的代号是多少？|||| Remember to use postal code. 勿忘使用邮政编码。

name: definitely
interpret: adv.一定地，肯定地；明确地，确切地
example: 单词 definitely 的例句||||The team will definitely lose if he doesn't play. 如果他不参加比赛，这个队肯定会输。||||I shall definitely be home before six o'clock. 6点以前，我一定回家。

name: destine
interpret: vt.命定，注定；预定，指定
example: 单词 destine 的例句||||She feels she be destined to be unhappy for the rest of her life. 她认为她命中注定余生不会再有快乐。||||I still destine one personal divagation. 我还在注定一个人流浪。

name: electron
interpret: n.电子
example: 单词 electron 的例句||||We arrange to get an electron on the stage of our microscope. 我们设法将一个电子置于显微镜架上。||||If the energy is sufficient, this electron will be emitted. 如果能量是充分的，这个电子将被放射出来。

name: disease
interpret: n.疾病，弊端
example: 单词 disease 的例句||||The doctors are trying to stamp out the disease. 医生正在尽力消灭这种疾病。||||He fought against the disease for a long time. 他同疾病做了长时间的斗争。

name: gang
interpret: n.一伙，一帮；结伴的朋友
example: 单词 gang 的例句||||The gang live abroad, beyond reach of the British police. 这帮匪徒住在国外，英国警方鞭长莫及。||||Some gang came in and shot the place up. 有股匪帮进来对这个地方开枪扫射。

name: gap
interpret: n.缺口；间隔；差距；不足，缺陷
example: 单词 gap 的例句||||We must see that there is no gap in our defence. 我们必须确保我们的防御没有漏洞。||||There is a gap of five miles between towns. 镇与镇之间相隔五英里。

name: fraction
interpret: n.小部分，碎片；一点，一些；分数
example: 单词 fraction 的例句||||The car missed me by a fraction of an inch. 那车子差一点儿就要撞到我了。||||The cost is only a fraction of his salary. 那项费用不过是他薪水的一小部分。

name: idle
interpret: adj.空闲的，闲置的；无用的；懒散的；v.空费
example: 单词 idle 的例句||||Mike doesn't study at all. Instead, he sits idle all day. 迈克根本不肯读书，相反地，他终日游手好闲。||||How much trouble in this life is caused by idle talk! 生活中有多少麻烦不都是由闲谈引起的么！

name: keen
interpret: adj.热心的；敏锐的；激烈的；锋利的
example: 单词 keen 的例句||||There is keen competition between the two motorcar firms. 两家汽车公司之间存在着激烈的竞争。||||The children are mad keen to go to the zoo. 孩子们非常想去动物园。

name: kneel
interpret: vi.跪，跪下，跪着
example: 单词 kneel 的例句||||At church people kneel when they pray. 人们在教堂祈祷时要下跪。||||Then the two fighters kneel and pray to God. 然后两个斗士跪下，向上帝祈祷。

name: messenger
interpret: n.报信者，先驱
example: 单词 messenger 的例句||||By the time the messenger reached him, the damage had been done. 送信人赶到他那儿时，损失已经造成了。||||I'll order a special messenger to deliver the document. 我会派专人把文件送去。

name: patch
interpret: n.补丁；斑；一小块地；vt.补，修补；vi.打补丁
example: 单词 patch 的例句||||This patch looks a bit unprofessional. 这块补丁有点像出自外行之手。||||We managed to patch our quarrel. 我们设法平息争吵。

name: sequence
interpret: n.连续，接续，一连串；次序，顺序
example: 单词 sequence 的例句||||He had to attend a sequence of meetings. 他得参加一系列会议。||||The book is more satisfying if you read each chapter in sequence. 这本书依次读各章会更好。

name: pail
interpret: n.桶，提桶
example: 单词 pail 的例句||||There was a pail of water on the ground. 地上有一桶水。||||She can lift a pail of water from the ground. 她能把一桶水提起来。

name: acid
interpret: n.酸；酸性物质；adj.酸的，酸性的
example: 单词 acid 的例句||||Handle with care, or the acid may get out. 小心轻放，否则酸会溢出来。||||The acid has been eating away the sides of the container. 酸腐蚀着容器的四壁。

name: admission
interpret: n.允许进入；承认；入场费，入会费，入场券
example: 单词 admission 的例句||||We attached a condition to his admission to our school. 我们对准许他入校附加了一个条件。||||By her own admission, she was responsible for the accident. 她自己承认，事故应该由她负责。

name: catalogue
interpret: n.目录，总目；vt.编入目录
example: 单词 catalogue 的例句||||The librarian entered a new book in the catalogue. 图书管理员把一本新书编入目录。||||The catalogue is under revision. 目录册正在修订之中。

name: brandy
interpret: n.白兰地酒
example: 单词 brandy 的例句||||I took another drink of brandy and moved forward. 我又喝了一口白兰地，向前走去。||||The barman uses a small silver measure for brandy. 酒吧招待员用一个小银制量器量白兰地。

name: colony
interpret: n.殖民地；(同类人的)聚居地
example: 单词 colony 的例句||||There lived a colony of bees on the tree. 树上生活着一群蜜蜂。||||They live in an artists'colony. 他们住在艺术家聚居区。

name: enable
interpret: vt.使能够；使可以；使成为可能
example: 单词 enable 的例句||||Only teamwork will enable us to get the job done on time. 只有团结一致，我们才能按时完成这项工作。||||This will enable China to go a step further in grain production. 这就使得中国粮食生产能再上新台阶。

name: council
interpret: n.理事会，委员会，议事机构
example: 单词 council 的例句||||The town council passed a law forbidding the distribution of handbills. 市议会通过法律，禁止散发传单。||||The city council has declared for improving the public bus system. 市议会宣布同意改进公共汽车系统。

name: drain
interpret: n.排水沟，阴沟；消耗，负担；vi.排去，放干；vt.喝光，耗尽；使流出；排掉水
example: 单词 drain 的例句||||Drain off the rest of the wine from this barrel. 把桶里剩余的酒排出去。||||First, you have to drain the container of all the old oil. 首先，你得从油箱中把所有的陈油都抽去。

name: certificate
interpret: n.证书，证明书；vt.发给证明书，认可，鉴定
example: 单词 certificate 的例句||||She proudly displayed her degree certificate to her parents. 她自豪地向父母展示了学位证书。||||No one had seen her marriage certificate. 没人看到过她的结婚证书。

name: harmless
interpret: adj.无害的，无恶意的
example: 单词 harmless 的例句||||This experiment was harmless to the animals. 这个试验不会对动物造成伤害。 ||||He was a harmless sort. 他是一个不怀恶意的人。

name: microphone
interpret: n.扩音器，麦克风，话筒
example: 单词 microphone 的例句||||He gave a tap at the microphone before speaking. 他在讲话前先轻叩了一下扩音器。||||She behaved naturally before the microphone. 她在话筒前表现自然。

name: related
interpret: adj.有关系的，有关联的，叙述的，讲述的
example: 单词 related 的例句||||I am not related to him in any way. 我和他无任何关系。||||We spent days going through all related reference material. 我们花了好多天功夫查阅所有有关的参考资料。

name: restart
interpret: vt.重新开始，重新启动；vi.重新开始，重新启动
example: 单词 restart 的例句||||Restart the computer in Safe mode or VGA mode. 在安全模式或VGA模式。下重新启动计算机||||After the restart the program continues to run automatically. 重启后，程序仍然自动运行。

name: pad
interpret: n.垫，衬垫；便签本，印色盒
example: 单词 pad 的例句||||She made a brief note on the telephone pad. 她在电话通讯簿上记下简短的话。||||Each student should have a pencil and pad. 每个学生应该有一支铅笔和一个便签本。

name: unkind
interpret: adj.不仁慈的，不和善的
example: 单词 unkind 的例句||||He was never unkind to her. 他从未亏待过她。||||Unkindness often reacts on the unkind person. 恶人有恶报。

name: vine
interpret: n.葡萄树；蔓；藤
example: 单词 vine 的例句||||The vine twines round the tree. 这藤盘绕在树干上。||||There is a vine yard before the hill. 山前有一个葡萄园。

name: experienced
interpret: adj.有经验的；经验丰富的，熟练的
example: 单词 experienced 的例句||||Experienced seamen will advise you about sailing in this weather. 有经验的海员会告诉你在这种天气下的航行情况。||||Perhaps you and I had better change over; you are more experienced. 也许我们的工作还是对换一下好，你比我更有经验。

name: farther
interpret: adj.更远的，进一步的；adv.更远的，此外；far的比较级
example: 单词 farther 的例句||||I can throw the ball farther than you can. 这个球我能比你扔得远。||||The farther hill is five kilometres away. 那座更远的小山在五公里以外。

name: instantly
interpret: adv.立即，立刻
example: 单词 instantly 的例句||||She was used to having her orders instantly obeyed. 她习惯了让人即刻服从她的命令。||||Though he slept soundly, he awoke instantly. 他虽然睡得很香，但是马上就醒了。

name: normally
interpret: adv.正常地，通常地
example: 单词 normally 的例句||||I normally do all my shopping on Saturdays. 我通常在星期六买东西。||||My pulse beats normally. 我脉搏正常。

name: obviously
interpret: adv.显然；明白地
example: 单词 obviously 的例句||||Obviously they were putting him to a severe test. 显然他们是在给他以严峻的考验。||||Obviously he was lying. 显然他是在撒谎。

name: murderer
interpret: n.杀人犯，凶手
example: 单词 murderer 的例句||||How long should a murderer be kept in prison? 犯了谋杀罪的人应在监狱关多少年？||||They discovered the murderer to have run away. 他们发现凶手已逃之夭夭。

name: therapy
interpret: n.治疗；疗法
example: 单词 therapy 的例句||||The doctor said she should be given a physical therapy. 医生说她应该进行理疗。||||She will need to have the therapy repeated every few months. 她将需要每隔几个月就进行一次治疗。

name: up-to-date
interpret: adj.现代化的，最新的；跟上时代的
example: 单词 up-to-date 的例句||||The car is a beauty and quite up-to-date. 那辆车子很漂亮是最新款的。||||He bought an up-to-date textbook. 他买了一本最新的教科书。

name: breeze
interpret: n.微风；轻而易举的事；vi.来去匆匆，急速走
example: 单词 breeze 的例句||||A little breeze is blowing in from the window. 微风从窗户里吹进来。||||The clouds are pale and a light breeze is blowing. 云淡风轻。

name: circulate
interpret: vt.（使）流通，（使）运行，（使）循环，（使）传播；vi.传播，流传；循环；流通
example: 单词 circulate 的例句||||People who circulate false news are to be blamed. 散布流言者该受遣责。||||The blood must circulate freely everywhere in the body. 血液应该是全身畅通的。

name: departure
interpret: n.离开，起程；背离，违反
example: 单词 departure 的例句||||Do you know what lies behind her sudden departure for London? 你知道她突然去伦敦的原因吗？||||She took over his work after his departure. 他离开以后，她接替了他的工作。

name: column
interpret: n.列，柱形图；专栏；圆柱；纵队
example: 单词 column 的例句||||I often read his column in the local paper. 我经常在当地的报纸上看到他的专栏文章。||||A column of soldiers marched down the highway. 一个士兵纵队沿着公路行进。

name: continuous
interpret: adj.继续的，连续的，持续的，延伸的
example: 单词 continuous 的例句||||She finally got in after 10 years'continuous effort. 坚持不懈地努力了十年后，她终于当选了。||||We must be continuous to study. 我们必须不断学习。

name: draft
interpret: vt.起草，作...的草稿；n.草稿，草图，草案
example: 单词 draft 的例句||||He's now revising the first draft of his essay. 他目前正修改他的文章初稿。||||The draft of this article has been done。这篇文章已经定稿。

name: drip
interpret: n.滴，点滴；水滴；乏味的人；vi.滴下，漏水；vt.使滴下；溢出，发出
example: 单词 drip 的例句||||I hate this sort of drip. 我讨厌这种无聊的闲话。||||A drip of water fell from the tap. 从龙头滴下一滴水。

name: index
interpret: n.食指；索引；标志；指数；vt.把...编索引，vi.做索引
example: 单词 index 的例句||||Performonce is an index of ability. 成绩是能力的标志。||||Manner of walking gives an index to one's charactor. 走路的姿态可反应出人的性格。

name: jolly
interpret: adj.快乐的，高兴的；adv.很；vt.劝服，哄
example: 单词 jolly 的例句||||That day they got together and had a jolly time. 那天他们聚在一起热闹了一番。||||She was a jolly, kindhearted woman. 她是个整天乐呵呵心地善良的女人。

name: missing
interpret: adj.遗失的，缺少的，失踪的
example: 单词 missing 的例句||||Check the tools and see if anything is missing. 检点一下工具，看有无丢失。||||All the others are here; he's the only one missing. 别人都来了，就短他一个。

name: removal
interpret: n.去除，消除；挪走，移走，搬迁
example: 单词 removal 的例句||||After the removal of the soup, fish was served. 汤撤去后，鱼就上来了。||||The factory announced its removal to another town. 这家工厂宣布迁往另一座城镇。

name: botanical
interpret: adj.植物学的；n.植物性药材
example: 单词 botanical 的例句||||I am not very familiar with botanical names. 我不太熟悉植物学方面的名称。||||How many stops are there to the Botanical Garden? 去植物园要坐几站？

name: precaution
interpret: n.预防，防备，预防措施
example: 单词 precaution 的例句||||He took the precaution of locking his door when he went out. 当他外出的时候谨慎地锁上门。||||I took the precaution of locking money in the safe. 我把所有的钱都锁在保险箱里以防万一。

name: preposition
interpret: n.介词
example: 单词 preposition 的例句||||You should cancel this preposition in the sentence. 你应该删去句子中的这个介词。||||We use different preposition to talk about time, days, months and seasons. 我们用不动的介词来谈论时间，日，月和季节等。

name: dioxide
interpret: n.二氧化物
example: 单词 dioxide 的例句||||The oxygen and the carbon combine to form carbon dioxide. 氧和碳化合，形成二氧化碳。||||Carbon dioxide is the largest contributor to the greenhouse effect. 二氧化碳太多是道致温室效应的最主要原因。

name: sin
interpret: n.罪，罪孽，过失；vi.犯罪，违反
example: 单词 sin 的例句||||It's a sin to waste food. 浪费食品是一种罪过。||||It's a sin to be indoors on holiday. 假期中待在家里实在是罪过。

name: cable
interpret: n.缆绳，索；电缆；电报；vt.电汇，打电报
example: 单词 cable 的例句||||Don't forget to cable us as soon as you arrive. 别忘了一到就给我发个电报。||||The worker attached a cable. 工人连接电缆。

name: conference
interpret: n.（正式的）会议；讨论
example: 单词 conference 的例句||||We're having a conference and we'd like you to sit in. 我们将举行一次会议，希望你来旁听。||||The conference will come to a close this afternoon. 今天下午会议闭幕。

name: appliance
interpret: n.用具，器具，器械
example: 单词 appliance 的例句||||This appliance is good for homes, offices, pubs, restaurants cafes and etc. 本产品适用于：家庭，办公室，酒吧，酒店，咖啡馆等场所。||||Virtually any appliance is going to be online. 几乎一切设备都会被连入网络。

name: approximate
interpret: adj.大约，大致，近似的；vi.(to)近似，接近
example: 单词 approximate 的例句||||The builder gave an approximate cost for fixing the roof. 房屋修建商给修理房顶粗略地估计了一个价钱。||||The approximate date of his departure is next month. 他大约在下个月动身。

name: association
interpret: n.联盟，协会，社团；交往，联合；联想
example: 单词 association 的例句||||Our long association with your company has brought great benefits. 我方和贵公司的长期合作带来了巨大的利益。||||I broke away from the association ten years ago. 我10年前就脱离了那个团体。

name: discussion
interpret: n.讨论，谈论；论述
example: 单词 discussion 的例句||||It is certain he will come to the discussion. 他肯定会来参加讨论。||||After months of discussion, a peace agreement is gradually taking shape. 经过几个月的商讨，和平协议渐渐有了眉目。

name: duration
interpret: n.持久；期间；持续时间
example: 单词 duration 的例句||||For the duration of the strike we will remain closed. 罢工期间，我们将停业。||||He was prepared to do this for the duration of the campaign. 他准备好在选举期间做这件事。

name: classic
interpret: n.经典作品；adj.经典的，一流的；古典的
example: 单词 classic 的例句||||The novel is regarded as one of the classic works. 这篇小说被公认为是最优秀的作品之一。||||The football match was a classic. 那场足球比赛堪称典范。

name: strip
interpret: n.长条，条状；脱衣舞；vt.脱衣，剥夺；拆卸；去除(烟叶的茎)；vi. 脱去衣服
example: 单词 strip 的例句||||I need one more strip of cloth to finish this decoration. 我还要一根布条来完成这个装饰品。||||We had to strip the old paint from the doors. 我们只好把门上的旧漆刮掉。

name: democratic
interpret: adj.民主的；民主主义的，有民主精神的
example: 单词 democratic 的例句||||Their country has democratic government. 他们国家实行民主政体。||||He has a democratic work-style. 他作风民主。

name: destruction
interpret: n.破坏，毁灭，消灭
example: 单词 destruction 的例句||||The enemy bombs caused widespread destruction. 敌人的炸弹造成大面积的破坏。||||Overconfidence was his destruction. 自负是他垮台的原因。

name: exhaust
interpret: vt.使衰竭，使筋疲力尽；用尽，耗尽，用完
example: 单词 exhaust 的例句||||The climb will exhaust the boys. 爬山会使那些男孩们疲惫不堪的。||||It will exhaust the nation's oil reserves. 它会耗尽国家的石油储备。

name: housing
interpret: n.房屋，住宅；住房建筑；外壳，外罩
example: 单词 housing 的例句||||Do you think our housing sales will turn around during this year? 你认为今年我们的住宅销路会好转吗？||||The housing sales have been turning down since the summer. 入夏以来，房屋的销售量日趋减少。

name: enrollment
interpret: n.注册或登记的人数；登记
example: 单词 enrollment 的例句||||You will be given a reading list at enrollment. 注册时你会收到一份阅读书目。||||I just got the enrollment notice from Fudan University. 我刚刚接到复旦大学的入学通知书。

name: greenhouse
interpret: n.花房，温室，玻璃暖房
example: 单词 greenhouse 的例句||||Behind the green house was a greenhouse. 在那所绿房子后面是一个花房。||||The tomatoes were grown in the greenhouse. 这些西红柿是在温室栽培的。

name: furnish
interpret: vt.供应，提供，装备；布置，为...配备家具
example: 单词 furnish 的例句||||I will furnish all you need. 我愿供给你所需要的一切。||||No one in the class could furnish the right answer to the question. 班上没有一个人能给出问题的正确答案。

name: industrialize
interpret: vt.使工业化；vi.工业化
example: 单词 industrialize 的例句||||They wanted to industrialize their nation. 他们想使国家工业化。||||Africa needs to industrialize,to create both exports and jobs. 非洲需要工业化，增加出口和就业岗位。

name: inquire
interpret: vi.(of, about)询问，打听；调查，查问；vt.询问；查究；问明
example: 单词 inquire 的例句||||You can inquire of your new neighbors where the post office is. 你可以问问你的新邻居邮局在哪儿。||||He went to the hospital to inquire about her. 他到医院去打听她的情况。

name: nitrogen
interpret: n.[化]氮
example: 单词 nitrogen 的例句||||The atmosphere consist of more than 70% of nitrogen. 大气中含有70%以上的氮气。||||What is the percentage of nitrogen in air? 空气中所含的氮的比例是多少？

name: recommend
interpret: vt.推荐，介绍；劝告，建议；使成为可取，使受欢迎
example: 单词 recommend 的例句||||Can you recommend me a good book? 你能给我介绍一本好书吗？||||I can recommend this play to all lovers of good theatre. 我把这个剧推荐给所有爱好优秀戏剧的人。

name: minimum
interpret: adj.最低的，最小的；n.最小量，最低限度
example: 单词 minimum 的例句||||What is the minimum price? 最低价是多少？ ||||Today's minimum temperature is 10℃. 今天的最低气温是10℃。

name: residence
interpret: n.住处，住宅；居住，(合法)居住资格
example: 单词 residence 的例句||||They are only allowed one month's residence. 他们获准只逗留一个月。||||He took up residence in Australia. 他去澳大利亚居住。

name: protective
interpret: adj.防护的，保护的
example: 单词 protective 的例句||||A mother naturally feels protective towards her children. 做母亲的天生要保护自己的孩子。||||We feel safe with a protective device in the house. 我们因为家里有了防护装置而感到安全。

name: rifle
interpret: n.来复枪，步枪
example: 单词 rifle 的例句||||The soldiers keep a tight hold of the rifle. 战士们紧握手中的枪。||||They armed him with a rifle. 他们发给他一支步枪。

name: terminal
interpret: n.终端机，终点，末端；adj.终点的，按期的，致死的
example: 单词 terminal 的例句||||The car has reached its terminal speed and can run faster no longer. 这辆车的速度已达到了极限，不能再跑更快了。||||There's a taxi stand outside the terminal. 在终点站的外面有出租车。

name: vision
interpret: n.视觉，先见之明，光景，视力，眼力，幻想，影像；vt.幻想
example: 单词 vision 的例句||||The wall cuts across our line of vision. 那面墙挡住了我们的视线。||||Much reading has impaired his vision. 大量读书损害了他的视力。

name: stab
interpret: n.刺，戳，刺伤的伤口，剧痛，尝试；vt.刺伤，中伤；vi.刺，扎
example: 单词 stab 的例句||||I found a stab wound on his leg. 我在他的腿上发现一处刺伤。||||Can I stab at the meat with my knife to see if it is well cooked? 为了看看肉是否煮熟，我可以在肉上戳个洞吗？

name: submarine
interpret: n.潜水艇；adj.水底的，海底的；vt.用潜艇袭击；vi.滑入...底下
example: 单词 submarine 的例句||||Within a short time, everything on the submarine was buttoned up. 不一会儿，潜水艇内所有的东西都扣紧了。||||The submarine signaled for help. 潜水艇发出求救的信号。

name: closely
interpret: adv.紧密地；严密地，密切地
example: 单词 closely 的例句||||We shall follow closely the development of the situation. 我们将密切注意形势的发展。||||The two companies are closely tied up with each other. 这两家公司之间有密切联系。

name: breed
interpret: n.品种，种类；vi.繁殖，产仔；vt.养殖，产生，养育
example: 单词 breed 的例句||||The parents are trying to breed their son a musician. 这对父母尽力要把儿子培养成为音乐家。||||This breed of horses is both tall and heavily grown. 这种马既高且大。

name: depart
interpret: vi.离开，启程
example: 单词 depart 的例句||||The train will depart at 7:30 a. m. 早七点半发车。||||Before you depart, let me give you a word of advice. 在你走之前，我给你一句忠告。

name: diagram
interpret: n.图表，示意图；图解；vt.绘制…的示意图
example: 单词 diagram 的例句||||On the back of the letter was a diagram. 信的背面是张图表。||||The engineer drew a diagram of the bridge. 工程师绘制了一幅这座桥的示意图。

name: dramatic
interpret: adj.引人注目的；戏剧的；演戏的
example: 单词 dramatic 的例句||||She plays a very dramatic woman with flashing eyes. 她饰演一位双眼闪光的引人注目的妇人。||||His speech was dramatic. 他的演说激动人心。

name: exaggerate
interpret: vi.夸大，夸张;vt.使扩大；使增大
example: 单词 exaggerate 的例句||||If you exaggerate, people will no longer believe you. 如果你说话虚夸，人们便不会相信你了。||||Don't exaggerate the difficulties of your work. 别夸大你的工作困难。

name: filter
interpret: n.滤器，过滤嘴；vt.过滤，透过；vi.滤过；渗入；慢慢传开
example: 单词 filter 的例句||||Foreign influence began to filter into the country. 外国势力开始渗透进这个国家。||||Charcoal is used to filter water. 木炭是用来过滤水的。

name: frown
interpret: vi.皱眉，不满，用皱眉对…表示不满(at)；n.皱眉，蹙额
example: 单词 frown 的例句||||Don't frown at me like that. 不要那样对我皱眉。||||Her frown gave him a speechless message. 她眉头一皱给了他一个暗示。

name: headquarters
interpret: n.司令部，指挥部；总部，总店
example: 单词 headquarters 的例句||||Several great guns from the headquarters are coming to see us today. 总部的几个大人物今天要来看我们。||||The bank has its headquarters in Pairs. 这家银行的总行在巴黎。

name: impatiently
interpret: adv.不耐烦地
example: 单词 impatiently 的例句||||Impatiently he cut short what I was telling him. 他不耐烦地打断了我的话。||||The children wait impatiently for the vacation. 孩子们焦急地等待着假期的来临。

name: innocent
interpret: adj.无罪的，清白的；无害的；天真的，单纯的
example: 单词 innocent 的例句||||I'm not quite so innocent as to believe that. 我还不至于简单到相信那种事的地步。||||I was very young, and very innocent. 我那时非常年轻，幼稚无知。

name: receipt
interpret: n.收据，收条；收到，接到
example: 单词 receipt 的例句||||We are in receipt of your letter of the 10th. 我们收到了您十日的来函。|||| I asked for a receipt. 我要一张收据。

name: script
interpret: n.剧本，广播稿；文字体系；笔迹，手迹
example: 单词 script 的例句||||It's easy to identify his script. 他的笔迹容易辨认。||||The script is massaged into final form. 这篇稿子经过修改已定稿。

name: proof
interpret: adj.防...的，耐...的，能防护；n.校样，证据，证明；vt.检验，给...做防护措施
example: 单词 proof 的例句||||He is living proof of the wonders of modern medicine. 他是当代医学奇迹的活证明。||||The proof was fished up from some old papers. 校样在旧文件中被找到了。

name: roughly
interpret: adv.概略地，粗糙地，粗鲁地
example: 单词 roughly 的例句||||If you treat your coat so roughly, it will be worn out soon. 你如果这么糟蹋你的外套，它很快就不能穿了。||||The island is roughly circular in shape. 这个岛屿大致是圆形的。

name: shallow
interpret: adj.浅的，肤浅的，浅显易懂的；n.(pl.)浅滩，浅处；vi.变浅；vt.使变浅
example: 单词 shallow 的例句||||The dish is too shallow to serve soup in. 盘子太浅，盛不了汤。||||His analysis was always shallow. 他的分析总是很肤浅的。

name: short-term
interpret: adj.短期的
example: 单词 short-term 的例句||||The short-term training class has been run three times. 短训班办了三期。||||For this they are running short-term courses and evening classes. 为此，他们办了短训班和夜校。

name: belly
interpret: n.肚子，腹部；(像肚子一样)鼓起的部分，膛
example: 单词 belly 的例句||||The boss has a large belly. 老板大腹便便。||||His eyes are bigger than his belly. 他眼馋肚饱。

name: vary
interpret: vi.变化，有不同；vt.改变，使不同
example: 单词 vary 的例句||||Cherries vary in colour from almost black to yellow. 樱桃的颜色由近乎黑到黄各不相同。||||Old people don't like to vary their habits. 老年人不喜欢改变他们的习惯。

name: sportsman
interpret: n.运动员
example: 单词 sportsman 的例句||||His brother is a sportsman of our school. 他弟弟是我校的运动员。||||Everybody thinks he is an all-round sportsman. 大家认为他是一个全能运动员。

name: sack
interpret: n.袋子，劫掠；vt.解雇，劫掠，把...装入袋子
example: 单词 sack 的例句||||They made him pay for his offence by giving him the sack. 他们解雇了他，从而使他因自己的过错而受到了惩罚。||||If you're late again tomorrow,you'll get the sack! 如果你明天再迟到，那就卷铺盖走吧!

name: rake
interpret: n.耙；斜度；vi.耙；核查；vt.耙；扫射
example: 单词 rake 的例句||||In the autumn I rake up the dead leaves. 秋天我把落叶耙拢。||||Rake up the trash on the ground. 把地上的废料耙在一起。

name: missile
interpret: n.导弹，投射物
example: 单词 missile 的例句||||The missile curved gracefully towards its target. 导弹呈优美的曲线状飞向目标。||||We got a fix on the missile launching site. 我们确定了导弹发射场的位置。

name: whip
interpret: n.鞭子，鞭打，奶油甜食，车夫，组织秘书；vt.抽出，鞭打，捆扎，搅拌，打败；vi.突然移动，飘浮
example: 单词 whip 的例句||||The cruel man lashed the horse with his whip. 那个粗暴的人用鞭子抽马。||||The cruel master beat his slaves with a whip. 残酷的主人鞭打他的奴隶。

name: cube
interpret: n.立方体，立方形；立方；vt.使自乘两次
example: 单词 cube 的例句||||The cube of 3 is 27. 3的立方是27。||||A cube has six sides. 立方体有6个面。

name: cock
interpret: n.公鸡，雄鸟；旋塞，开关
example: 单词 cock 的例句||||The cock is crowing. 这只公鸡正在啼鸣。||||The cloud was in the shape of a cock. 那云成公鸡形。

name: peep
interpret: n.瞥见，偷看，初现；vi.窥视，慢慢露出，吱吱叫；vt.使出现
example: 单词 peep 的例句||||I took a peep through the keyhole. 我从钥匙孔偷看了一眼。||||Let me have just one peep at the letter. 让我瞥一眼这封信。

name: rack
interpret: n.挂架，搁架；vt.折磨；使紧张，使努力
example: 单词 rack 的例句||||He went over and took his jacket from the coat rack. 他走到衣架上取外套。||||The old house soon went to rack and ruin. 这所旧房子很快就毁坏了。

name: robe
interpret: n.长袍，长衣，浴衣
example: 单词 robe 的例句||||She was sitting at her mirror in a robe. 她穿着长裙坐在镜子前。||||She put her robe on the chair. 她把睡袍搭在椅子上。

name: rod
interpret: n.钓竿，杆，棒
example: 单词 rod 的例句||||Pass me a bamboo rod. 递给我一根竹竿。||||He heated the iron rod and bent it into a right angle. 他将铁棒烧热，将其弯成直角。

name: navy
interpret: n.海军，海军人员，海军军力，藏青色
example: 单词 navy 的例句||||My brother is in the navy. 我兄弟在海军服役。||||He has transferred from the army to the navy. 他从陆军转到海军。

name: tractor
interpret: n.拖拉机，牵引车
example: 单词 tractor 的例句||||You must oil the tractor every day. 你必须每天给拖拉机加油。||||He has a tractor. 他有一台拖拉机。

name: booth
interpret: n.小房间，公用电话亭，岗亭；货摊
example: 单词 booth 的例句||||Where can I find a telephone booth? 我在哪儿可以找到电话亭？||||Let's walk around to each booth. 我们到每个摊子转一转吧！

name: postage
interpret: n.邮费，邮资
example: 单词 postage 的例句||||This dictionary is 100 yuan, postage included. 这本词典连邮费共100元。||||All letters must be stamped with the correct postage. 任何信件都应该按所需邮资贴邮票。

name: inn
interpret: n.小旅馆，客栈；小酒店，小饭店
example: 单词 inn 的例句||||I shall lodge at the inn for two nights. 我要在这家小店住两个晚上。||||We stayed in a small village inn, right off the map. 我们住在一家偏僻的乡村小店里。

name: handy
interpret: adj.方便的；手边的，近便的；手巧的
example: 单词 handy 的例句||||A few more traveler's checks may come in handy on holiday. 多带几张旅行支票，度假时会有用的。||||She is a handy girl who can turn her hand to anything. 她是个心灵手巧的姑娘。

name: naked
interpret: adj.裸露的；赤裸裸的，无遮蔽的
example: 单词 naked 的例句||||To the east of our school, there's a naked hillside. 我们学校东边有片光秃秃的山坡。||||The children stripped off their clothes and swam naked in the river. 孩子们脱得光溜溜的在河里游泳。

name: bundle
interpret: n.捆，包，束；一堆，一批；vt.把…扎成一捆；vi.匆忙离开
example: 单词 bundle 的例句||||My uncle sent me a large bundle on my birthday. 我生日时叔父给我寄来一个大包裹。||||Dad found a bundle of spelling mistakes in my composition. 爸爸在我作文里找出一大堆拼写错误。

name: shiver
interpret: vi.战栗，发抖；n.战栗，发抖
example: 单词 shiver 的例句||||A sudden gust of cold wind made me shiver. 一股突然刮来的冷风吹得我打哆嗦。||||It kept him in a cold shiver all the time. 这些话让他不停地打寒噤。

name: swift
interpret: n.雨燕，大滚筒；adj.迅速的，快的，敏捷的，立刻的；adv.迅速地，敏捷地
example: 单词 swift 的例句||||He is swift to hear, but slow to speak. 他听力敏锐，但不善言辞。||||He made a remarkably swift recovery. 他康复得相当快。

name: semester
interpret: n.一学期，半学年，六个月的时间
example: 单词 semester 的例句||||A student will probably attend four or five courses during each semester. 每个学生一学期可能要修四五门课程。||||I had an especially rough time during my first semester. 我第一个学期的日子难受极了。

name: old-fashioned
interpret: adj.旧式的，保守的，挑剔的
example: 单词 old-fashioned 的例句||||Why do you still dress in an old-fashioned mode? 你为什么还穿款式陈旧的衣服？||||Here is an old-fashioned pump for drawing water from a well. 这里有一个旧式水泵可从井里抽水。

name: gaze
interpret: vi.凝视，盯，注视；n.凝视
example: 单词 gaze 的例句||||Her cheeks grew hot beneath the gaze of so many eyes. 在众目睽睽之下，她的脸红了。||||He fixed his gaze on her. 他凝视着她。

name: female
interpret: adj.雌的，女(性)的；n.雌性的动物，女子
example: 单词 female 的例句||||We only employ female workers. 我们只雇用女工。||||The animal in the picture was a female elephant. 照片上的动物是头母象。

name: combination
interpret: n.组合，合并，联合；
example: 单词 combination 的例句||||He carried on the business in combination with his friends. 他与朋友们合伙做生意。||||The materials can be used singly or in combination. 这些材料可以单独使用也可以混合用。

name: enthusiasm
interpret: n.热情，激情；巨大兴趣；热衷的事物
example: 单词 enthusiasm 的例句||||We set about our task at once with great enthusiasm. 我们立刻兴致勃勃地干起来。||||A team which is full of enthusiasm is more likely to win. 情绪高涨的球队更可能获胜。

name: crucial
interpret: adj.极重要的，决定性的，关键性的
example: 单词 crucial 的例句||||It's a crucial decision. 这是一个极其重要的决定。||||The foreign market was increasingly crucial. 国外市场越来越重要了。

name: commitment
interpret: n.奉献，忠诚，辛劳，委托，实行，承担义务，赞助
example: 单词 commitment 的例句||||The builder had a commitment to finish the work on time. 那个承建商答应过准时完工。||||He made a commitment to pay the rent on time. 他保证按时付房租。

name: strategy
interpret: n.方法，策略，战略
example: 单词 strategy 的例句||||The only way to take the enemy position is by strategy,not by forceful attack. 只可智取，不可强攻。||||Tactics differs from strategy. 战术有别于战略。

name: artificial
interpret: adj.人工的，人造的，人为的；做作的，假装的
example: 单词 artificial 的例句||||The new dam will form a large artificial lake behind it. 新筑的水坝将会在后面形成一个人工湖。||||We don't use any artificial flavourings in our products. 我们的产品不使用任何人工调味剂。

name: convince
interpret: vt.使确认，使信服；使认识错误
example: 单词 convince 的例句||||It requires a lot of talking to convince him. 要说服他很费口舌。||||I have given over trying to convince him. 我已经不再试图说服他了。

name: authority
interpret: n.当局，官方；权力，权威，威信；当权者
example: 单词 authority 的例句||||He is recognized internationally as an authority in this field. 国际上承认他是这方面的一个权威。||||Professor White is looked upon as an authority on mathematics. 怀特教授被看成数学权威。

name: reveal
interpret: vt.揭露，泄露；展现，显示
example: 单词 reveal 的例句||||The journalist did not want to reveal the identity of his informant. 那个新闻工作者不想透露消息提供人的身份。||||Differences will help to reveal the functions of the genes. 它们间的差异将会帮助我们揭开基因多种功能。

name: sprinkle
interpret: vt.撒，洒；vi. 洒，撒；下稀疏小雨；喷撒；n.少量，少数
example: 单词 sprinkle 的例句||||Sprinkle sugar evenly over the top of the cake. 把糖均匀地撒在蛋糕上。||||Sprinkle some water before you sweep. 先泼点儿水再扫。

name: significant
interpret: adj.相当数量的；意义重大的；意味深长的
example: 单词 significant 的例句||||Your success today may be significant for your whole future. 你今天的成功对你的整个未来可能是重要的。||||She cast him a significant smile. 她向他投去意味深长的一笑。

name: mislead
interpret: vt.误导，使产生错误印象，欺骗，使误入歧途
example: 单词 mislead 的例句||||Don't let his friendly words mislead you. 别让他那友好的言词把你蒙混住。||||I understand, sir. You didn't willfully mislead the police. 我了解，先生。你并非有意误导警察。

name: anniversary
interpret: n.周年(纪念日)
example: 单词 anniversary 的例句||||They celebrate their wedding anniversary annually. 他们每年庆祝一番结婚纪念日。||||Today is my parents' 30th wedding anniversary. 今天是我父母结婚30周年纪念日。

name: highlight
interpret: n.加亮区；vt.加亮，强调；[计算机]醒目
example: 单词 highlight 的例句||||Her performance was the highlight of the show. 她的表演是那场演出中最精彩的部分。||||The highlight of this term is the school trip to Austria. 这学期最重要的活动就是去奥地利的校外旅行。

name: discard
interpret: vt.丢弃，抛弃，遗弃
example: 单词 discard 的例句||||We should discard old beliefs. 我们应该抛弃旧观念。||||We will discard the old books. 我们将不再使用这些旧书。

name: pierce
interpret: n.皮尔斯；vt.刺穿，穿透，洞悉vi.进入；透入
example: 单词 pierce 的例句||||We use the machine to pierce holes in the steel sheet. 我们用机器在钢板上打洞。||||Any sights could pierce them. 任何景色都会刺激他们。

name: exclaim
interpret: vi.(由于惊讶、痛苦、愤怒、高兴等而)叫嚷；vt.大声说出
example: 单词 exclaim 的例句||||A closer look, you might exclaim that she is half-breed! 再仔细看看，或许你会惊叹原来她是混血儿! ||||I can not help but exclaim, how terrible figures! 我不禁惊叹，多么可怕的数字！

name: goodness
interpret: n.善良，善行，美德
example: 单词 goodness 的例句||||Would you have the goodness to turn off the radio? 劳驾，请你把收音机关上好不好？||||Thank goodness, we've found a cure for the disease. 好了，这病有救了!！

name: invisible
interpret: adj.看不见的，无形的
example: 单词 invisible 的例句||||The air is full of millions of invisible germs. 空气中充满了许多看不见的细菌。||||Many stars are invisible without a telescope. 许多星辰不用望远镜便看不见。

name: manufacture
interpret: n.产品，制造，制造业；vt.制造，加工；vi.参与制造
example: 单词 manufacture 的例句||||The equipment is of our own manufacture. 这设备是我们自己制造的。||||Plastic is an important manufacture. 塑料是种重要产品。

name: licence
interpret: n.证书；许可证，执照；vt.许可；批准
example: 单词 licence 的例句||||The restaurant applied for a licence to sell wine. 那家餐厅申请售酒许可证。||||He hadn't paid his television licence fee. 他尚未缴纳电视机使用许可费。

name: monthly
interpret: adj.每月的，持续一个月的，每月发生的；adv.每月，按月； n.月刊；(复数）monthlies:月经
example: 单词 monthly 的例句||||The rent on his apartment was his biggest monthly expense. 他的房租是每个月最大的开支。||||The monthly rent is $15, inclusive of light and water. 每月租金15美元，包括水电费在内。

name: peninsula
interpret: n.半岛
example: 单词 peninsula 的例句||||Dalian is in the south of the Liaodong Peninsula. 大连位于辽东半岛南部。||||Korean peninsula lies to the west of Japan. 朝鲜半岛在日本以西。

name: perfume
interpret: n.香水(料，气)；vt.使充满芳香；洒香水
example: 单词 perfume 的例句||||The air was heavy with the perfume of the flower. 空气中充满了花香。||||Those roses perfume the whole garden. 那些玫瑰花使满园飘香。

name: sake
interpret: n.缘故，理由
example: 单词 sake 的例句||||He loves poetry for beauty's sake. 他因为爱美而喜欢诗歌。||||We can't risk big things for the sake of small ones. 我们不能因小失大。

name: region
interpret: n.地区，地带，区域；范围，幅度
example: 单词 region 的例句||||The students went to study the geology of that region. 学生们去研究那个地区的地质情况。||||It is unusual to see snow in this region. 这个地区难得见到雪。

name: release
interpret: vt.发布，发表，发行；释放，放开；n.释放；发布；让与
example: 单词 release 的例句||||After my examination I had a feeling of release. 考完试后我有如释重负之感。||||This medicine will give you release from pain. 这药吃后会解除你的疼痛。

name: sensible
interpret: adj.可察觉的，意识到的，实用的；n.可感知物
example: 单词 sensible 的例句||||Are you sensible of the dangers of your position? 你觉察到你处境中的危险了吗？||||He was sensible enough to mind his own business. 他颇有见识，不去管闲事。

name: pronoun
interpret: n.代词
example: 单词 pronoun 的例句||||The relative pronoun is often dropped if it is the subject. 关系代名词做受词时常被省略。||||Here you should use plural pronoun. 这里你应该用复数代词。

name: slam
interpret: vt.&vi.猛力地推、放或扔；砰地关上；n.猛击；砰然声
example: 单词 slam 的例句||||They were surprised by the slam of a car door. 关汽车门时发出的声音使他们很吃惊。||||Why should you slam the window? 你干吗要使劲关窗户呢？

name: vanish
interpret: vi.突然不见，消失；不复存在，绝迹
example: 单词 vanish 的例句||||With a wave of his hand, the magician made the rabbit vanish. 魔术师手一挥兔子便不见了。||||All your troubles will vanish away when he returns safely. 他平安回来后，你就无忧无虑了。

name: works
interpret: n.作品，著作；工厂，活动部件，机件
example: 单词 works 的例句||||We expect writers to produce more and better works. 我们期望作家们写出更多更好的作品。||||The novel is regarded as one of the classic works. 这篇小说被公认为是最优秀的作品之一。

name: jail
interpret: n.监狱，看守所；vt.监禁，拘留
example: 单词 jail 的例句||||The castle had been used as a jail. 这城堡曾用作监狱。||||If she carries on shoplifting, she'll end up in jail. 她如果还在店铺里偷东西，最终会被抓进监狱的。

name: capture
interpret: vt.捕获，俘获；占领，夺得；n.抓住，捕获
example: 单词 capture 的例句||||The company is out to capture the European market. 这家公司希望占据欧洲市场。||||With the capture of the escaped tiger, everyone felt relieved. 逃出来的老虎被捕获后，大家都松了一口气。

name: banquet
interpret: n.宴会，盛会，酒席
example: 单词 banquet 的例句||||We had a banquet, which ended up with soup. 我们举行了一个宴会，最后一道菜是汤。||||He is in the person of his father for the banquet. 他以他父亲的名义赴宴。

name: beggar
interpret: n.乞丐，穷人，募捐者
example: 单词 beggar 的例句||||The beggar begged from the rich but they refused. 那个乞丐向富人们乞讨，但遭到了拒绝。||||He is so rich but lives like a beggar. 他非常有钱可是生活得象个乞丐。

name: impressive
interpret: adj.给人深刻印象的，感人的
example: 单词 impressive 的例句||||This cinema is so impressive that we can't help crying. 这影片如此感人以至我们禁不住流下泪来。||||The suit made him look especially impressive. 他穿上这套衣服真精神。

name: crystal
interpret: n.水晶，水晶饰品，结晶体；最好的玻璃器皿；adj.水晶的；透明的，清澈的
example: 单词 crystal 的例句||||It used to be a crystal stream. 那曾是条清澈见底的小溪。||||Those fine wine glasses are made of crystal. 那些漂亮的酒杯是用水晶做的。

name: delete
interpret: vt.删除文字，擦去(字迹)
example: 单词 delete 的例句||||If you delete 50 words,we can put the whole story on one page. 如果你删掉50个字，我们可以把整篇报道安排在一个版面上。||||I selected a file and pressed the Delete key. 我选定了一个文件，按下了删除键。

name: millimeter
interpret: n.毫米
example: 单词 millimeter 的例句||||A millimeter is one-thousandth of a meter. 一毫米是一米的千分之一。||||The product is only 0. 1 millimeter thick. 玻璃盖片的厚度仅0. 1毫米左右。

name: compound
interpret: n.化合物；大院；adj.化合的；vt.加重；使化合
example: 单词 compound 的例句||||Air is a mixture, not a compound of gases. 空气是气体的混合物，不是化合物。||||How many households in the compound? 院内有几家住户？

name: compromise
interpret: n.妥协；妥协方案；vt.损害；vi.妥协，让步
example: 单词 compromise 的例句||||The spokesman made it clear that no compromise was yet in sight. 发言人表明，目前还不会妥协。||||The probable outcome of the talks is a compromise. 会谈的结果很可能是妥协。

name: division
interpret: n.区分，分开，除法，公司，部门，师(军队里)
example: 单词 division 的例句||||Have you learnt division? 你学会除法了吗？||||The division commander ordered that we start the attack before dawn. 师长令我们在拂晓前发起攻击。

name: dying
interpret: adj.垂死的，临终的
example: 单词 dying 的例句||||He was put in charge of the group by the dying leader. 他被临终的领导人任命为集团负责人。||||She was shown into a small room, where there was a dying man. 她被领进了一间小屋子，那里有一个垂死的人。

name: stoop
interpret: n.佝偻，屈服；vi.弯下，弯下上身，屈服；vt.辱没，堕落；俯曲
example: 单词 stoop 的例句||||It pains me to stoop down. 痛得我蹲下来。||||He has to stoop to get through the tunnel. 他得弯下腰走过地道。

name: infer
interpret: vt.推论，推断；猜想
example: 单词 infer 的例句||||People usually infer an unknown fact from a known fact. 人们通常从已知的事实中推断未知的事实。||||From your smile I infer that you're pleased. 从你的笑容，我断定你很高兴。

name: internal
interpret: adj.内的，内部的；国内的，内政的
example: 单词 internal 的例句||||He is talking to Tom on the internal telephone. 他正在内线电话上与汤姆交谈。||||We do not intend to be drawn into the internal strife. 我们不想卷入内乱之中。

name: heating
interpret: n.加热，供暖，暖气装置；adj.加热的，供暖的
example: 单词 heating 的例句||||They will install a heating and lighting system in our house. 他们将在我们家装上供热供电系统。||||If the pressure is too low,the heating system will act up. 如果压力太低，供暖系统就会出毛病。

name: learning
interpret: n.学问，学识，学习；动词learn的现在分词
example: 单词 learning 的例句||||When you are learning to ride a bicycle, you often fall off. 初学骑自行车时，常会从车上掉下来。||||Learning languages isn't just a matter of remembering words. 学习语言不仅仅是记些单词的事。

name: saving
interpret: n.节省，节约；[pl.]储蓄金，存款；adj.节约的；挽救的；补偿的；保留的
example: 单词 saving 的例句||||Energy saving is term strategic policy of our country. 节约能源是我国长期的战略国策。||||Old-fashioned housewives were usually very saving. 旧时的家庭主妇通常都很节俭。

name: teaching
interpret: n.教学，执教，任教，讲授；(复数)教诲
example: 单词 teaching 的例句||||We all agree in adopting the new teaching method. 我们一致同意采取新的教学方法。||||He created a new system of teaching foreign languages. 他创造了一种新的外语教学体系。

name: version
interpret: n.版本；型号；叙述，说法
example: 单词 version 的例句||||His version of the events is pure supposition. 他对这件事的说法纯属猜测。||||What is your version of this matter? 你对这件事情的看法 怎么样？

name: lest
interpret: conj.唯恐，以免
example: 单词 lest 的例句||||Let me put down your telephone number lest I forget it. 让我先记下你的电话号码，以免忘了。||||Be careful lest you fall from that tree. 要当心，以免从树上摔下来。

name: dose
interpret: n.(药的)剂量，一服；vt.给(药)；(给…)服药；vi.服药
example: 单词 dose 的例句||||In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation. 在那次事故中，工人受到大剂量的辐射。||||He gave me a dose of medicine for my cold. 他给我开了一剂治感冒的药。

name: imaginary
interpret: adj.想象中的，假想的，虚构的，幻想的；虚数的
example: 单词 imaginary 的例句||||All the characters in this book are imaginary. 此书中的所有人物都是虚构的。||||The boy's fears were only imaginary. 这小孩的恐惧只是一种想象。

name: deck
interpret: n.甲板；公共汽车一层的车厢；纸牌；vt.装饰
example: 单词 deck 的例句||||Let's have a walk round the deck. 我们去甲板上散步吧。||||The sea wind swept over the deck. 海风席卷过甲板。

name: rural
interpret: adj.乡下的，田园的，乡村风味的
example: 单词 rural 的例句||||He lived a rural life. 他过着田园生活。||||We left the city for a rural home. 我们离开城市，去农村安家。

name: footstep
interpret: n.脚步；脚步声；足迹
example: 单词 footstep 的例句||||I listened for a footstep. 我留心听着脚步声。||||I knew he had return, when I heard his footstep. 听脚步声就知道他回来了。

name: finding
interpret: n.发现，发现物；调查的结果
example: 单词 finding 的例句||||The finding makes some sense. 该发现具有一定的意义。||||That's an encouraging finding. 这是一个鼓舞人心的发现。

name: conjunction
interpret: n.联合，连接，接合；连接词
example: 单词 conjunction 的例句||||Two or more sentences may be joined together by a conjunction. 两个或两个以上的句子可以用连词连接。||||The conjunction of heavy rains and high winds caused flooding. 暴风雨的同时发生引起了洪水泛滥。

name: offend
interpret: vt.犯错误；违犯；犯罪vi.违反；进攻；引起不舒服
example: 单词 offend 的例句||||He took care never to offend his visitors. 他小心谨慎，绝不得罪他的访客。||||I think I never offend you. 我想我从没有触犯过你。

name: specifically
interpret: adv.明确地，具体地；特别地，特意
example: 单词 specifically 的例句||||The book was written specifically for children. 这本书是特地为儿童编写的。||||I told you specifically not to do that. 我明确地告诉你不要那样做。

name: circumstance
interpret: n.情况，形势，环境；境况，境遇
example: 单词 circumstance 的例句||||You should soon accommodate yourself to the new circumstance. 你应尽快适应新环境。||||There is one important circumstance you have not mentioned. 还有一件重要的细节你没提到。

name: Christ
interpret: n.基督，救世主，耶稣
example: 单词 Christ 的例句||||I regarded him as the Christ. 我把他当作救世主。||||Christ preached that we should love each other. 基督在布道中说人们应该互爱。

name: extension
interpret: n.伸长，扩大，伸展；延长，延期；延长部分，扩大部分；电话分机
example: 单词 extension 的例句||||The pupils disliked the extension of the term. 小学生们不愿延长学期。||||Our extension is nearly finished. 我们的扩建部分已接近完工。

name: operator
interpret: n.（机器、设备等的）操作员；电话接线员
example: 单词 operator 的例句||||He is a computer operator. 他是个电脑操作员。||||The telephone operator connected us. 话务员给我们接通了电话。

name: dialog
interpret: n.对话，对白( dialogue的变体)；v.对话; 用对话表达;
example: 单词 dialog 的例句||||At last there can be a reasonable dialog between our two governments. 我们两国最后终于能理智地进行对话了。||||Dialog with them. 与他们对话。

name: prediction
interpret: n.预言；预测
example: 单词 prediction 的例句||||This great prediction is coming true. 这一伟大的预言即将成为事实。||||Weather prediction has never been a perfect science. 天气预报从来都不是完美的科学。

name: reservation
interpret: n.保留条件，限制条件；预订座位
example: 单词 reservation 的例句||||The instruction should be carried out without any reservation. 应当不折不扣地执行这个指示。||||I accept your statement without reservation. 我完全相信你的话。

name: device
interpret: n.器械，装置；计划，策略，诡计
example: 单词 device 的例句||||The device will be in production by the end of the year. 该装置将于年底投入生产。||||The device will save much time and effort for us. 这种装置会使我们节省大量时间和气力。

name: launch
interpret: vt.发动，推出；发射；vi.开始；下水；起飞；n.发射，下水，投产
example: 单词 launch 的例句||||The makers are about to launch out a new product. 制造商们马上要生产一种新产品。||||Would it be wise to launch into this rough sea? 在这样汹涌的大海中游泳明智吗？

name: learned
interpret: adj.有学问的，博学的；learn的过去式和过去分词
example: 单词 learned 的例句||||He went into a rage when he learned about it. 他听到这事后勃然大怒。||||In this little village, he passed for a learned man. 在这个小村子里，他被视为有学问的人。

name: dismiss
interpret: vt.解雇，开除；把（某人）打发走；解散；vi.解散
example: 单词 dismiss 的例句||||The committee has decided to dismiss him. 委员会已决定辞退他。||||Please dismiss all doubts about it. 请打消对此事的一切顾虑。

name: philosopher
interpret: n.哲学家，哲人
example: 单词 philosopher 的例句||||The philosopher has his ideas built on the rock of reason. 那位哲学家把思想建立于理性之上。||||What a philosopher seeks after is truth. 一个哲学家所追求的是真理。

name: slap
interpret: n.掴，侮辱，拍击声；vt.拍击，侮辱，惩罚，申斥；adv.正面地，直接地，突然地
example: 单词 slap 的例句||||He sent the horse forward with a slap on its rump. 他拍了一下马尾，马便向前跑去。||||He gave her a slap on the cheek. 他打了她一耳光。

name: frequency
interpret: n.次数，频率；经常发生，频繁
example: 单词 frequency 的例句||||If we can know their frequency we will monitor their talking. 如果我们知道他们的频率，我们就能监听他们的谈话。||||The tanks broke down with increasing frequency. 坦克越来越频繁地熄火。

name: magnetic
interpret: adj.磁的，有磁性的；有吸引力的，有魅力的
example: 单词 magnetic 的例句||||If we charge it with electricity, it will become magnetic. 如果充上电，它就会带有磁性。||||I have a magnetic disc. 我有一张磁盘。

name: shift
interpret: n.交换，变化，移动，接班者；vt.更替，移转，变声；vi.改变，定责，更衣
example: 单词 shift 的例句||||Lend me a hand to shift this box, will you? 来帮一下忙，把这箱子搬开，好吗？||||A sudden shift in the wind warned of the coming storm. 风向的突然改变预示暴风雨来临。

name: journal
interpret: n.日志，日记；议事录；日记帐；杂志，定期刊物
example: 单词 journal 的例句||||He kept a journal during his visit to Japan. 他在访问日本期间坚持记日记。||||He got a job as editor of a trade journal. 他找到了一份当商业杂志编辑的工作。

name: divorce
interpret: n.离婚；分离；vi.离婚；vt.离婚；脱离
example: 单词 divorce 的例句||||Did he divorce his wife or did she divorce him? 是他要和妻子离婚，还是妻子要和他离婚？||||None of us like the divorce of word and deed. 我们都不喜欢言行不一。

name: payment
interpret: n.付款，支付，偿还，偿还，报应
example: 单词 payment 的例句||||I gave ten pounds in payment for the goods I bought. 我买那些东西付了10英镑。||||This last payment will wipe out your debt to me. 这最后一笔付款将了结你欠我的债务。

name: relativity
interpret: n.爱因斯坦的相对论；相关性，相对性
example: 单词 relativity 的例句||||Finally they accepted Einstein's relativity. 他们终于接受了爱因斯坦的相对论。||||There is no relativity between the two matters. 这两件事毫无关系。

name: interruption
interpret: n.打扰；干扰；中止；阻碍
example: 单词 interruption 的例句||||Never mind the interruption; proceed with your story. 不要理睬别人的插话，继续讲你的故事。||||The day passed by without further interruption. 这一天过去了，没有再发生什么意外的事。

name: motion
interpret: n.打手势，示意，移动，动作，提议，大便；v.运动，向...打手势，示意
example: 单词 motion 的例句||||She could feel the rolling motion of the ship under her feet. 她能感觉到脚下船在晃动。||||Don't open the door while the train is in motion. 列车运行时，请勿打开车门。

name: unexpected
interpret: adj.想不到的，意外的
example: 单词 unexpected 的例句||||I always keep some good wine in for unexpected guests. 我总保存些好酒，用来招待不速之客。||||His promotion was unexpected. 他的升迁出人意料。

name: identical
interpret: adj.完全一样的，完全相同的；同一的
example: 单词 identical 的例句||||She wore the identical dress on both occasions. 她在两种场合穿的是同一件衣服。||||He is identical in character with his wife. 他的品性和他的夫人相同。

name: immigrant
interpret: adj.(从国外)移来的，移民的；n.移民，侨民
