example: 单词 immigrant 的例句||||Life in the USA was very hard for almost every new immigrant. 美国的生活几乎对每一个新移民都很艰难。||||I'd like to obtain some information about applying for an immigrant visa. 我想取一些申请移民签证的资料。

name: tolerate
interpret: vt.忍受，容忍，容许，宽恕；
example: 单词 tolerate 的例句||||She can tolerate that rude fellow. 她能容忍那个粗鲁的家伙。||||The teacher cannot tolerate eating on the class. 老师不容许在课堂上吃东西。

name: abundant
interpret: adj.丰富的，充足的，大量的，多的
example: 单词 abundant 的例句||||Shandong province is famous for its abundant agricultural resources. 山东省以其丰富的农业资源而闻名遐迩。||||China is abundant with natural resources. 中国自然资源丰富。

name: adequate
interpret: adj.充足的，足够的；适当的，胜任的
example: 单词 adequate 的例句||||Though a bit too old, he is still adequate to the work. 虽然他年纪大了点，却仍能胜任这项工作。||||I hope you will prove adequate to the job. 我希望你证明能胜任这项工作。

name: affection
interpret: n.喜爱；爱慕，感情；倾向，意向
example: 单词 affection 的例句||||The handsome young man excited affection in a girl. 那位英俊的年轻男子引起了一个女孩的爱慕之情。||||He has a deep affection for his old friend. 他对老朋友感情很深。

name: approval
interpret: n.赞成，同意；批准，认可
example: 单词 approval 的例句||||The audience has expressed its approval. 观众已经认可。||||The teacher signed his approval. 老师做了手势表示同意。

name: assistance
interpret: n.援助，帮助
example: 单词 assistance 的例句||||She called and called but no one came to her assistance. 她叫了又叫，但没有人来帮。||||He will get the great possible assistance. 他将获得尽可能大的帮助。

name: bound
interpret: adj.一定的，必然的；受约束的，有义务的
example: 单词 bound 的例句||||I feel honor bound to repay the money I borrowed. 我觉得有责任归还我借的钱。|||| If he signs that paper, he will be bound hand and foot. 如果他签署那份文件，他就会受到束缚。

name: dimension
interpret: n.尺寸，长(或宽、深、厚)度；大小，程度
example: 单词 dimension 的例句||||A third dimension has been recently added, that of service. 最近又提出了第三方面的需求，即服务的需要。||||Length is one dimension, and breadth is another. 长是一种度量，宽又是另一种度量。

name: distribution
interpret: n.运送；分发，分配；分布，分布状态
example: 单词 distribution 的例句||||The conference discussed the fair distribution of income and wealth. 会议讨论了公平分配收入和财富的问题。||||Unequal distribution of wealth may cause division in society. 财富分配不均会引起社会分裂。

name: upward
interpret: adj.向上的，上升的；adv.向上，上升
example: 单词 upward 的例句||||The birds flew upward. 鸟儿向上飞去。||||Prices have an upward tendency. 价格有上升的趋势。

name: assign
interpret: vt.派，指派；分配，分派；指定或选定
example: 单词 assign 的例句||||It is possible to assign an exact date to this building. 这座建筑物的确切年代是可以确定的。||||It's difficult to assign any reason for the failure. 失败的原因很难确定。

name: woollen
interpret: adj.羊毛制的；毛线的
example: 单词 woollen 的例句||||He wore a woollen vest beneath his shirt. 他衬衫里面穿着一件羊毛背心。||||She wear a woollen scarf. 她围着一条羊毛围巾。

name: comrade
interpret: n.同志，同事，同伴，朋友
example: 单词 comrade 的例句||||We can't remain indifferent when any comrade is in difficulty. 同志们有困难我们不能不闻不问。||||Whenever a comrade needs help,he is ready to give it. 但凡同志们有困难，他没有不热情帮助的。

name: contemporary
interpret: n.同时代的人；adj.同时代的，同时，属于同一时期的
example: 单词 contemporary 的例句||||Dickens was contemporary with Thackeray. 狄更斯与萨克莱属于同一时代。||||She is very much alive to contemporary issues. 她对当代的问题十分注意。

name: injection
interpret: n.注射，注入；注射液
example: 单词 injection 的例句||||Those drugs are given by injection as well as through the mouth. 那些药品可以注射，也可以口服。||||She pressed the patient a bit too hard when she gave him an injection. 她打针时手重了些。

name: spoil
interpret: n.战利品，赃物，奖品，掠夺，次品；vt.损坏，破坏，溺爱；vi.腐坏，掠夺
example: 单词 spoil 的例句||||Don't bunch the flowers up so tightly, you'll spoil them. 别把花束得这么紧，会弄坏的。||||Overacting will only spoil the effect. 表演过火，效果反而不好。

name: canoe
interpret: n.独木舟；vi.乘独木舟，划独木舟
example: 单词 canoe 的例句||||They slid the canoe down to the water. 他们使小舟滑到水中。||||It is only the second time he has been in a canoe. 这仅是他第二次乘小游艇。

name: so-called
interpret: adj.所谓的，号称的
example: 单词 so-called 的例句||||These were the so-called mainframe machines. 它们被称为主机。||||Let's see what this so-called button does. 让我们来看看为什么这个按钮叫这个名字。

name: mainland
interpret: n.大陆，本土
example: 单词 mainland 的例句||||The new bridge will link the island to the mainland. 新的桥梁将把该岛与大陆连接在一起。||||Hong Kong's prosperity relies heavily on mainland. 香港的繁荣在很大程度上依赖于大陆。

name: amaze
interpret: vt.使惊奇，使惊愕；n.吃惊，好奇
example: 单词 amaze 的例句||||He stood in amaze at the sight. 他看到那种景象，惊愕得呆呆地站在那里。||||You will soon amaze the world with your brilliant feat. 你会一鸣惊人的。

name: telegraph
interpret: n.电报，电报机；vt.打电报，显示；vi.打电报
example: 单词 telegraph 的例句||||A new telegraph line has been set up between the two cities. 那两个城市之间架设了一条新的电报线。||||Telegraph communication was broken off. 电讯中断了。

name: drought
interpret: n.旱灾，干旱，久旱
example: 单词 drought 的例句||||The plants are growing in again, despite the drought. 尽管干旱，植物又长出来了。||||The ground is as hard as stone after the drought. 长期干旱后土地硬得就像石头一样。

name: credit
interpret: n.信用，荣誉，贷款，学分；vt.归功于，赞颂，信任
example: 单词 credit 的例句||||I credit him with a certain amount of sense. 我认为他有一定的见识。||||He got the credit, and we did the dirty work. 他得荣誉，我们做不讨好的工作。

name: heal
interpret: vt.使愈合，治愈，使康复；平息(争吵等)；消除，解决(分支等)；vi.痊愈
example: 单词 heal 的例句||||Time helped heal the old wounds. 时间有助于治愈旧创伤。||||This wound will soon heal if yon keep it clean. 如果你保持伤口清洁，它很快就会痊愈。

name: deserve
interpret: vt.应受，值得；vi. 应受报答，值得受赏
example: 单词 deserve 的例句||||You really deserve a good beating,you naughty boy. 你这个调皮孩子真该打。||||I do not deserve all the praises bestowed upon me. 我不配得到这些赞扬。

name: mist
interpret: n.雾，迷蒙，朦胧不清；vt.使...模糊，蒙上雾；vi.使...模糊，下雾
example: 单词 mist 的例句||||She saw his face through a mist of tears. 她泪眼朦胧地望着他的脸。||||There is a film of mist over the land. 大地上笼罩着一层薄雾。

name: gown
interpret: n.长袍，特殊场合穿的长服
example: 单词 gown 的例句||||She pinned the gown at the neck with a safety pin. 她在领子那儿用一枚别针把睡衣别住。||||He threw on his gown. 他穿上他的礼服。

name: sulphur
interpret: n.[化]硫，硫磺
example: 单词 sulphur 的例句||||The water smacks of sulphur. 这水有点儿硫磺味。||||At the same time a piece of sulphur slipped out of his hand. 同时有一块硫磺从他手中滑下。

name: disc
interpret: n.圆盘；唱片，磁盘；adj.圆盘形
example: 单词 disc 的例句||||He hands a metal disc to me. 他把一个金属圆盘给我。||||The disc went spinning away into the sky. 圆盘旋转着飞入空中。

name: liberty
interpret: n.自由，自由权；冒昧行为
example: 单词 liberty 的例句||||He stood for the cause of liberty and justice. 他为自由和正义的事业而奋斗。||||You are at liberty to do as you please. 你可以随意行事。

name: session
interpret: n.会议，开庭期，市盘，学期；adj.短期的
example: 单词 session 的例句||||This matter will go over until the next session. 这件事将留待下次会议讨论。||||Congress is now in session. 国会现在正在开会。

name: measurement
interpret: n.测量，衡量；(量得的)尺寸，大小
example: 单词 measurement 的例句||||I can find the size of something by means of measurement. 我可以用测量法求得某物的体积。||||He has made an accurate measurement of my garden. 他准确地丈量了我的花园。

name: paste
interpret: n.糊，浆糊，铅制玻璃；vt.粘贴，覆盖，猛击
example: 单词 paste 的例句||||Please paste these sheets of paper together. 请将这几张纸粘在一起。||||Stick the paper with paste. 用糨糊粘纸。

name: liter
interpret: n.升，公升(容量单位)
example: 单词 liter 的例句||||The bottle holds a liter of beer. 这个瓶子装一升啤酒。||||I was so thirsty that I drank a liter of iced tea. 我太渴了，竟然喝了一公升的冰茶。

name: craft
interpret: n.工艺，手艺；小船，飞机；行业；诡计
example: 单词 craft 的例句||||The harbour was full of pleasure craft. 港口满是游艇。||||He's a master of his craft. 他有一手好手艺。

name: gymnasium
interpret: n.体育馆，健身房
example: 单词 gymnasium 的例句||||Our school has a big gymnasium. 我们学校有座大型体育馆。||||The game will be staged in the gymnasium. 竞赛将在体育馆举行。

name: routine
interpret: n.例行公事，惯例；adj.例行的，常规的
example: 单词 routine 的例句||||It is everyday routine. 这是每天的例行公事。||||She found the hospital routine slightly dull. 她感到医院的工作有点枯燥乏味。

name: casual
interpret: adj.漠不关心，冷漠的；随便的，非正式的；偶然的，碰巧的
example: 单词 casual 的例句||||He earns a living by casual labour. 他靠做临时工为生。||||The guests wore casual clothes. 客人们穿着便服。

name: emit
interpret: vt.散发；发射；发表
example: 单词 emit 的例句||||She was heard to emit a cry of horror. 人们听到她发出恐怖的叫声。||||He did not emit a sound. 他没发出任何声音。

name: overnight
interpret: ad.前一天晚上，一夜间 a.前一天晚上的
example: 单词 overnight 的例句||||She stayed overnight in the hotel. 她在旅馆过了一夜。||||Our success is not won overnight. 我们的成功不是一夜之间得来的。

name: resident
interpret: adj.居住的，居留的；住校的，住院的；n.居民
example: 单词 resident 的例句||||I've been resident in this place for five years. 我已经在这个地方住了五年。||||They engaged a resident tutor. 他们聘用了一名住家的家庭教师。

name: tan
interpret: n.鞣制革，黄褐色；adj.黄褐色的，鞣皮的；vt.晒黑，鞣(革)，鞭打；vi.晒成棕褐色
example: 单词 tan 的例句||||She had gotten a good tan after the holiday at the sea. 在海边度假之后，她的皮肤晒得黑黑的。||||His arms and legs had a dark tan. 他的手臂和腿晒得黑黑的。

name: leisure
interpret: n.空闲时间，空暇；悠闲，安逸
example: 单词 leisure 的例句||||I am seldom at leisure. 我很少有空。||||He read books at his leisure. 他在空闲时读一些书。

name: dumb
interpret: adj.哑的；不会说话的；笨的；愚蠢的
example: 单词 dumb 的例句||||She is very kind to the dumb children. 她对哑童非常好。||||It was dumb of you to say that. 你说这种话太愚蠢了。

name: prohibit
interpret: vt.禁止；阻止，使不可能
example: 单词 prohibit 的例句||||Laws must be put through to prohibit this act. 必须通过法律来制止这种作法。||||Swimming after drinking is strictly prohibited. 严禁酒后下水。

name: criticize
interpret: vt.批评；批判，指责；评论，评价
example: 单词 criticize 的例句||||Whenever you criticize him, he always has an excuse. 无论什么时候你批评他，他总有说头儿。||||You are free to criticize my work. 你可以随意批评我的工作。

name: Jewish
interpret: adj.犹太人的，犹太民族的
example: 单词 Jewish 的例句||||The coin bears a Jewish symbol. 硬币上有犹太标记。||||They were two Jewish kids;I was friendly with both of them. 他们是两个犹太小孩；我同他们都很要好。

name: announcer
interpret: n.宣布者；电(视)台播音员，报幕员
example: 单词 announcer 的例句||||The radio announcer said it was nine o'clock. 电台播音员报时9点整。||||The announcer tells the listeners what programme comes next. 广播员告诉听众下一个是什么节目。

name: lane
interpret: n.(乡间)小路(巷)；车(跑，泳)道；航道
example: 单词 lane 的例句||||There is a shop at the end of this lane. 这条胡同的顶头有一家商店。||||The champion is running in lane five. 冠军跑在第五跑道上。

name: await
interpret: vt.等候，期待；(事情等)降临于
example: 单词 await 的例句||||We await your command. 我们等待你的口令。||||We await your decision. 我们期待你作出决定。

name: economical
interpret: adj.节约的，节俭的；经济学的；经济上的
example: 单词 economical 的例句||||The state has paced the whole nation in the economical reform. 这个州在经济改革中走在了全国的前列。||||Coke is an economical fuel but it leaves a lot of ash. 焦炭是一种很经济的燃料，可是燃烧后剩下很多灰。

name: candidate
interpret: n.候选人；候补者；投考者，申请求职者
example: 单词 candidate 的例句||||Voters like a candidate who has the common touch. 投票者喜欢那些平易近人的候选人。||||The local newspapers dressed up the candidate as a boxer. 当地报纸把那个候选人描绘成一个拳击手。

name: delicate
interpret: adj.巧妙的，敏感的；易损的，娇嫩的
example: 单词 delicate 的例句||||Be careful with those wine cups — they are very delicate. 当心那些酒杯—它们很容易碎。||||The delicate handicraft works will not bear rough handling. 精致的手工艺品经不起粗鲁的摆弄。

name: circular
interpret: adj.圆(形)的，环形的；循环的；n.传单，通报
example: 单词 circular 的例句||||The bright boy altered it to a circular form. 这个聪明的男孩把它改成了圆形。||||The lamp stands on a circular base. 这盏台灯是装在圆形底座上的。

name: diverse
interpret: adj.不同的；相异的；多种多样的；形形色色的
example: 单词 diverse 的例句||||Spain is a composite of diverse traditions and people. 西班牙是一个汇集了多种传统和民族的国家。||||Society is now much more diverse than ever before. 当今社会较之以往任何时候都要丰富多彩得多。

name: consequently
interpret: adv.因此，因而，所以
example: 单词 consequently 的例句||||She was a bright and eager student and, consequently, did well in school. 她是个聪明好学的学生，因此学习成绩很好。||||The company went bankrupt and consequently he lost his job. 公司破产，因此他失业了。

name: consume
interpret: vt.花费，消费；毁灭；vi.消费掉；枯萎
example: 单词 consume 的例句||||They generally consume more power and take up more space, too. 它们通常消耗更多的能量，并且占用更多的空间。||||The British consume a vast amount of tea each year. 英国人每年消费大量的茶叶。

name: famine
interpret: n.饥荒；严重的缺乏
example: 单词 famine 的例句||||We're collecting for the famine victims. 我们正在为遭受饥荒的灾民募款。||||Famine stared us in the face. 饥荒迫在眉睫。

name: controversial
interpret: adj.引起争论的，有争议的
example: 单词 controversial 的例句||||The topic of argument is controversial. 这个议题是很有争议的。||||Immigration is a controversial issue in many countries. 在很多国家，移民都是一个颇有争议的问题。

name: conventional
interpret: adj.普通的，常规的；符合习俗的，因循守旧的
example: 单词 conventional 的例句||||After a conventional opening remarks, he made a brilliant speech. 在一个常规的开场白后，他做了个很精彩的演讲。||||It is simpler and quicker to use than conventional methods. 这比通常的做法更简单、更快捷。

name: convey
interpret: vt.传送；运送，输送；传达，表达，传播
example: 单词 convey 的例句||||Don't forget to convey my regards when you see him. 你去见着他，别忘了给我捎个好儿。||||My letter will convey some idea of my mode of life. 我的信将使你了解到一些我的生活方式。

name: fluid
interpret: n.流体，液体；adj.流体的，流动的，不固定的
example: 单词 fluid 的例句||||Fluid includes both gasses and liquids. 流体包括气体和液体。||||The weather is fluid in summer. 夏天天气多变。

name: evident
interpret: adj.明显的，显然的，明白的
example: 单词 evident 的例句||||It's evident to me that they have no experience in this work. 在我看来，他们干这项工作没有经验是显而易见的。||||The prospect became more evident. 前景变得更加明朗了。

name: geometry
interpret: n.几何，几何学
example: 单词 geometry 的例句||||The boy puzzled his way through geometry. 那男孩煞费苦心地钻研几何学。||||The students are learning solid geometry. 这些学生正在学习立体几何学。

name: graph
interpret: n.图表，图解，曲线图
example: 单词 graph 的例句||||Such a graph is defined to be a contact network. 我们把这样的图定义为一个接触网络。||||Our foundings are displayed in the form of a graph. 我们的调查结果已用图表列出。

name: perspective
interpret: n.视角，观点，想法，远景
example: 单词 perspective 的例句||||You can get a perspective of the whole city from here. 从这里你可以看到城市的全景。||||We may get a clear perspective of the people's happy lives. 我们知道人民对幸福生活的展望。

name: refresh
interpret: vt.使...生气蓬勃，提起精神，恢复精神；vi. 恢复精神；喝饮料，吃点心；补充给养
example: 单词 refresh 的例句||||I looked at the map to refresh my memory of the road. 我看看地图以唤起对这条路的回忆。||||I think I'll just refresh myself with a cup of tea before I go to meet the children. 我想在见孩子们之前先喝杯茶来恢复一下精神。

name: repetition
interpret: n.重复；反复
example: 单词 repetition 的例句||||The perfomance improved with each repetition. 演出每演一场都有改进。||||This degree of repetition is not found in any known language. 这种重复程度在任何已知语言中都不曾出现。

name: resolve
interpret: vt.解决，解除；决定，决心；n.坚决；决定要做的事
example: 单词 resolve 的例句||||It's up to him to resolve this problem. 这个问题应由他来解决。||||This did not shake his resolve. 这事并未动摇他的决心。

name: vacant
interpret: adj.未被占用的，空着的；空缺的；空虚的，茫然的
example: 单词 vacant 的例句||||A job fell vacant in the accounting department. 财会部出现了一个空缺。||||He stared into space with a vacant expression. 他茫然地凝视着天空。

name: layout
interpret: n.布局，安排，设计
example: 单词 layout 的例句||||The robbers studied the layout of the bank. 这伙强盗研究了银行的布局。||||This map shows the layout of the plant. 这张图展示了工厂的布局。

name: hare
interpret: n.野兔
example: 单词 hare 的例句||||The tortoise wins the race while the hare is sleeping. 兔子正睡觉时，乌龟赢得了比赛。||||I saw a hare in my backyard this morning. 今天早晨我看见后院有一只野兔。

name: embarrass
interpret: vt.使困窘，使局促不安，阻碍
example: 单词 embarrass 的例句||||He didn't mean to embarrass you. 他不是成心让你难堪。||||He is a shy person. Don't embarrass him any more. 他是个腼腆的人，你就不要再羞躁他了。

name: extend
interpret: vt.伸开；展开，伸展；扩大；加大；vi.延伸；扩大；伸展；使疏开
example: 单词 extend 的例句||||Can you extend your visit for a few days more? 你能把你的访问再延长几天吗？||||The examinations extend over two weeks. 考试持续两个星期。

name: vapour
interpret: n.蒸气，水蒸气，雾气；adj. 蒸发的，自夸的，（=vapor）（英）
example: 单词 vapour 的例句||||A cloud is a mass of vapour in the sky. 云是天空中的水汽团块。||||The heat of the sun turns the sea water into invisible vapour. 太阳热使海水变成看不见的水汽。

name: explosive
interpret: adj.爆炸的，爆发的；极易引起争论的；n.炸药
example: 单词 explosive 的例句||||Where's the rest of the explosive? 剩下的炸药在哪里？||||He's inherited his father's explosive temper. 他遗传了他父亲的火暴性子。

name: magnificent
interpret: adj.壮丽的，宏伟的；华丽的；极好的
example: 单词 magnificent 的例句||||The museum that we visited is very magnificent. 我们参观的博物馆是很宏伟的。||||That's a magnificent task. 这是一项宏伟的任务。

name: Latin
interpret: adj.拉丁的，拉丁语的，拉丁人的；n.拉丁语
example: 单词 Latin 的例句||||She learned Latin without a master. 她无师自通学会了拉丁语。||||Please use only Latin characters. 请仅使用拉丁文字符。

name: flavor
interpret: n.味，滋味，味道；风味；vt.调味，加味于
example: 单词 flavor 的例句||||I like the flavor of chocolate. 我喜欢巧克力的味道。||||Each flavor was totally unique. 每一种味道都是独一无二的。

name: specialize
interpret: vi.专化，特化 ；(in)专攻；专门研究；vt.使专门化；使适应特殊情况；详细说明
example: 单词 specialize 的例句||||What did you specialize in? 你的主修科目是什么？||||After his first degree he wishes to specialize. 获得学士学位之后，他希望专攻某科。

name: intellectual
interpret: n.知识分子；adj.智力的，理智的，有理解力的
example: 单词 intellectual 的例句||||Thinking is an intellectual process. 思维是一个智力活动过程。||||Chess is a highly intellectual game. 象棋是需用高度智力的运动项目。

name: ingredient
interpret: n.（烹饪）等的材料，原料，成分，因素
example: 单词 ingredient 的例句||||The basic ingredient of this meal is rice. 这一餐的主要原料是大米。||||Trust is a key ingredient. 信任是关键要素。

name: noun
interpret: n.名词
example: 单词 noun 的例句||||What kind of noun is this? 这是哪类名词？||||This word is a collective noun. 这个词是个集体名词。

name: crust
interpret: n.(一片)面包皮，硬外皮，外壳；地壳
example: 单词 crust 的例句||||This article focuses on radiation present in the earth crust. 本文重点介绍源自地壳的辐射。||||Earth quakes can result from stresses in the earth's crust. 地壳内的压力可能引起地震。

name: parachute
interpret: n.降落伞；v.用降落伞投送/降落
example: 单词 parachute 的例句||||No way, I'm not jumping from high places without a parachute. 没可能的，没有降落伞我可不从高处往下跳。||||Please release the parachute when there is an emergency. 有紧急情况，请打开降落伞。

name: grave
interpret: n.墓穴，坟墓，雕刻工，抑音；adj.庄重的，严肃的，重大的，低沉的；vt.雕刻
example: 单词 grave 的例句||||Marriage is the grave of love. 婚姻是爱情的坟墓。||||This is a very grave matter indeed. 这问题的确非常严重。

name: brighten
interpret: vt.使发亮，使开颜；vi.发光，发亮，生色
example: 单词 brighten 的例句||||Brighten the kitchen by painting it yellow. 给厨房涂上黄色，使它显得明亮。||||She has brighten up my whole life. 她给我的整个生活带来快乐。

name: hasten
interpret: vt.(使)赶紧，催促；急忙(说)；vi 赶快；急忙
example: 单词 hasten 的例句||||You must hasten and publish your results. 你必须赶快公布你的结果。||||That mistake will hasten his downfall. 那个错误将加速他的垮台。

name: tutor
interpret: n.家庭教师，导师，助教，监护人；vt.当…的教师，教，指导，约束
example: 单词 tutor 的例句||||I think you should get her a tutor. 我认为你应该替她请个家教。||||What do you think of your tutor? 你觉得你的家庭教师怎么样？

name: concept
interpret: n.概念，观念，思想
example: 单词 concept 的例句||||A small baby has no concept of right and wrong. 婴儿没有是非概念。||||He was asked to define his concept of cool. 他被要求说明自己关于“酷”的定义。

name: framework
interpret: n.参照标准；准则；观点；框架，结构
example: 单词 framework 的例句||||It's a bridge of steel framework. 那是座钢铁结构的桥梁。||||Physicists seek rules or patterns to provide a framework. 物理学家寻求用法则或图式来构成一个框架。

name: meantime
interpret: n.其时，其间；adv.同时，当时
example: 单词 meantime 的例句||||I continued working, meantime, he went out shopping. 我继续工作，这期间他出去买东西。||||In the meantime we pressed on with the airlift. 与此同时，我们加紧进行空运。

name: loan
interpret: n.贷款；借出的东西；借；vt.借出；贷予
example: 单词 loan 的例句||||I asked the bank to help me with a loan. 我请银行给我一笔贷款。||||Has the bank okayed your request for a loan? 银行批准你的贷款要求了吗？

name: parallel
interpret: n.相似处；平行线；纬线；adj.平行的；类似的
example: 单词 parallel 的例句||||This is the parallel points in the characters of different men. 这就是不同人物间个性上的类似之处。||||The growth of the two towns was almost parallel. 这两个城镇的发展几乎相同。

name: optional
interpret: adj.可任意选择的，非强制的，随意的
example: 单词 optional 的例句||||The goods are optional, but only one. 这些物品是可以任选的，但只能选一个。||||It is optional with you. 那是你的自由。

name: pension
interpret: n.退休金，年金，抚恤金；vt.发给退休金
example: 单词 pension 的例句||||The country provided a pension to the old person. 国家给老人们提供养老金。||||She went to the company to draw her pension. 她去公司领退休金。

name: relevant
interpret: adj.有关的，贴切的
example: 单词 relevant 的例句||||I don't think his remarks are relevant to our discussion. 我认为他的话不切我们的议题。||||These materials are relevant to the case. 这些材料与这案件有关。

name: privilege
interpret: n.特权，优惠，特许；vt.给予优惠，给予特权
example: 单词 privilege 的例句||||Of course,no country has the privilege of fishing in our coastal water. 当然，在我国的领海内没有一个国家有捕鱼的特权。||||He never abuses his privilege. 他从不滥用特权。

name: security
interpret: n.安全，安全感；防护措施；保证(金)，抵押(品)；债券，证券
example: 单词 security 的例句||||A security guard brought him down with a flying tackle. 一名保安人员飞身把他抱倒。||||There was tight security at the airport when the President's plane landed. 总统的专机降落时，机场的保安措施很严密。

name: seminar
interpret: n.研究小组，研讨会，(大学的)研究班
example: 单词 seminar 的例句||||The seminar aims to provide an overview on new media publishing. 研讨会旨在综览新兴的媒体出版。||||The seminar was to discuss diversification of agriculture. 该研讨会讨论的是农业多种经营。

name: theoretical
interpret: adj.理论的，假设的；根据理论的
example: 单词 theoretical 的例句||||It's a theoretical matter as well as a practical one. 这不仅是个实践问题，也是个理论问题。||||It's only a theoretical possibility. 这只是一种假设的可能性。

name: substitute
interpret: n.代理，代理人，代用品，代替物；vt.代替；vi.替代，取代
example: 单词 substitute 的例句||||Can you substitute for the singer who is ill? 你能替一下那位得了病的歌手吗？||||Yogurt is a perfectly acceptable substitute for cream in cooking. 酸奶是烹饪用的特别受欢迎的奶油替代品。

name: supplement
interpret: n.增补，补充；副刊；vt.增补，补充
example: 单词 supplement 的例句||||A supplement to this dictionary may be published next year. 该词典的补编或许将于明年出版。||||They had to get a job to supplement the family income. 他们不得不找一份工作以贴补家庭收入。

name: absolute
interpret: adj.十足的；绝对的；不受任何限制的
example: 单词 absolute 的例句||||The first year of the course was an absolute doddle. 第一年的课程简单极了。||||I look upon this as an absolute necessity. 我认为这是绝对必要。

name: abstract
interpret: adj.抽象的；n.摘要，梗概；vt.提取；摘录要点
example: 单词 abstract 的例句||||He is an abstract painter. 他是一个抽象派画家。|||| He made an abstract of a long article. 他对一篇长文章做了摘要。

name: abuse
interpret: vt.滥用；辱骂；诋毁；n.滥用；恶习；弊端
example: 单词 abuse 的例句||||You can't make personal abuse on her. 你不可对她进行人身攻击。||||She screamed abuse at me. 她尖声责备我。

name: alcohol
interpret: n.酒精，乙醇；含酒精的饮料
example: 单词 alcohol 的例句||||The law forbids shops to sell alcohol to minors. 法律禁止商店向未成年者出售含酒精的饮料。||||The alcohol is industrial. 这些酒精是供工业用的。

name: arouse
interpret: vt.唤醒，叫醒；唤起，激起
example: 单词 arouse 的例句||||We must arouse them to fight with enemies. 我们必须唤起他们同敌人斗争。||||He fell into a sound sleep, don't arouse him. 他睡熟了，别唤醒他。

name: automatic
interpret: adj.自动的；不经思考的，习惯性的；当然的
example: 单词 automatic 的例句||||Breathing is an automatic function of the body. 呼吸是身体的一种无意识的功能。||||Modern trains have automatic doors. 现代火车装有自动门。

name: cab
interpret: n.计程车，出租车，出租单马车；vi.乘出租马车
example: 单词 cab 的例句||||The cab drove over his legs. 马车从他腿上碾过。||||Shall we walk or take a cab? 我们步行还是坐出租车？

name: identity
interpret: n.身份，本体，特征；同一(性)，一致
example: 单词 identity 的例句||||He never revealed his identity. 他从未暴露过自己的身份。||||He showed his identity card and went in. 他把工作证亮了一下就进去了。

name: conquer
interpret: vt.克服，征服，战胜，占领；vi.得胜
example: 单词 conquer 的例句||||There is always one thing to conquer another. 一物降一 物。||||Will can conquer habit. 意志能战胜习惯。

name: dialect
interpret: n.方言，土语，地方话
example: 单词 dialect 的例句||||He wrote a play in a local dialect. 他用当地方言写了一个剧本。||||They began to speak rapidly in dialect. 他们开始叽里呱啦地说起地方话来。

name: dusk
interpret: n.薄暮，黄昏，幽暗
example: 单词 dusk 的例句||||The park closes at dusk. 公园在黄昏时关闭。||||At dusk bats appear in vast numbers. 蝙蝠于傍晚时分大批出现。

name: gradual
interpret: adj.逐渐的，渐增的，徐徐的；n.赞美诗
example: 单词 gradual 的例句||||The doctor noticed a gradual improvement in his patient. 医生注意到病人在逐渐恢复健康。||||To learn a language we must follow the principle of gradual improvement. 学习语言必须遵循循序渐进的原则。

name: terror
interpret: n.恐怖；可怖的人(事)
example: 单词 terror 的例句||||We were in mortal terror of being found out. 我们非常害怕被发现。||||That guy is a proper terror. 那家伙真是讨厌。

name: accumulate
interpret: vt.堆积，积累，积聚；vi.累积，聚积
example: 单词 accumulate 的例句||||We let the mending accumulate until Wednesday. 我们让需缝补的衣服一直积存到星期三。||||We should try various channels to raise and accumulate social security funds. 我们应该尝试多渠道筹集和积累社会保障基金。

name: assume
interpret: vt.假装；假定，设想；承担；呈现，采取
example: 单词 assume 的例句||||I assume that he won't cheat you. 想来他是不会骗你的。||||We can't assume anything in this case. 在这种情况下我们不可能做出假设。

name: devil
interpret: n.魔鬼，恶魔
example: 单词 devil 的例句||||It is easier to raise the devil than to lay him. 召鬼容易驱鬼难。||||Susie, you're a determined little devil. 苏茜，你真是个坚决的小家伙。

name: dynamic
interpret: adj.有活力的，能动的；力的；动力的
example: 单词 dynamic 的例句||||This is a dynamic world. 这是一个不断变化的世界。||||There is a dynamic ball in the computer. 在电脑里有个动态的球。

name: classification
interpret: n.分类，分级；类别，级别
example: 单词 classification 的例句||||These things belong in a different classification. 这些东西属于不同的类别。||||This is a good system for classification. 这是一个很好的分类法。

name: classify
interpret: vt.把…分类，把…分等级；把…列为
example: 单词 classify 的例句||||Men in the post office classify mails according to places it is to go. 邮局里的人员将信件按寄送地点分类。||||He carefully began to classify the results of his examinations. 他开始细心地为他的检验结果分类。

name: bullet
interpret: n.枪弹，子弹
example: 单词 bullet 的例句||||The bullet wound in his shoulder was opened up for treatment. 切开他肩上的枪伤进行治疗。||||The bullet missed me by a hair's s breadth. 那颗子弹差一点就打中了我。

name: explosion
interpret: n.爆发，发出，爆炸
example: 单词 explosion 的例句||||The police arrived right at the moment of the explosion. 警察就在爆炸的那个时候赶到了。||||The shock of the explosion was felt far away. 爆炸引起的震动很远都可感觉到。

name: frontier
interpret: n.国境，边境；尚待开发的领域
example: 单词 frontier 的例句||||The frontier station was starved for food and water. 边防站急需食物和水。||||Areas near the frontier were rough and lawless in the old days. 过去边远地区混乱不堪，而且没有法律。

name: mate
interpret: n.伙伴，同事；配偶；大副；v.(使)交配
example: 单词 mate 的例句||||Where is the mate to this glove? 这副手套的另一只在哪儿？||||She has been a faithful mate to him. 她一直是他忠实的配偶。

name: precise
interpret: adj.精确的，恰好的，极清楚的
example: 单词 precise 的例句||||At that precise moment, Miss Pulteney came into the office. 恰恰在那个时刻，普尔特尼小姐走进了办公室。||||A scientist must be precise in making tests. 科学家做试验必须精确。

name: procedure
interpret: n.程序，手续，步骤；常规的做法
example: 单词 procedure 的例句||||The results show clearly that this procedure is correct. 事实充分说明这种做法是正确的。||||It has passed through an interesting procedure of evolution. 它经过了一个有趣的进化过程。

name: register
interpret: n.登记簿，花名册，注册员；vi.登记，注册；vt. 登记；注册；记录；挂号邮寄；把…挂号；正式提出
example: 单词 register 的例句||||Please list your name in the attendance register. 请在点名册上登记你的名字。||||He was looking over a hotel register. 他正在仔细检查旅馆住宿登记表。

name: prosperity
interpret: n.繁荣，昌盛，成功
example: 单词 prosperity 的例句||||I wish you the life of happiness and prosperity. 我祝你生活幸福、万事如意。||||A prosperity never seen before appeared in the countryside. 农村出现了前所未有的繁荣。

name: technician
interpret: n.技术员，技师
example: 单词 technician 的例句||||The technician is busy repairing the machine. 技师正忙于修理那台机器。||||A skilled technician takes years to train. 一个熟练的技师需要数年时间才能培训出来。

name: tension
interpret: n.(紧张)状态；拉(绷)紧；张力，拉力
example: 单词 tension 的例句||||I could feel the tension in the room. 我可以感觉到房间里的紧张气氛。||||Relaxaion is better than tension. 缓和比紧张好。

name: transfer
interpret: n. 迁移, 移动, 换车; vi. 转移, 调转, 调任；vt.使转移；调任
example: 单词 transfer 的例句||||He has been kicking against this transfer for weeks. 几周以来他一直反对这次调动。|||| I intend to transfer the property to my son. 我想把这笔财产转给我儿子。

name: obstacle
interpret: n.障碍，障碍物，妨害
example: 单词 obstacle 的例句||||She felt that her family was an obstacle to her work. 她感到她的家庭妨碍她的工作。||||He is in the full flush of success; nothing was an obstacle. 他的成就如日中天，锐不可当。

name: capacity
interpret: n.能力，力量，接受力；容量，能量，容积
example: 单词 capacity 的例句||||She is employed by the president in an advisory capacity. 她被总裁聘为顾问。||||This carriage has a seating capacity of 120 people. 这节车厢定员120人。

name: collision
interpret: n.碰撞；(利益，意见等的)冲突，抵触
example: 单词 collision 的例句||||The car was wrecked by its collision with a big lorry. 这辆小轿车是由于和大卡车相撞而碰毁的。||||This collision had a very unusual cause. 这次冲突有着非同寻常的原因。

name: cooperate
interpret: vi.合作，协作，相配合
example: 单词 cooperate 的例句||||We hope we can cooperate even more closely in the future. 希望我们今后能更加密切地合作。||||I hope you can cooperate on this matter. 我希望你在这件事上能给予合作。

name: fate
interpret: n.命运；结局，结果；将来，前景
example: 单词 fate 的例句||||The Titanic met her fate by crashing into a huge iceberg. 泰坦尼克号客轮因撞上一个大冰山而沉没。||||Your future is bound up with the fate of your motherland. 你的前途同祖国的命运紧密相联。

name: hydrogen
interpret: n.氢元素，氢气
example: 单词 hydrogen 的例句||||Water is made up of atoms of hydrogen and oxygen. 水由氢和氧的原子构成。||||A chemist can isolate the oxygen from the hydrogen in water. 一个化学家能把水中的氧和氢分解。

name: foundation
interpret: n.[pl.]地基；基础；基金会；建立，创办
example: 单词 foundation 的例句||||The foundation of the university took place 600 years ago. 这所大学是600年前创办的。||||The Foundation gives money to help artists. 那家基金会捐款帮助艺术家。

name: mayor
interpret: n.市长
example: 单词 mayor 的例句||||The new mayor said he would clean the city up. 新市长说，他要整顿本市。||||The mayor hurried into his office, brushing off the reporters. 市长赶快走进办公室，拒不接见记者。

name: partial
interpret: adj.部分的；偏爱的；偏心的
example: 单词 partial 的例句||||I could give it only partial support. 我只能给它部分的支持。||||I'm partial to a drink at bedtime. 我临睡前喜欢喝杯酒。

name: viewpoint
interpret: n.观点，看法，见解
example: 单词 viewpoint 的例句||||He explained his viewpoint that taxes should be increased. 他解释了他认为应该增加税收的观点。||||My viewpoint is in coincidence with you. 我的观点与你的一致。

name: namely
interpret: adv.即，也就是
example: 单词 namely 的例句||||Only one boy was absent, namely Harry. 只有一个孩子缺席，就是哈利。||||Only one person can answer the question namely you. 只有一个人能回答这个问题，那就是你。

name: definition
interpret: n.定义；限定，确定；清晰度
example: 单词 definition 的例句||||The book attempts a definition of his role in world politics. 该书要阐明的是他在世界政局中的作用。||||I made a definition for this word. 我给这个字下了定义。

name: demonstrate
interpret: vt.论证，证明；示范；显示；vi.示威游行
example: 单词 demonstrate 的例句||||Let me demonstrate to you how this machine works. 我给你演示一下这台机器的运转情况。||||How can I demonstrate to you that my story is true? 我怎样才能向你证明我的话是真实的呢？

name: embrace
interpret: vt.拥抱；包括；包围，环绕；n.拥抱，怀抱
example: 单词 embrace 的例句||||He held her to him in a warm embrace. 他热列地拥抱她。||||The hills embrace the village. 山丘环绕着村庄。

name: comparison
interpret: n.比较，对照；比拟，比喻
example: 单词 comparison 的例句||||They make a comparison of New York to a beehive. 他们把纽约比作一个蜂巢。||||This dress is really cheaper by comparison. 比较起来，这件衣服确实便宜。

name: neutral
interpret: adj.中立的，不偏不倚的；中性的
example: 单词 neutral 的例句||||Behaviour is never culturally neutral. 人的行为从来都受文化的影响。||||They have maintained a consistently neutral stance. 他们一直持中立态度。

name: utter
interpret: vt.发出(声音)，说；adj.完全的，绝对的
example: 单词 utter 的例句||||He smacked his lips but did not utter a word. 他吧嗒两下嘴，但一句话也没说。||||I was at an utter loss what to do. 我完全不知道该怎样做才好。

name: sponsor
interpret: vt.发起，主办；资助；n.发起者，资助人
example: 单词 sponsor 的例句||||Sponsor stated they have no idea where he is. 赞助方表示他们不知道他在哪儿。||||The sponsor has permanent ad on the website commonly. 赞助商一般在网站上有永久性广告。

name: weaken
interpret: vt.(使)变弱，(使)虚弱；vi.变弱；畏缩；变软弱
example: 单词 weaken 的例句||||You can weaken the tea by adding water. 你可以加水把茶弄得淡一些。||||We never weaken our efforts in face of difficulties. 我们在困难面前从不弱化我们的努力。

name: administration
interpret: n.经营，管理；行政，行政机关，管理部门
example: 单词 administration 的例句||||Who is in charge of the administration of your company? 你们公司的行政工作由谁负责？||||The teachers are responsible to the school administration. 教师向学校行政负责。

name: assess
interpret: vt.对…进行估价；评价，评论
example: 单词 assess 的例句||||They assess his house at 15000 yuan. 他们给他房子的估价为15000元。||||We should equitably assess historical figures. 我们应该公正地评价历史人物。

name: tablet
interpret: n.平板，门牌，笔记簿，碑，匾
example: 单词 tablet 的例句||||Take a tablet and your headache will go. 吃一片药你的头就不疼了。||||Fill a glass with water and dissolve this tablet in it. 倒杯水把药片放进去溶解了。

name: clarify
interpret: vt.澄清，阐明，使变得清晰；净化；vi.得到澄清；变得明晰；得到净化
example: 单词 clarify 的例句||||I am happy to clarify any points that are still unclear. 我愿意说明任何仍然不清楚的地方。||||Can you clarify this long sentence? 你能把这个长句子解释清楚吗？

name: disposal
interpret: n.处理，消除，销毁，处置；弃菜碾碎器
example: 单词 disposal 的例句||||The safe disposal of nuclear waste is a major problem. 安全处置核废料是个大问题。||||You had better discuss with her the disposal of the furniture. 你最好和她讨论一下如何布置家具。

name: dispose
interpret: vi.配置，布置；使有倾向；使愿意；清除；vt. 处理；处置；安排n. 处置；性情
example: 单词 dispose 的例句||||He doesn't know how to dispose of his spare time. 他不知如何打发空余时间。||||They dispose of the city's waste in the sea. 他们把城市的废物倒入大海处理掉。

name: efficiency
interpret: n.效率，效能，功效
example: 单词 efficiency 的例句||||We were most impressed with your efficiency. 你的效率给我们留下很深刻的印象。||||Our goal is to achieve the maximum of efficiency. 我们的目标是取得最高的效率。

name: loop
interpret: n.圈，环(状物)；回路，循环；vi.(使)成环；vi.打环；翻筋斗
example: 单词 loop 的例句||||Loop the curtains up. 把窗帘卷起来。||||He bends a wire into a loop. 他将铁线弯成圆圈。

name: navigation
interpret: n.航行；航海；航空
example: 单词 navigation 的例句||||The compass is an instrument of navigation. 罗盘是导航仪器。||||Navigation is difficult on this river because of hidden rocks. 由于多暗礁，在这条河上航行很困难。

name: nerve
interpret: n.神经；勇气，胆量，沉着，果断
example: 单词 nerve 的例句||||Did he have the nerve to say that? 他竟有脸说这话吗？||||He never got up enough nerve to meet me. 他从没有足够的胆量来见我。

name: pessimistic
interpret: adj.悲观的，悲观主义的
example: 单词 pessimistic 的例句||||There is no reason to be pessimistic about the future. 没有理由对未来悲观。||||The voters are pessimistic about the economy. 投票者对经济很悲观。

name: squeeze
interpret: vt.硬塞，硬挤；挤压；n.榨；经济困难；拮据
example: 单词 squeeze 的例句||||This machine helps you to squeeze more juice out. 这台机器能挤出更多的果汁。||||It was a tight squeeze in the crowded bus. 公共汽车上载客太多，挤得很。

name: submit
interpret: vi.(to)屈服，听从vt.呈送，提交；主张
example: 单词 submit 的例句||||He was losing the fight but he would not submit. 他战败了，但不屈服。|||| I will not submit to such treatment. 我不甘心忍受这样的待遇。

name: ease
interpret: n. 安乐，安逸，悠闲；vi. 使...安乐，使...安心，减轻,放松；vi.减轻，缓和；放松；灵活地移动
example: 单词 ease 的例句||||His mind was at ease and he felt confident in the future. 他心情舒畅，对前途很有信心。||||You should ease up on the child and stop scolding her. 你应该对那个孩子宽松些，不要再骂她了。

name: bond
interpret: n.结合，债券，契约，粘合剂，保证人vt.存入关栈，粘着；vi.结合
example: 单词 bond 的例句||||This glue makes a good firm bond. 这种胶水粘得很结实。||||His word is his bond. 他是讲信用的。

name: charming
interpret: adj.迷人的，可爱的
example: 单词 charming 的例句||||She looked small and gentle and altogether charming. 她看起来小巧文雅，十分迷人。||||She has charming manners. 她具有媚人的风姿。

name: drunk
interpret: adj.醉酒的；(喻)陶醉的；n.酗酒者，醉汉
example: 单词 drunk 的例句||||People who drive when they are drunk should be heavily penalised. 醉酒驾车的人应受重罚。||||She found him drunk when she came home at night. 她晚上回家时，发现他醉醺醺的。

name: fertile
interpret: adj.肥沃的，富饶的；多产的，丰产的
example: 单词 fertile 的例句||||The district is fertile of wheat. 该地区盛产小麦。||||Plants grow well in fertile soil. 植物在肥沃的土壤里长势良好。

name: fertilizer
interpret: n.肥料，化肥
example: 单词 fertilizer 的例句||||Fertilizer enriches the soil. 肥料使土壤肥沃。||||Get some more fertilizer for the garden. 给花园再多施些肥料。

name: organic
interpret: adj.有机的，有机物的；有组织的
example: 单词 organic 的例句||||Organic farming is expanding everywhere. 有机农业正在各地迅速发展起来。||||The organic fertilizer shall keep the soil in good heart. 这有机肥一定会使土壤保持肥沃。

name: output
interpret: n.产量，输出，输出功率，输出端；vt.输出(信息等)
example: 单词 output 的例句||||Grain output reached a new high in the three years. 谷物产量达到三年中最高水平。||||The chart showed us the global output of a factory. 这张图表展示了一个工厂的总产量。

name: respectful
interpret: adj.恭敬的，对...表示尊敬的
example: 单词 respectful 的例句||||He is respectful to his elders. 他对长辈很尊敬。||||She received guests with a respectful attitude. 她恭恭敬敬地接待了客人。

name: skim
interpret: vt.撇(去)；掠过；浏览，略读；vi.浏览
example: 单词 skim 的例句||||It took me an hour to skim the book. 我费了一个小时把这本书草草地读了一遍。||||He tried to skim off the best players from the local school teams. 他试图从当地学校的球队中选拔出一批最好的球员。

name: rhythm
interpret: n.韵律；节奏
example: 单词 rhythm 的例句||||He has an ear for the rhythm of Irish speech. 他对爱尔兰语的节奏很敏感。||||His poem has a pleasing rhythm. 他的诗有和谐的韵律。

name: strain
interpret: n.紧张，拉紧，血统；vt.劳累，拉紧，过份使用；vi.拉紧；尽力
example: 单词 strain 的例句||||Strain the fat off before you serve the soup. 在上汤前把里面的油滤掉。||||He had a muscular strain. 他肌肉过劳。

name: curiosity
interpret: n.好奇心，新奇的事物，珍品
example: 单词 curiosity 的例句||||He gave in to curiosity and opened my letter. 他抑制不住好奇心，拆开了我的信。||||The children are dying of curiosity to see what's in the parcel. 孩子们出于好奇，迫不及待地想看看包裹中是什么东西。

name: genuine
interpret: adj.真的，非人造的；真诚的，真心的
example: 单词 genuine 的例句||||On further examination it was found that the signature was not genuine. 经过进一步的调查发现签名不是真的。||||As time went on,a genuine friendship grew up between us. 随着时间的推移，我们之间产生了一种真挚的友情。

name: fundamental
interpret: adj.基本的，主要的；基本原则，基本法则
example: 单词 fundamental 的例句||||The fundamental way out for agriculture lies in mechanization. 农业的根本出路在于机械化。||||Fresh air is fundamental to good health. 新鲜空气对健康是不可缺少的。

name: governor
interpret: n.统治者，地方长官(如省长，州长，总督等)
example: 单词 governor 的例句||||The governor was an expert at fencing with reporters. 这位州长是搪塞新闻记者的能手。||||He was elected governor of the state of California. 他当选为加州州长。

name: necessity
interpret: n.必要性，需要；必需品
example: 单词 necessity 的例句||||I look upon this as an absolute necessity. 我认为这是绝对必要的。||||You must understand the necessity of education. 你必须懂得教育的必要性。

name: presence
interpret: n.出席；到场；存在
example: 单词 presence 的例句||||Her presence lent an air of respectability to the occasion. 她的到场使那种场合增添了崇高的气氛。||||His presence is indicative of his willingness to help. 他的出席表示他愿意帮忙。

name: prime
interpret: adj.首要的，主要的；最好的，第一流的
example: 单词 prime 的例句||||The prime minister spoke of the general insecurity in the country. 总理谈到了全国普遍存在的不安全。||||He met with the Prime Minister of Japan for an hour. 他和日本首相会见了一个小时。

name: county
interpret: n.县，郡
example: 单词 county 的例句||||When the good news reached there, the whole county rejoiced. 喜讯传到那里时，全县的人都欢欣鼓舞起来。||||In that year county after county fell to the enemy. 那一年一个又一个的县城沦入敌人手中。

name: logical
interpret: adj.逻辑(上)的，符合逻辑的；合乎常理的
example: 单词 logical 的例句||||It is logical that the book is expensive. 书贵是很自然的事。||||This is undoubtedly logical. 这显然是顺理成章的。

name: mathematical
interpret: adj.数学的，数学上的
example: 单词 mathematical 的例句||||The solution can be expressed by a mathematical equation. 答案可用一个数学方程式来表示。||||Einstein was a mathematical genius. 爱因斯坦是数学天才。

name: secure
interpret: adj.无虑的，安全的；牢靠的，稳妥的；vt.固定，获得，使...安全；vi.(海上工作人员)停止工；(船)抛锚，停泊
example: 单词 secure 的例句||||He found a secure foothold and pulled himself up. 他找到了一个稳固的踏脚处并爬了上去。||||Extra men are needed to secure the camp against attack. 需要增加兵力以保护军营免受攻击。

name: pub
interpret: n.[英]旅馆，小店，酒馆
example: 单词 pub 的例句||||He is the landlord of this pub. 他是这家酒吧的店主。||||They saw that four large men marched into the pub. 他们看到四个彪形大汉走进了酒吧。

name: recovery
interpret: n.恢复，痊愈；追回，寻回，收复
example: 单词 recovery 的例句||||The doctors said that his recovery was a miracle. 医生说他的复原是个奇迹。||||The quick recovery was truly in response to medication. 这次迅速康复确实是对药物治疗的反应。

name: thermometer
interpret: n.温度计，寒暑表
example: 单词 thermometer 的例句||||She put the thermometer in his mouth. 她把体温表放入他口中。||||The thermometer fell to zero last night. 寒暑表昨夜降至零度。

name: transmit
interpret: vt.播送，发射；传送，传递，传染
example: 单词 transmit 的例句||||A telegram will be the quickest way to transmit the message. 打电报将是传递这个信息的最快途径。|||| These symbols transmit a message in a simple and direct manner. 这些标志用最简单直接的方式传达出一个信息。

name: bold
interpret: adj.果敢的，冒险的，无畏的；冒失的，鲁莽的
example: 单词 bold 的例句||||Her words were so bold that people caught their breath. 她的话太大胆了，使人们都倒抽了一口气。||||The room was decorated in bold colours. 房间的色调布置得鲜明醒目。

name: humor
interpret: n.(humour)幽默，诙谐
example: 单词 humor 的例句||||He is distinguished for his sense of humor. 他以其幽默感著称。||||American humor is founded largely on hyperbole. 美式幽默主要以夸张为基础。

name: modify
interpret: vt.修改；缓和；修饰，限制；vi.修改
example: 单词 modify 的例句||||You'd better modify your tone. 你最好说得婉转一点。||||Established practices are difficult to modify. 既定的惯例是很难更改的。

name: adolescent
interpret: adj.青春期的，青年的；n.青少年
example: 单词 adolescent 的例句||||The adolescent life is most important. 青春期的生活是非常重要的。||||The adolescent period is one's best time. 青少年时期是一个人最美好的一段时光。

name: restore
interpret: vt.把…恢复原状；归还，交还
example: 单词 restore 的例句||||A good rest will restore you to health. 好好休息一下可使你恢复健康。||||His recent success has helped to restore his faith in his own ability. 他最近取得的成功使他恢复了对自己能力的信任。

name: tender
interpret: adj.嫩的，柔软的；脆弱的，纤细的；温柔的
example: 单词 tender 的例句||||At the tender age of seventeen I left home. 早在十七岁的小小年纪，我就离开了家。||||We were sent to boarding school at a tender age. 很小的时候我们就被送到了寄宿学校。

name: campus
interpret: n.大学校园，学校校园；大学
example: 单词 campus 的例句||||They spoke of the old days on the campus. 他们谈起昔日的校园生活。||||The campus covers an area of twenty square kilometres. 这个校园占地二十平方公里。

name: faithful
interpret: adj.守信的，忠实的，如实的，可靠的
example: 单词 faithful 的例句||||They promised to be faithful to their ideal for ever. 他们保证永远忠于自己的理想。||||We must be honest and faithful to the people. 我们对人民必须忠诚老实。

name: faulty
interpret: adj.有缺点的；有错误的；不完善的
example: 单词 faulty 的例句||||This faulty connection is the source of the engine trouble. 这种错误的连接法是引擎出毛病的原因。||||The plan is faulty in every respect. 无论从哪个方面来看这项计划都不完善。

name: federal
interpret: adj.联盟的；联邦的；(美国)联邦政府的
example: 单词 federal 的例句||||Switzerland is a federal republic. 瑞士是一个联邦共和国。||||The schools are screaming for federal aid. 那些学校强烈要求联邦政府的援助。

name: emotional
interpret: adj.令人动情的；易动感情的；感情(上)的
example: 单词 emotional 的例句||||Emotional people don't stop to calculate. 感情容易冲动的人做事往往不加考虑。||||This is an emotional scene in the play. 这是剧中动人的一幕。

name: employment
interpret: n.雇用；使用；工作，职业
example: 单词 employment 的例句||||A large office requires the employment of many people. 一个大办事处需要雇用好多人员。||||The state of employment in this city is improving. 这个城市就业状况正在改善。

name: biochemistry
interpret: n.生物化学
example: 单词 biochemistry 的例句||||Her specialty is biochemistry. 她的专业是生物化学。||||I plan to take biochemistry this semester. 这学期我准备选修生物化学。

name: improvement
interpret: n.改进，增进；改进之处，改善的地方
example: 单词 improvement 的例句||||The doctor noticed a gradual improvement in his patient. 医生注意到病人在逐渐恢复健康。||||I can detect signs of improvement in your thinking. 我可以察觉出你思考问题方面的进步。

name: increasingly
interpret: adv.逐渐地，日益地，逐渐增加地
example: 单词 increasingly 的例句||||Rivers are being increasingly made use of by man. 河流正在日益为人类所利用。||||I find it increasingly difficult to live within my income. 我发现靠收入过日子越来越难了。

name: necessarily
interpret: adv.必要地，必需地；必定地，必然地
example: 单词 necessarily 的例句||||More work does not necessarily call for more men. 增加工作量不一定就要增添人员。||||A voter must necessarily be no younger than eighteen. 选民必须在18岁以上。

name: passive
interpret: adj.被动的；消极的
example: 单词 passive 的例句||||He has a passive expression on his face. 他脸上有一种漠然的表情。||||It lands the manager in a passive position. 它使经理处于被动地位。

name: reflection
interpret: n.映象，倒影；反射；反映；非议；深思
example: 单词 reflection 的例句||||The reflection of the sun on the glass wall was blinding. 玻璃墙上反射的太阳光令人目眩。||||One can see the reflection of the tower in the water. 塔的影子倒映在水中。

name: cease
interpret: n.停止，终止；vi.停止；vt.停止；结束
example: 单词 cease 的例句||||The two parties made a bargain to cease fire. 双方达成了停火协议。||||You will never cease to learn as long as you live. 活到老，学到老。

name: dependent
interpret: adj.依靠的，依赖的，依赖他人生活者
example: 单词 dependent 的例句||||He has a mother completely dependent on him. 他有一个完全靠他赡养的母亲。||||The country is dependent on foreign aid. 这个国家靠外援生存。

name: despair
interpret: vi.灰心丧气，感到沮丧绝望；n.绝望，沮丧
example: 单词 despair 的例句||||If you are in the depths of despair, you will be extremely unhappy. 如果你彻底地失望，你会十分不开心。||||Don't despair; things will get better soon. 不必绝望，事情不久就会好起来。

name: imply
interpret: vt.暗示；意味着
example: 单词 imply 的例句||||Cheerfulness doesn't always imply happiness. 快活并不总是意味着幸福。||||What did she imply in her words? 她的话意味着什么？

name: recall
interpret: n.回忆，召回，取消；vt.回想起，召回，与...相似，恢复
example: 单词 recall 的例句||||As you may recall, he was in the army then. 你可能记得当时他正在从军。||||We demand that you recall your army from our border. 我们要求你们撤回在我们边境的部队。

name: scarcely
interpret: adv.几乎不，简直没有，勉强
example: 单词 scarcely 的例句||||He found the dullness of his work scarcely bearable. 他觉得他的工作枯燥乏味，简直无法忍受。||||She scarcely earns enough money to make ends meet. 她几乎挣不到足够的钱以维持开支。

name: rehearse
interpret: vt.预演，排演，使排练，练习，背诵，复述；vi.排练，练习，演习
example: 单词 rehearse 的例句||||We can rehearse in this open space. 我们可以在这片空地排练。 ||||We hardly have time to rehearse. 我们几乎没有时间排练。

name: mister
interpret: n.(略作Mr.全称很少用于书面)先生
example: 单词 mister 的例句||||Mister Smith is my good friend. 史密斯先生是我的好朋友。|||| He styled himself "Mister Clean". 他自称是“清廉先生”。

name: moreover
interpret: adv.再有，此外，而且
example: 单词 moreover 的例句||||The rent is reasonable, and moreover, the location is perfect. 这房租合理，而且地点优越。||||The task is difficult, and moreover, time is pressing. 任务艰巨，并且时间紧迫。

name: surroundings
interpret: n.周围的事物(或情况)，环境
example: 单词 surroundings 的例句||||She is not very well tuned into her surroundings. 她不太适应周围的环境。||||The rich man lives in luxurious surroundings. 这位富人生活在奢侈的环境中。

name: stroke
interpret: n.笔画，击打，连续的动作，中风，心跳；vt.奉承，轻抚； vi.击打，心跳...
example: 单词 stroke 的例句||||He drove in a nail with one stroke of the hammer. 他一锤就把钉子敲进去了。||||He broke the lock with one stroke of the hammer. 他一锤就把锁砸坏了。

name: skilled
interpret: adj.(in)熟练的，有技能的；需要技能的
example: 单词 skilled 的例句||||Unskilled workers usually earn less money than skilled workers. 无技能的工人通常比有技能的工人挣钱少。||||She was skilled enough in French to translate a novel. 她法语娴熟，足以翻译小说。

name: trace
interpret: n.痕迹，踪迹，微量；vt.追踪，找出根源，描绘；vi.追踪
example: 单词 trace 的例句||||There isn't a trace of a smile on her face. 她脸上没有一丝笑容。||||We have lost all trace of him. 我们找不到他的踪迹。

name: probable
interpret: adj.可能的，有望发性或实现的
example: 单词 probable 的例句||||It is probable to finish the job before dark. 天黑之前有可能完成这项工作。||||It is hardly probable that he will succeed. 他会成功几乎是不可能的。

name: dye
interpret: n.染料，染色；vt.染，染色；vi.被染色
example: 单词 dye 的例句||||Black will dye over other colours. 黑色能把大多数其他颜色盖住。||||This material does not dye well. 这料子染不好。

name: attribute
interpret: vt.(to)把…归于，认为是…的结果；n.属性
example: 单词 attribute 的例句||||I attribute our success to him. 我把我们的成功归功于他。||||Some scientists attribute intelligence to ants. 有些科学家认为蚂蚁有智力。

name: moral
interpret: adj.道德(上)的，有道德的；n.品行，寓意，道德
example: 单词 moral 的例句||||Moral beauty ought to be ranked above all other beauty. 品德之美应列于其他美之上。||||He deceived us into believing that he could give us moral support. 他骗得我们相信他能给我们道义上的支持。

name: refusal
interpret: n.拒绝
example: 单词 refusal 的例句||||He persisted in his refusal to pay the money. 他坚持拒绝付钱。||||Our offer was met with a firm refusal. 我们的报价被坚决拒绝了 。

name: handful
interpret: n.一把；少量，少数，一小撮
example: 单词 handful 的例句||||We invited 30 people, but only a handful came. 我们邀请了30人，但是只到了几个人。||||He pulled out a handful of coins from his pocket. 他从口袋里掏出一把硬币。

name: youthful
interpret: adj.年轻的，有青春活力的
example: 单词 youthful 的例句||||Exercise will keep you youthful. 体育锻练会使你充满活力。||||The boy looked very youthful. 这孩子看起来岁数很小。

name: reduction
interpret: n.减少，减低，减缩；减少，减低
example: 单词 reduction 的例句||||Reduction in income tax will be welcomed with open arms. 减少所得税将受到热烈欢迎。||||You will have a reduction for cash. 付现金可以打折扣。

name: encounter
interpret: vt.遇到，偶然碰到；遭遇；vi.遭遇；偶然相遇；n.遭遇；意外的相见
example: 单词 encounter 的例句||||It was a bloody encounter between the two armies. 这是那两军之间的一次激烈的遭遇战。||||A fortunate encounter brought the two friends together after a long separation. 两位老朋友长期分离这次才有幸相遇。

name: indirect
interpret: adj.间接的，转弯抹角的，非直接的
example: 单词 indirect 的例句||||What he said was very indirect. 他的话很婉转。||||He gave only an indirect answer. 他只作了间接的回答。

name: orbit
interpret: n.轨道；vt.使沿轨道运行；使进入轨道运行；vi.沿轨道运行，环行
example: 单词 orbit 的例句||||The space rocket was launched and went into orbit. 宇宙火箭发射后进入轨道。||||We can draw the earth's orbit round the sun. 我们可以画出地球绕太阳运行的轨迹。

name: exploit
interpret: n.英雄行为，辉煌功绩；vt.开拓，开采，剥削
example: 单词 exploit 的例句||||Many countries exploit oil under the sea. 许多国家在海底开采石油。||||We should exploit our rich resources to expand the economy. 我们应该利用我们丰富的资源发展经济。

name: gay
interpret: adj.同性恋的；色彩鲜艳的；n.(男)同性恋者
example: 单词 gay 的例句||||I don't know he was a gay person. 我不知道他是同性恋者。||||Spring comes round to the earth again and everything looks fresh and gay. 春回大地，万象更新。

name: overhead
interpret: adj.在头顶上的，悬空的；n.间接开支
example: 单词 overhead 的例句||||A number of birds are circling overhead. 很多鸟在头顶上空盘旋。||||Many stars overhead are invisible to the naked eye. 天上的许多星星是肉眼看不到的。

name: outward
interpret: adj.向外的，表面的，外部的；adv.向外，在外，表面
example: 单词 outward 的例句||||The medicine is for outward application only. 这药只供外用。||||The door opens outward. 这扇门向外开。

name: enlarge
interpret: vt.扩大，扩展，使增大
example: 单词 enlarge 的例句||||This photograph is too small, please enlarge it for me. 这张照片太小，请把它给我放大。||||This book is intended to enlarge vocabulary. 这本书的目的是为了扩大词汇量。

name: ownership
interpret: n.所有(权)，所有制
example: 单词 ownership 的例句||||The house is under new ownership. 那栋房子已易新主。||||He claimed ownership of the house. 他声称那幢房子归他所有。

name: archaeologist
interpret: n.(BrE)考古学家
example: 单词 archaeologist 的例句||||My uncle is a nonprofessional archaeologist. 我叔叔是个业余考古学家。||||As an archaeologist, he works in the open all year round. 作为一名考古学家，他常年在户外工作。

name: somewhat
interpret: pron.一些，某物；adv.多少，几分
example: 单词 somewhat 的例句||||The cake we made was somewhat of a failure. 我们做的蛋糕不大成功。||||The two office buildings are somewhat alike in appearance. 这两座办公楼在外形上有点相似。

name: worthless
interpret: adj.无价值的，无用的，可鄙的
example: 单词 worthless 的例句||||Don't read worthless books. 不要读没有用的书。|||| He was worthless as a painter. 他作为画家一事无成。

name: wardrobe
interpret: n.衣橱，衣室，全部衣服
example: 单词 wardrobe 的例句||||The wardrobe is in the way. 大立柜挡住了道。|||| Then put these clothes in the wardrobe. 然后把这些衣服放进衣橱里去。

name: delivery
interpret: n.交付；投递；分娩；解救者；演讲的风格
example: 单词 delivery 的例句||||The strike caused a great delay in the delivery of the mail. 这次罢工严重地延误了邮件的投递。||||He was employed at the local grocery store as a delivery boy. 他受雇于当地杂货店当送货员。

name: presently
interpret: adv.不久，一会儿；现在，目前
example: 单词 presently 的例句||||I'll go to see your uncle presently. 我一会儿就去看望你叔叔。||||He is presently living in New York. 他目前住在纽约。

name: accelerate
interpret: v.使加速，使增速，促进；vi.加快，增加
example: 单词 accelerate 的例句||||Our country should accelerate the economic growth. 我国应加快经济增长。||||He decided to accelerate his advertising. 他决定增加广告的数量。

name: accuracy
interpret: n.准确(性)；精确(性)
example: 单词 accuracy 的例句||||There is need to check the accuracy of these figures. 有必要核对一下这些数字的精确性。||||I doubt the accuracy of your statement. 我怀疑你的话的正确性。

name: carrier
interpret: n.运货人；带菌者；运输军队的交通工具
example: 单词 carrier 的例句||||The airplane lifted from the aircraft carrier. 飞机从航空母舰上起飞。||||I applied for the job as a mail carrier. 我申请邮差的工作。

name: occasional
interpret: adj.偶尔的；偶然的；不经常的
example: 单词 occasional 的例句||||That sort of thing is quite occasional and not regular. 那种事十分偶然，没有规律。||||We must figure in occasional expenses in the budget. 我们必须在预算中把临时费用算计在内。

name: omit
interpret: vt.略去，省去，遗漏；疏忽，忘记做某事
example: 单词 omit 的例句||||Don't omit this paragraph when you write your report. 写报告时不要删去这一节。||||Tell us everything that occurred. Don't omit any detail. 告诉我们所发生的一切。不要漏掉任何细节。

name: satisfactory
interpret: adj.令人满意的；可喜的；恰当的
example: 单词 satisfactory 的例句||||I hope this arrangement will be satisfactory to you. 我希望这种安排会使你满意。||||After much discussion we came at a conclusion satisfactory to all. 经过充分讨论，我们得出了大家都很满意的结论。

name: rebel
interpret: n.叛徒，起义者；vi.造反，反抗，反感；adj.造反的，反抗的，反叛者的
example: 单词 rebel 的例句||||The rebel army is attempting to subvert the government. 反叛军队企图颠覆政府统治。||||The rebel army has readjusted its strategy. 叛军已经重新调整了策略。

name: scarce
interpret: adj.缺乏的，不足的；稀少的，罕见的
example: 单词 scarce 的例句||||The food was scarce during the war. 战争期间食物短缺。||||This kind of material is rather scarce. 这种原料较缺。

name: venture
interpret: vi.敢于，大胆表示；冒险，拼，闯；vt. 敢于n.冒险
example: 单词 venture 的例句||||He is too timid to venture upon an undertaking. 他太胆小，不敢从事任何事业。||||Don't venture into the jungle without a guide. 没有向导，不要冒险到丛林里去。

name: waken
interpret: vi.醒来；vt.弄醒
example: 单词 waken 的例句||||We must waken the people to the dangers facing our country. 我们必须使人们认识到我们国家面临的危险。||||What time are you going to waken him? 你准备什么时间叫醒他？

name: concentration
interpret: n.集中；专注；浓度；浓缩
example: 单词 concentration 的例句||||She wrinkled her brows in concentration. 她蹙额皱眉，陷入沉思。||||If smoke is going that way, then it means the concentration here should be decreasing. 如果烟雾沿着这个方向飘，这意味着，这里的浓度应该是减少的。

name: evolve
interpret: vt.演化，发展，逐步形成；进化
example: 单词 evolve 的例句||||How did you evolve this very personal and original style? 你是怎样逐步形成这种很有个性且具独创性的风格的？||||It has taken us several million years to evolve from the apes. 我们人类从猿类开始进化用了几百万年的时间。

name: core
interpret: n.中心；核心；(苹果、梨等果实的)果心
example: 单词 core 的例句||||We didn't get to the core of the subject. 我们没触及问题的核心。||||The pear is rotten to the core. 这梨全烂了。

name: organism
interpret: n.生物，有机体；(如生物的)机体、有机组织
example: 单词 organism 的例句||||The economy is not a mechanical device but a living organism. 经济不是一套机械装置，而是活的有机体。||||Selection will root out such organism. 自然选择将把这些物种消灭掉。

name: retain
interpret: vt.保持，保留；记住
example: 单词 retain 的例句||||We shall retain our rights. 我们将保留我们的权利。||||China dishes retain heat longer than metal pans. 瓷器盘子比金属盘子保温时间长。

name: sue
interpret: vt.控告，起诉；vi.请求，追求，起诉
example: 单词 sue 的例句||||If you don't pay me the money, I'll sue you. 如果你不付给我钱，我就告你。||||The war criminals sue for peace. 战犯求和。

name: proportion
interpret: n.比率，比例；大小
example: 单词 proportion 的例句||||His head is out of proportion to the size of his body. 他的头部与身体大小不成比例。||||The proportion of imports to exports is worrying the government. 进口与出口的比例令政府担忧。

name: thrive
interpret: vi.兴旺，繁荣，茁壮成长
example: 单词 thrive 的例句||||These animals thrive on the leaves of certain trees. 这些动物靠吃某些树的叶子长壮。||||This flowering plant will thrive and bloom wherever you plant it. 这种花随便你种在哪儿都能活。

name: curve
interpret: n.曲线，弯曲，曲球；vt.弯，使...弯曲；vi.成曲形
example: 单词 curve 的例句||||The train slowed its speed as it went around the curve. 火车在弯道行驶时放慢了速度。||||The path of an arrow is a curve. 箭的轨迹是一条曲线。

name: orderly
interpret: adj.有秩序的，整齐的，一丝不苟的，和平的；adv.有秩序地，有条理地，依次地；n.勤务兵，（医院的）勤务工
example: 单词 orderly 的例句||||It's an orderly room. 这是个整洁的房间。||||The books are in orderly rows on shelves. 书籍整齐地排列在书架上。

name: acceptance
interpret: n.接受，接收，验收，接纳；承认，认可
example: 单词 acceptance 的例句||||The new laws gained widespread acceptance. 新法令受到广泛赞同。||||It took years for Einstein's theory to gain acceptance. 爱因斯坦的理论经过多年才被人们接受。

name: era
interpret: n.时代，年代，纪元，阶段
example: 单词 era 的例句||||We are living in the information era. 我们生活在信息时代。||||We are living in a great historic era. 我们正处在一个伟大的历史时代。

name: miracle
interpret: n.奇迹，令人惊奇的人或事
example: 单词 miracle 的例句||||The doctors said that his recovery was a miracle. 医生们说他的复原是件奇事。||||It is simply a miracle that rice should grow in such a place. 稻子竟能在这样的地方生长，这实在是个奇迹。

name: liberal
interpret: adj.心胸宽阔的；自由(主义)的；慷慨的
example: 单词 liberal 的例句||||He has a liberal attitude to divorce and remarriage. 他对离婚和再婚看得很开。||||This country adopts a liberal foreign policy. 该国采用的是开放的外交政策。

name: invest
interpret: vt.投资；投入(时间等)；授予，赋予；vi.投资，入股；花钱买
example: 单词 invest 的例句||||I have decided to invest in a new car. 我已经决定买一辆新汽车。||||The best time to invest is now. 现在是投资的最佳时机。

name: numerous
interpret: adj.为数众多的；极多的
example: 单词 numerous 的例句||||There have been numerous exchanges of views between the two governments. 两国政府间曾多次交换意见。||||There are numerous people in the square. 广场上有很多人。

name: provided
interpret: conj.假如，若是；adj.预备好的，由...供给的
example: 单词 provided 的例句||||Provided it's fine we will have a pleasant holiday. 如果天气良好，我们的假日将过得非常愉快。||||I will come provided that it's not raining tomorrow. 如果明天不下雨，我就来。

name: psychological
interpret: adj.心理的，精神上的
example: 单词 psychological 的例句||||Work also provides psychological well-being. 工作还能使人心理健康。||||The psychological advantage of direct control is impressive. 直接控制所收到的心理效果很大。

name: regarding
interpret: prep.关于，至于；就…而论，在…方面
example: 单词 regarding 的例句||||Regarding John, I will write to him at once. 至于约翰，我将立即给他写信。||||Regarding these facts, a special committee is to be appointed. 鉴于这些事实，必须成立一个专门委员会。

name: relieve
interpret: vt.缓解，减轻，解除(痛苦、忧虑、麻烦)
example: 单词 relieve 的例句||||We played games to relieve the tedium of the journey. 我们玩游戏，来解除旅行的沉闷。||||The doctors did their best to relieve the patient. 医生们尽力减轻病人的痛苦。

name: shrink
interpret: n.收缩，萎缩；vi.收缩，退缩，萎缩；vt.使收缩
example: 单词 shrink 的例句||||Washing wool in hot water will shrink it. 在热水中洗毛织品会使其缩水。||||This cloth won't shrink when it's washed. 这种布洗的时候不会缩水。

name: spray
interpret: vt.喷，(使)溅散；vi.喷；n.浪花，飞沫；喷雾
example: 单词 spray 的例句||||The liquid came out of the bottle in a spray. 液体从瓶子里呈雾状喷出。||||We were wet with the sea spray. 我们被海水的浪花溅湿。

name: surgery
interpret: n.外科，外科手术；手术室
example: 单词 surgery 的例句||||What time does surgery finish? 门诊什么时间结束？||||Your condition is serious and requires surgery. 你的情况很严重，需要动外科手术。

name: sufficient
interpret: adj.充足的，充分的
example: 单词 sufficient 的例句||||His income is sufficient for his needs. 他的收入能满足他的需要。||||Have you had sufficient? 你吃饱了没有？

name: superior
interpret: n.上级，高手，上标；adj.上层的，上好的，出众的，高傲的
example: 单词 superior 的例句||||This machine is superior in many respects to that. 这台机器在很多方面比那台好。||||He acted in obedience to the orders of his superior. 他是遵照他的上级指示行动的。

name: withdraw
interpret: vt.收回，撤消，撤退；vi.缩回，退出，撤退
example: 单词 withdraw 的例句||||I want to withdraw a statement I made earlier. 我想收回我早些时候发表的一项声明。||||The general decided to withdraw his soldiers. 那位将军决定撤军。

name: widow
interpret: n.寡妇
example: 单词 widow 的例句||||Martha was a very rich young widow. 玛莎是个很有钱的年轻寡妇。||||All this money was appropriated for the support of his widow. 所有这些钱作为给他的遗孀的抚养费。

name: invade
interpret: vt.侵略，侵犯；闯入，侵扰；vi.侵略；侵入；侵袭；侵犯
example: 单词 invade 的例句||||I don't want to invade your private life unnecessarily. 我不想过多地干涉你的私生活。||||He ordered the army to invade at dawn. 他命令军队在拂晓入侵。

name: invasion
interpret: n.入侵，侵略，侵犯
example: 单词 invasion 的例句||||They are ready against the possible invasion. 他们防备可能的入侵。||||It is our duty to shield our country from invasion. 保卫祖国不受侵犯是我们的责任。

name: formation
interpret: n.形成，组成；形成物，结构；队形，排列
example: 单词 formation 的例句||||This is the formation of a new government. 这是新政府的构成。||||The aircraft are flying in formation. 飞机编队飞行。

name: opponent
interpret: n.对手，敌手，反对者；adj.敌对的，反对的
example: 单词 opponent 的例句||||The boxer gave his opponent a punch on the nose. 这个拳击手朝他对手的鼻子上猛击一拳。||||After a fierce struggle,he got a beat on his opponent. 经过殊死的较量，他占了对手的上风。

name: conquest
interpret: n.征服；克服；掠取物；征服的土地或人们
example: 单词 conquest 的例句||||They succeeded in the conquest of that city. 他们夺取了那城市。||||One of the great achievements of the modern science and technology is the conquest of space. 现代科学技术的一项伟大成就是对空间的征服。

name: undergo
interpret: vt.经历，经受，忍受
example: 单词 undergo 的例句||||The planes have to undergo rigorous safety checks. 飞机必须经过严密的安全检查。||||The explorers had to undergo much suffering. 探险者不得不忍受很多困苦。

name: likewise
interpret: adv.同样地，照样地；也，又
example: 单词 likewise 的例句||||They are likewise well loved by many recipients. 它们同样也深受许多支持者的喜好。||||Likewise, nicotine will disrupt your sleep. 同样地，尼古丁会破坏你的睡眠。

name: glorious
interpret: adj.美丽的，辉煌的；荣耀的；极好的
example: 单词 glorious 的例句||||It is a glorious thing to die for the people. 为人民而死，虽死犹荣！||||We had a glorious time at the seaside. 我们在海边度过了愉快的时光。

name: exhibit
interpret: vt.展览，展出，陈列；n.展览品；陈列品
example: 单词 exhibit 的例句||||Next week those goods will exhibit in that shop. 下个星期，这些货物将在那家商店展出。||||The economy continued to exhibit signs of decline in September. 9月份，经济继续呈现出衰退的迹象。

name: proposal
interpret: n.提议，建议；求婚
example: 单词 proposal 的例句||||I feel that we ought to accept his proposal. 我觉得我们应该接受他的建议。||||They could not gain over anyone to support their proposal. 他们无法争取到支持他们建议的人。

name: liver
interpret: n.肝；肝脏
example: 单词 liver 的例句||||He has a weak liver. 他的肝脏不好。||||The largest organ in the body is the liver. 人体最大的器官是肝脏。

name: curse
interpret: n.祸因，祸根；诅咒，咒骂；骂人话
example: 单词 curse 的例句||||His wealth proved a curse to him. 他的财富成了祸根。||||Jack emitted a curse. 杰克诅咒了一声。

name: additional
interpret: adj.添加的，额外的，另外的
example: 单词 additional 的例句||||It is necessary to set down these additional rules. 有必要制定这些补充规则。||||I think we can fit in an additional room. 我想我们可以再加建一间房子。

name: earnest
interpret: n.定金，诚挚，认真；adj.认真的，热心的，重要的
example: 单词 earnest 的例句||||The words were earnest but they fell on deaf ears. 言者谆谆，听者藐藐。||||Her earnest manner arrested me. 她那种热忱的态度引起了我的注意。

name: gasoline
interpret: n.(美)汽油
example: 单词 gasoline 的例句||||This car runs 5 miles on a gallon of gasoline. 这部汽车一加仑汽油可以行驶五英里。||||There is still some gasoline left in the tank. 油箱里还剩下一些汽油。

name: elaborate
interpret: adj.详尽的；复杂的；vi./vt.详述；详细制订
example: 单词 elaborate 的例句||||You understand the situation; I needn't elaborate any further. 你对情况是了解的，我不必再进一步详谈了。||||He made an elaborate hairstyle. 他做了一个复杂的发型。

name: feasible
interpret: adj.可行的，可能的，行得通的
example: 单词 feasible 的例句||||It's quite clear that the electric car is technically feasible. 很清楚，电动汽车在工艺技术上是可行的。||||This is a feasible scheme. 这是一个切实可行的计划。

name: feedback
interpret: n.回授，反馈，反应
example: 单词 feedback 的例句||||I was getting great feedback from my boss. 老板对我的评价很高。||||You need feedback to monitor progress. 你需要利用反馈信息来监控进展。

name: jealous
interpret: adj.妒忌的，猜忌的；精心守护的
example: 单词 jealous 的例句||||He was jealous when he discovered that she loved someone else. 当他发现她爱别人的时候，他吃醋了。||||An honorable Chinese citizen should be jealous of his own rights. 一名光荣的中国公民应当珍惜自己的公民权利。

name: illustration
interpret: n.说明，例证；图解，插图
example: 单词 illustration 的例句||||Illustration by example is better than explanation in words. 用实例说明比用词语解释清楚。||||He used photographs as illustration for his talk. 他用照片为他的演讲作图片说明。

name: heap
interpret: n./vt.堆；一堆；堆积；许多，大量；装载
example: 单词 heap 的例句||||The gardener began to heap up the fallen leaves. 园丁开始把落叶堆起来。||||There was a big heap of stones in the road. 路上有一大堆石头。

name: implication
interpret: n.含意，暗示；牵连，涉及，卷入
example: 单词 implication 的例句||||He smiled, with the implication that he didn't believe me. 他微笑了，暗示着不相信我。||||He has not actually realized the full implication. 他还没有真正认识到全部含义。

name: hence
interpret: adv.因此，所以；从此，今后
example: 单词 hence 的例句||||It's handmade and hence expensive. 这是手工做的，因此很贵。||||It is very late; hence you must go to bed. 时间已经很晚了，因此你必须睡觉去。

name: marvelous
interpret: adj.奇迹般的，惊人的，了不起的
example: 单词 marvelous 的例句||||It'seems to me a most marvelous book. 这本书我觉得奥妙之至。||||I congratulate you on this marvelous opportunity. 恭喜你获得这样一个极好的机会。

name: neglect
interpret: vt.忽视，忽略；疏忽，玩忽；n.疏忽，玩忽
example: 单词 neglect 的例句||||Don't neglect to lock the door when you leave. 你离开时别忘了锁门。||||Today's housing problems are the product of years of neglect. 今天的住房困难是多年来忽视的结果。

name: objection
interpret: n.厌恶，异议，反对；反对的理由
example: 单词 objection 的例句||||None of them raised any objection. 他们谁也没提出反对意见。||||Please present your objection to the plan. 请提出反对这个计划的理由。

name: democracy
interpret: n.民主政治，民主制度；民主精神，民主作风
example: 单词 democracy 的例句||||Democracy is based on good will and mutual understanding. 民主建立在善意和相互理解的基础上。||||Did democracy have its beginnings in Athens? 民主制度是创始于雅典吗？

name: exposure
interpret: n.暴露，面临；揭露，揭发；曝光
example: 单词 exposure 的例句||||After only a short exposure to sunlight he began to turn red. 他在阳光下只晒了一会儿，皮肤就开始变红了。||||I threatened them with public exposure. 我扬言要公开揭发他们。

name: formula
interpret: n.公式；配方，外方；规则，一定的做法
example: 单词 formula 的例句||||His father is acting on his formula. 他的父亲总是按他的原则办事。||||Here are some applications of Taylor's formula. 下面举例说明泰乐定理的应用。

name: proceed
interpret: vi.着手，继续进行；前进，行进
example: 单词 proceed 的例句||||Wrong opinions often proceed from lack of information. 错误的看法往往产生于不了解情况。||||Let's proceed with our work. 我们接着干吧。

name: estimate
interpret: n.估计，估量；评价，看法；vt.估计，估量
example: 单词 estimate 的例句||||We estimate the cost to be five thousand dollars. 我们估计费用为5000美元。||||The lowest estimate would put the worth of the jewel at $200. 按最低的评估这块宝石也值200美元。

name: stack
interpret: n.堆叠，堆；vt.堆积，成叠放在；vi.堆成一堆
example: 单词 stack 的例句||||There's a whole stack of bills waiting to be paid. 有一大堆账要付呢。||||They are specially packaged so that they stack easily. 它们经过特别包装以便于堆放。

name: occasionally
interpret: adv.偶然地；非经常地
example: 单词 occasionally 的例句||||He went on talking, occasionally wiping at his face with a towel. 他继续说着，偶尔用毛巾擦一下脸。||||I like playing football best, but occasionally I play table tennis, too. 我最喜欢踢足球，偶尔也打打乒乓球。

name: glow
interpret: n.白热光；激情；vi.发白热光，(身体)发热
example: 单词 glow 的例句||||The sunset glow is just like a picture. 晚霞恰如一幅图画。||||There was a dull red glow in the night sky above the steelworks. 夜晚炼钢厂的上空闪着暗红色的光。

name: confess
interpret: vt.承认，坦白；vi.承认，坦白，忏悔
example: 单词 confess 的例句||||Many Christians regularly confess their guilty actions and thoughts to a priest. 很多基督徒都定期向牧师忏悔他们的罪行和恶念。||||I confess to some suspicion of your honesty. 我承认对你的诚实有所怀疑。

name: atomic
interpret: adj.(关于)原子的；原子能(武器)的
example: 单词 atomic 的例句||||The atomic theory is important. 原子理论很重要。||||We should take part in the peaceful uses of atomic energy. 我们应该参与原子能的和平应用。

name: sincere
interpret: adj.真诚的，诚挚的，诚恳的
example: 单词 sincere 的例句||||He is sincere and easy to get along with. 他为人诚恳，很好相处。||||His mother is a sincere Christian. 他母亲是个虔诚的基督教徒。

name: extensive
interpret: adj.广泛的，广阔的，广大的
example: 单词 extensive 的例句||||The story had an extensive popularity among American readers. 这本小说在美国读者中赢得广泛的声望。||||The museum offers extensive facilities for study. 这个博物馆提供了许多供研究的设备。

name: father-in-law
interpret: n.岳父，公公
example: 单词 father-in-law 的例句||||He met his future father-in-law during his visit to Boston. 他在波士顿小住期间遇见了他未来的岳父。||||His father-in-law is a plantation manager. 他岳父是个种植园经营者。

name: propose
interpret: vt.提出，建议；提名，推荐；vi.建议；求婚；打算
example: 单词 propose 的例句||||Did he propose marriage to you? 他向你求婚了吗？||||I propose resting for an hour. 我建议休息一小时。

name: ounce
interpret: n.盎司，英两
example: 单词 ounce 的例句||||He poured in every ounce of power but couldn't make it. 他竭尽了全力却无济于事。||||He has used up the last ounce of oil. 他已用完最后一滴油。

name: assure
interpret: vt.使确信；向…保证，使有保证
example: 单词 assure 的例句||||The only ladder to assure success is to work hard. 确保成功的惟一途径是刻苦努力。||||I assure you that she can be trusted to do the job. 我担保她能做好这项工作。

name: mill
interpret: n.磨坊，碾磨机；制造厂，工厂；vt.磨，碾
example: 单词 mill 的例句||||The rice mill was wrecked by the enemy bombing. 碾米厂遭到了敌机的轰炸。||||The farmer took his grain to the mill. 这个农民把谷子送到磨房。

name: hostile
interpret: adj.不友好的，敌对的；敌方的，敌人的
example: 单词 hostile 的例句||||The local people are hostile to outsiders. 当地人敌视外地人。||||Their hostile looks showed that he was unwelcome. 他们怀敌意的表情说明他不受欢迎。

name: respective
interpret: adj.各自的，各个的
example: 单词 respective 的例句||||He and I are each going to visit our respective teachers. 我和他分别要去拜访各自的老师。||||All men have their respective duties. 各人有各人的职责。

name: virtually
interpret: adv.实际上，事实上
example: 单词 virtually 的例句||||The job was virtually completed by the end of the week. 到周末时这项工作差不多完成了。||||He was virtually a prisoner. 他实际上是个囚犯。

name: repeatedly
interpret: adv.重复地，再三地
example: 单词 repeatedly 的例句||||The loudspeakers blared the speech repeatedly. 扬声器里反复大声地播送那篇演讲。||||He repeatedly beat his foot upon the floor. 他反复用脚敲着地板。

name: restrict
interpret: n./vt.限制，限定，约束
example: 单词 restrict 的例句||||He feels this new law will restrict his freedom. 他觉得这一新法律会限制他的自由。||||Don't restrict her proper activities.不要拘束她的正当活动。

name: compel
interpret: vt.迫使，强迫，使不得不
example: 单词 compel 的例句||||Nothing can compel me to do such a thing. 没有什么可以强迫我做这件事。||||You cannot compel good work from unwilling students. 你不能迫使不肯学习的学生取得好成绩。

name: furthermore
interpret: adv.而且，此外
example: 单词 furthermore 的例句||||I don't like her because she is too tall and furthermore she smokes too much. 我不喜欢她，因为她太高，另外她抽烟太厉害。|||| I don't want to go there, furthermore, I have no time to do so. 我不想去那里，而且我也没时间去。

name: emphasis
interpret: n.强调，重点，重要性
example: 单词 emphasis 的例句||||The emphasis has shifted markedly in recent years. 最近几年重点已经明显改变了。||||Particular emphasis will be placed on oral language training. 将会特别强调口语训练。

name: manual
interpret: adj.手工的，体力的；n.手册，指南，键盘
example: 单词 manual 的例句||||The majority of men there earn their living by manual labour. 那里绝大多数人靠体力劳动谋生。||||The school offers manual training to the pupils. 该校为学生开设手工课。

name: installation
interpret: n.装置，设备，设施；安装，设置；就任
example: 单词 installation 的例句||||All large ships now have a wireless installation. 所有的大型船舶现在都有无线电装置。||||When will the installation be completed? 安装工作什么时候可以完成？

name: advisable
interpret: adj.可取的，适当的，明智的
example: 单词 advisable 的例句||||It was advisable for you not to mention that. 你不提及那件事是明智的。||||I do not think it advisable to park our car here. 我认为将我们的小汽车停放在此处是不妥当的。

name: suspicion
interpret: n.猜疑，怀疑；怀疑，嫌疑
example: 单词 suspicion 的例句||||There was just a suspicion of light in the east. 东方刚刚泛白。||||I confess to some suspicion of your honesty. 我承认对你的诚实有所怀疑。

name: publication
interpret: n.出版，发行；出版；公布，发表
example: 单词 publication 的例句||||They don't think this article is suitable for publication. 他们认为这篇文章不宜发表。||||The government has delayed publication of the trade figures. 政府已将贸易统计数字延后公布。

name: stock
interpret: n.存货，储备；树干；血统；股份；家畜；adj.存货的；平凡的，惯用的；股票的；畜牧的；vt.进货，采购；储存；供给；vi.出新芽；进货
example: 单词 stock 的例句||||The shop takes stock every week on Friday mornings. 这家商店每星期五早晨盘点存货。||||Experts have forecast an upturn in the stock market. 专家已预测股票市场价格有上升趋势。

name: temptation
interpret: n.诱惑，引诱；
example: 单词 temptation 的例句||||I should congratulate you that you resisted the temptation. 我应向你祝贺，你抗住了这种引诱。||||Will they be able to resist the temptation to buy? 他们能忍住诱惑不买吗？

name: similarly
interpret: adv.类似地，相似地
example: 单词 similarly 的例句||||He was late and I similarly was delayed. 他迟到了，我也晚了。||||The brothers dress similarly. 兄弟俩穿得差不多。

name: pursue
interpret: vt.继续，从事；追赶，追踪；追求
example: 单词 pursue 的例句||||He began to pursue an easy and comfortable life. 他开始追求安逸舒适的生活。||||This is the path that we shall continue to pursue. 这是我们要继续走的道路。

name: anchor
interpret: n.锚；危难时可依靠的人或物；用锚泊船；新闻主播；vt. 抛锚；使固定；主持节目；vi.抛锚
example: 单词 anchor 的例句||||Letters from home were an anchor to him when he worked abroad. 他在国外工作时，家书是他的精神支柱。||||The ship dragged her anchor during the storm. 船在暴风雨中拖动了锚链。

name: endure
interpret: vt.忍受(痛苦、困难等)，耐住
example: 单词 endure 的例句||||If other people can endure hardship, why can't I? 人家能吃苦，我就不能？||||You can only guess at what mental suffering they endure. 你只能猜测他们忍受着多大的精神痛苦。

name: luxury
interpret: n.难得享受到的愉悦；奢侈，奢华的生活
example: 单词 luxury 的例句||||He invited me to his suite. The luxury takes your breath away. 他请我到他的套房里去，那豪华的气派真会令你吃惊。||||The government has imposed strict reins on the import of luxury goods. 政府对奢侈品的进口有严格的控制手段。

name: prosperous
interpret: adj.兴旺的，繁荣的；成功的
example: 单词 prosperous 的例句||||This district is getting more and more prosperous and bustling. 这一带越来越繁华热闹了。||||The country is prosperous and the people live in peace. 国泰民安。

name: reluctant
interpret: adj.不愿意的；迟迟不合作的；不同意的
example: 单词 reluctant 的例句||||The workers are reluctant to be ordered around by the employers. 工人们不愿被雇主们差来遣去地随便使唤。||||I am reluctant about asking him to do this. 我极不愿意让他去干此事。

name: competent
interpret: adj.能干的，胜任的，有权能的，足够的
example: 单词 competent 的例句||||He is not competent to the task of teaching English. 他不能胜任英语教学工作。||||He did a competent job. 他的工作做得相当出色。

name: barrel
interpret: n.圆桶；一桶的量；枪管；vt.把...装桶
example: 单词 barrel 的例句||||I drew off three pints of beer from the barrel. 我从酒桶里抽出三品脱啤酒。||||The man rolled the barrel into the yard. 那个人把圆桶滚进院子。

name: outlook
interpret: n.观点，见解；展望，前景
example: 单词 outlook 的例句||||The outlook for the economy is bright. 经济前景光明。||||Her outlook gradually widens. 她的眼光渐渐开阔了。

name: observer
interpret: n.观察家，观察的人，观察员
example: 单词 observer 的例句||||I can see you're a careful reader as well as a careful observer. 我能看出你既是一位细心的读者，又是一位观察者。||||I want to attend the conference only as an observer. 本人只想作为观察员身份参加会议。

name: indication
interpret: n.(暗示某事物的)言语，姿势，标记
example: 单词 indication 的例句||||He gave no indication that he was ready to compromise. 他没有妥协的意思。||||His behavior gave every indication of an open affectionate heart. 他的行为就可以表明，他的心胸是坦荡的。

name: restless
interpret: adj.焦躁不安的；静不下来的，运动不止的
example: 单词 restless 的例句||||He looks like a restless man. 他看上去坐立不安。|||| He has been very restless all day and he awoke nearly all last night. 他一整天都心神不定，昨夜几乎一整夜没有合眼。

name: eliminate
interpret: vt.排除，消除，根除
example: 单词 eliminate 的例句||||Can we ever eliminate poverty from the world? 我们有朝一日能消除世上的贫困吗？||||You must eliminate an unknown quantity. 你必须消去一个未知数。

name: yield
interpret: vt.生产，出产；让步，屈服；vi. 屈服，投降；n.产量，收获量
example: 单词 yield 的例句||||A cow will yield several gallons of milk each day. 一头母牛每天产几加仑的牛奶。||||We shall never yield to a conqueror. 我们永远不会向征服者低头。

name: ignorant
interpret: adj.无知的，没有学问的，愚昧的，不知道的
example: 单词 ignorant 的例句||||They are unbelievably ignorant. 他们无知到令人难以置信的地步。||||He's not stupid, merely ignorant. 他并不愚蠢，只是无知。

name: restrain
interpret: vt.阻止，控制；抑制，遏制
example: 单词 restrain 的例句||||If you can't restrain your dog you must lock it up. 如果你无法管住你的狗，就必须把它关起来。||||They couldn't restrain their excitement. 他们无法抑制自己的激动。

name: practically
interpret: adv.差不多；几乎；实际地，从实际角度
example: 单词 practically 的例句||||He solved the problem very practically. 他很实事求是地解决了这个问题。||||She's practically always late for school. 她上学几乎总是迟到。

name: enforce
interpret: vt.实施，执行；强制，强迫；加强，坚持
example: 单词 enforce 的例句||||You have no right to enforce your own views on me. 你无权把你自己的观点强加给我。||||They tried to enforce agreement with their plans. 他们企图迫使人们同意他们的计划。

name: bureau
interpret: n.提供或收集消息的机构；局，司，处；署
example: 单词 bureau 的例句||||The weather bureau makes daily reports on weather conditions. 气象局每天报告天气状况。||||The Tourist Bureau arranged everything for our journey to Rome. 旅游局已为我们去罗马旅行准备了一切。

name: cultivate
interpret: vt.耕作，栽培，养殖；培养，陶冶，发展
example: 单词 cultivate 的例句||||Farmers cultivate their farms with cows. 农夫用牛耕田。||||One should cultivate good manners from childhood. 一个人从小要学讲礼貌。

name: flourish
interpret: vi.茂盛，繁荣，兴旺；vt.挥动(以引起注意)；n. 兴旺；茂盛；挥舞；炫耀；华饰
example: 单词 flourish 的例句||||When the root is firm, the branches flourish. 本固枝荣。||||She rode by with a flourish of her whip. 她骑马挥鞭而过。

name: cabinet
interpret: n.内阁，内阁会议；(带玻璃门存物品的)橱柜
example: 单词 cabinet 的例句||||I keep my collection of old china in the cabinet. 我把古瓷器收藏品存放在橱子里。||||He had held many important offices in the French cabinet. 他在法国内阁中任过许多重要职务。

name: heroic
interpret: adj.英雄的，英勇的，崇高的
example: 单词 heroic 的例句||||Many people have heard of the man's heroic deeds. 许多人都已经听说了这个人的英雄事迹。||||He received a medal for his heroic feat. 他因其英雄业绩而获得一枚勋章。

name: acquaintance
interpret: n.认识，相识，了解；相识的人，熟人
example: 单词 acquaintance 的例句||||When did you make the acquaintance of his brother? 你是什么时候认识他兄弟的？||||I have only a nodding acquaintance with him. 我和他只有点头之交。

name: arbitrary
interpret: adj.任意的，任性的，主观的；专断的，武断的
example: 单词 arbitrary 的例句||||A good judge does not make arbitrary decisions. 一个优秀的法官不会作武断的判决。||||You can make an arbitrary choice. 你可以随便做选择。

name: scrape
interpret: vi.勉强维持；刮擦；vt. 刮；擦伤；挖成；n.刮，擦；刮擦声；困境
example: 单词 scrape 的例句||||We don't have much money but we scrape along somehow. 虽然我们没多少钱，但是还可以过得下去。||||The high mountains seem to scrape the sky. 峻岭摩天。

name: multiple
interpret: adj.多个(或多项、多种)的；n.（数）倍数
example: 单词 multiple 的例句||||The number 8 is a multiple of 4. 八是四的倍数。||||The most common multiple births are twins, two babies born at the same time. 最常见的多胎是双胞胎，两个婴儿同时出生。

name: confine
interpret: vt.(to,within)限制，局限于；管制，禁闭
example: 单词 confine 的例句||||Doctors are trying to confine the disease within the city. 医生正试图将此病控制在城内。||||I shall confine myself to the subject of geography. 我将专攻地理学。

name: phase
interpret: n.相位，时期，局面，阶段；vt.逐步执行，实行，按计划进行
example: 单词 phase 的例句||||The first phase of the project has been completed. 第一期工程已经告一段落。||||It was a very important phase of history. 它是一个非常重要的历史阶段。

name: alter
interpret: vt.改变，变更；vi.改变，变样
example: 单词 alter 的例句||||We have to alter the house into a barn. 我们不得不把房子改建成谷仓。||||She is trying to alter the coat. 她正设法改那件衣服。

name: intense
interpret: adj.认真的，专注的；强烈的；紧张的；热情的
example: 单词 intense 的例句||||Susan was an intense young lady. 苏珊是一个热情的年轻姑娘。||||The quarrel caused her intense unhappiness. 争吵令她极其不快。

name: moderate
interpret: adj.适度的，稳健的，温和的，中等的；vt.节制，使...稳定，使...缓和；vi. 变缓和，变弱；
example: 单词 moderate 的例句||||You should moderate your language when children are present. 在孩子面前，你说话应该有节制。||||The wind is moderate today. 今天的风很柔和。

name: limitation
interpret: n.限制；局限
example: 单词 limitation 的例句||||I am willing to accept certain limitation on my freedom. 我愿意接受对我自由的某些限制。||||We shall continue to work for the limitation of nuclear arms. 我们将继续为限制核子武器而努力。

name: audio
interpret: n./adj.音频(响)(的)；声音(的)，听觉(的)
example: 单词 audio 的例句||||Often,the meeting is recorded on audio or video media for later reference. 通常这种会议会以视频或者音频形式记录下来，供以后查阅。||||You don't even have to pay for audio programs. 你大可不必为自己听这些节目付费。

name: resistance
interpret: n.抵抗力，反抗，反抗行动；阻力，电阻；反对；adj.抵抗的
example: 单词 resistance 的例句||||Very little resistance was put up by the enemy. 敌人没怎么进行抵抗。||||An aircraft has to overcome the resistance of the air. 飞机须克服空气的阻力。

name: unlikely
interpret: adj.未必的，多半不可能的；不大可能发生的
example: 单词 unlikely 的例句||||It was very unlikely that he would do that. 他不见得会做那种事。||||It is unlikely that she will come. 她不大可能来了。

name: mission
interpret: n.使命，任务，天职；代表团，使团
example: 单词 mission 的例句||||He was charged with an important mission. 他受委托承担一项重要使命。||||I'll leave you to undertake an important mission. 我要让你承担一项重要使命。

name: moist
interpret: adj.潮湿的，湿润的；(果物)多汁的；[医]有分泌物的，湿性的；n.潮湿
example: 单词 moist 的例句||||There were no windows to admit moist atmosphere to enter. 没有窗户使潮湿的空气进入室内。||||Winds from the sea are usually moist. 海风通常是潮湿的。

name: remedy
interpret: n.药品；治疗(法)；补救办法；vt.医治；治疗
example: 单词 remedy 的例句||||Your only remedy is to appeal to law. 你的惟一补救办法是诉诸法律。||||Is there any remedy for fever? 有什么退热药吗？

name: suspend
interpret: vt. 推迟, 悬挂, 暂停, 取消; vi. 悬挂, 中止, 停止偿付债务
example: 单词 suspend 的例句||||Balloons suspend easily in the air. 气球容易浮在空中。|||| I request them to suspend their decision until they have read my narrative. 我请求他们没看完我写的故事之前，别轻率地先下断语。

name: experimental
interpret: adj.实验的，用作实验的，根据实验的
example: 单词 experimental 的例句||||This trip will be only experimental. 这次旅行只是试验性的。||||The experimental farm is near the waterpower station. 实验农场靠近水电站。

name: mold
interpret: n.模子，模型，铸模；vt.造型，浇涛
example: 单词 mold 的例句||||Too often we try to mold our children into something they do not wish to be. 我们常常试图把孩子塑造成他们自己不想成为的样子。||||Try to compact the sand into the mold. 设法把这沙土堆积到模子里。

name: fatal
interpret: adj.致命的，灾难性的；重大的，决定性的
example: 单词 fatal 的例句||||The enemy got a fatal blow in the battle. 敌人在战斗中受到致命的打击。||||I made the fatal mistake of letting her talk. 我让她讲话是犯了严重的错误。

name: investment
interpret: n.投资，投资额；(时间、精力等的)投入
example: 单词 investment 的例句||||It took two years before I recouped my investment. 我用了两年时间才收回投资。||||The success of the project pivots on investment from abroad. 这个工程的成功主要依靠外来投资。

name: bolt
interpret: n.螺栓；插销；vt.闩，栓住；囫囵吞下；vi.冲出去，逃跑
example: 单词 bolt 的例句||||It is a bad habit to bolt your food. 狼吞虎咽地吃东西是个不良习惯。||||That door refuses to bolt. 那扇门关不牢。

name: prominent
interpret: adj.突出的；显著的；杰出的；重要的
example: 单词 prominent 的例句||||He is prominent in science. 他是科学界杰出的人物。||||That school is prominent in baseball. 那个学校以棒球著称。

name: pillar
interpret: n.柱子，柱状物；有力的支持者；栋梁
example: 单词 pillar 的例句||||He was a pillar of the club for over thirty years. 30多年来他一直是这个俱乐部的顶梁柱。||||I fell asleep against a pillar. 我靠在一根柱子上睡着了。

name: wax
interpret: n.蜡，蜡状物，震怒；vi.变大，增大，月亮满；vt.用蜡涂
example: 单词 wax 的例句||||I wax my boots chiefly to waterproof them. 我给靴子打蜡主要是为了防水。||||I wax the floor once a month. 我每月给地板打一次蜡。

name: amongst
interpret: prep.在…之中，在...之间(=among)
example: 单词 amongst 的例句||||He was sitting amongst a group of children, telling them a story. 他正坐在一群孩子中间讲故事。||||You must settle the matter amongst yourselves. 你们必须彼此商量，自行解决这些问题。

name: insult
interpret: vt.侮辱，凌辱；n.侮辱的言词或行为
example: 单词 insult 的例句||||You will insult her if you don't go to her party. 你要是不去参加她举办的聚会，就对她太无礼了。||||I can't sit down with that insult. 我不能忍受那种侮辱。

name: crush
interpret: vt.压垮，压服，镇压；压碎，碾碎；vi. 挤；被压碎；n.粉碎；迷恋；压榨；拥挤的人群
example: 单词 crush 的例句||||This machine is made to crush the rock into powder. 这台机器是用来把石头压成碎末的。||||You can't crush so many people into the classroom. 不能让这么多人挤进教室。

name: contradiction
interpret: n.矛盾，不一致；否认，反驳
example: 单词 contradiction 的例句||||Your attitude is in contradiction to your character. 你的态度和你的性格相抵触。||||Your statements today are in contradiction with what you said yesterday. 你今天的声明与你昨天所说的话相互矛盾。

name: unjust
interpret: adj.非正义的；不公正的，不公平的，不该受的
example: 单词 unjust 的例句||||The unjust peace agreement set the scene for another war. 这项不公平的和约为另一场战争埋下了祸根。||||It was unjust of them not to hear my side. 他们不听我这方面的意见，这不公正。

name: landlord
interpret: n.地主，房东，(旅店)店主
example: 单词 landlord 的例句||||He is the landlord of this pub. 他是这家酒店的店主。||||He used to be a long-term labourer for a landlord. 他早先给地主扛过长活。

name: ratio
interpret: n.比，比率
example: 单词 ratio 的例句||||The ratio of pupils to teachers was 30 to 1. 学生和老师的比率是30比1。||||The ratio between the two sides is one to four. 双方人数对比是一对四。

name: harness
interpret: n.马具；类似马具的装备；vt.给上马具
example: 单词 harness 的例句||||He paid ten dollars for the new harness. 他花十美元买了这件马具。||||I harness the horse to the cart. 我把马套在车上。

name: submerge
interpret: v.(使)潜入(没入)水中，(使)浸没，淹没
