example: 单词 submerge 的例句||||The submarine can submerge very quickly. 潜艇能非常迅速地潜入水中。||||He can submerge to a depth of about twenty meters. 他能潜入约二十米深的水中。

name: immense
interpret: adj.巨大的；极好的
example: 单词 immense 的例句||||They made an immense improvement in English. 在英语方面他们取得了巨大的进步。||||The expense of living is immense. 生活费用很庞大。

name: ultimate
interpret: adj.最远的；最后的；终极的；根源的，基本的
example: 单词 ultimate 的例句||||What was his ultimate goal? 他的最终目标是什么？||||The sun is the ultimate store of power. 太阳是能量之本。

name: variation
interpret: n.变化，变动；变体，变种；变奏(曲)
example: 单词 variation 的例句||||The prices for food are subject to variation. 食品的价格可能变更。||||The regulation allows of no variation. 这规则不得改变。

name: amid
interpret: prep.在…中间，在…之中，被…围绕
example: 单词 amid 的例句||||The government collapsed amid budget quarrels. 政府因预算问题争吵不休而倒台。||||This book was written amid many difficulties. 这本书是在困难重重中写成的。

name: depress
interpret: vt.使沮丧，使抑郁；使不景气；使萧条
example: 单词 depress 的例句||||The rainy days always depress me. 雨天总是使我沮丧。||||Some medicines depress the action of the heart. 有些药物会减弱心脏的功能。

name: disgust
interpret: n.使厌恶，使反感；vt.恶，反感
example: 单词 disgust 的例句||||The food at the hotel filled him with disgust. 旅馆的食物使他作呕。||||My immediate reaction was just disgust. 我当时的第一反应就是反感。

name: hedge
interpret: n.树篱；障碍物；vt.用篱笆围；vi.避免直接回答
example: 单词 hedge 的例句||||The gardener trimmed the hedge. 那位园林工人修剪了树篱。||||He squeezed through a gap in the hedge. 他从树篱的缺口处挤过去。

name: retreat
interpret: n.休息寓所，撤退，隐居；vi.撤退，向后倾；vt.退（棋）；使后退
example: 单词 retreat 的例句||||You cannot retreat from your responsibility in this affair. 你不能回避在这一事件中的责任。||||They knew when to attack and when to retreat. 他们知道什么时候进攻和什么时候撤退。

name: concerning
interpret: prep.关于，论及
example: 单词 concerning 的例句||||What do you know concerning this? 关于这事你知道些什么？||||Some senior students wrote in asking for information concerning postgraduate studies. 一些四年级学生写信询问有关研究生课程的信息。

name: wag
interpret: vt. 摇摆；摇动；饶舌 vi. 摆动；喋喋不休；蹒跚而行 n. 摇摆；爱说笑打趣的人
example: 单词 wag 的例句||||Dogs wag their tails when they are pleased. 狗一高兴就摇尾巴。||||I'll not wag an ace further. 我一步也不再动啦。

name: copyright
interpret: n.版权，著作权
example: 单词 copyright 的例句||||He retained the copyright of his book. 他保留此书的著作权。||||This company has a proprietorship of the copyright. 这家公司拥有版权所有权。

name: torture
interpret: n.折磨；vt.折磨，使痛苦；使苦恼，使为难
example: 单词 torture 的例句||||No torture would make him speak. 任何严刑拷打都不能使他开口。||||Through those long years of imprisonment and torture, he remained faithful and unyielding. 在那些遭受囚禁和酷刑的漫长岁月里，他始终坚贞不屈。

name: undergraduate
interpret: n.大学生，大学肆业生
example: 单词 undergraduate 的例句||||Mr. Stone spent his undergraduate days in Columbia University, majoring in economics. 斯通先生在哥伦比亚大学度过了他四年的大学生活，主修经济学。||||During this time, they are called undergraduate students. 在此期间，他们被称为大学本科生。

name: solo
interpret: n.独奏，独唱；adj.单独的；adv.单独地；v.放单飞，单独表演
example: 单词 solo 的例句||||Tara is currently working on a solo album. 塔拉眼下正忙着制作个人专辑。||||There's wonderfully lyrical flute solo in the middle of this symphony. 在交响乐中间有一段奇妙的抒情长笛独奏。

name: interaction
interpret: n.交流；相互作用，相互影响，合作
example: 单词 interaction 的例句||||The interaction of the two groups produced many good ideas. 两个组的相互交流产生了许多好主意。||||Price is determined through the interaction of demand and supply. 价格在供需的相互作用中形成。

name: expansion
interpret: n.扩张，扩充；扩大；扩充物；扩展部
example: 单词 expansion 的例句||||The company has promised wide consultation on its expansion plans. 该公司允诺就其扩展计划广泛征求意见。||||The plan will give an impulse to industrial expansion. 这个计划将促进工业的扩展。

name: bible
interpret: n.《圣经》；得到权威支持的典籍
example: 单词 bible 的例句||||According to the Bible we are all the seed of Adam. 根据《圣经》所说的，我们都是亚当的后裔。||||This dictionary should be your Bible when studying English. 学习英语时，这本字典应是你的主要参考书。

name: cord
interpret: n.绳，线；纺织品；小电线；腱
example: 单词 cord 的例句||||I wear a safety cord all the time. 我一直带着安全绳索。||||I pulled the cord, and I felt a strong jerk. 拉住绳索，我感到十分恐惧。

name: tune
interpret: n.调子；和谐，协调；vt.调音，调节，调整；vi.[电子][通信] 调谐；协调
example: 单词 tune 的例句||||He'd written a tune, and played it to us on the piano. 他写了一段曲子，并在钢琴上弹给我们听。||||The boy beat out a tune on a tin can. 那男孩在易拉罐上敲出一首曲子。

name: prescribe
interpret: vi.规定，开药方；vt.规定，命令，开处方
example: 单词 prescribe 的例句||||The doctor prepared to prescribe a receipt. 医生准备开个药方。||||Can't you just prescribe some of those diet pills, doctor? 你不能开一些减肥药吗，医生？

name: turbine
interpret: n.涡轮机，叶轮机，透平机
example: 单词 turbine 的例句||||A disadvantage of the turbine is that it is not reversible. 涡轮机的一个缺点就是它不可以反转。||||Before the air enters the turbine, fuel is sprayed into it. 在空气进入涡轮之前，燃料就喷进了。

name: preferable
interpret: adj.更可取的，更合意的，更好的
example: 单词 preferable 的例句||||Health without riches is preferable to riches without health. 有健康而无财富比有财富而无健康更好。||||Which cities are preferable for tourists to visit on their first trip to China? 第一次到中国旅游，应当先去哪些地方？

name: spark
interpret: n.火花，朝气，情人，俗丽的年轻人；vi.闪烁，冒火花，热情回应；vt.激发，引起，追求
example: 单词 spark 的例句||||A single spark can start a prairie fire. 星星之火，可以燎原。||||What made the electric wire spark? 电线冒火花是什么原因？

name: rival
interpret: n.竞争对手，敌手；vt.与…相匹敌，比得上
example: 单词 rival 的例句||||None of us can rival him in strength. 我们谁也没他劲大。||||She defeat all her rivals for the job with nonchalant ease. 她从容不迫地击败求职的所有竞争者。

name: instinct
interpret: n.本能，直觉；生性，天性
example: 单词 instinct 的例句||||We all have a strong survival instinct. 每个人都有强烈的求生本能。||||Birds learn to fly by instinct. 鸟儿学飞是出于本能。

name: haste
interpret: n.匆忙，急速；草率；vi.赶快；匆忙；vt.赶快
example: 单词 haste 的例句||||In his blind haste he almost ran into the river. 他匆匆忙忙地几乎跑到河里去了。||||The contract says the work must be completed with all possible haste. 合同上写明这项工作必须尽快完成。

name: excessive
interpret: adj.过多的，过分的，过度的
example: 单词 excessive 的例句||||The prices at this hotel are excessive. 这家旅馆的价钱贵得过分。||||She takes an excessive interest in clothes. 她过分注重衣着。

name: exceed
interpret: vt.超过，胜过，越出
example: 单词 exceed 的例句||||The expenses shall not exceed 200 yuan. 费用以200元为限。||||Exports yearly exceed imports. 每年的出口额超过进口额。

name: drift
interpret: vi.漂流(泊)；n.漂流，漂流物；大意；趋势
example: 单词 drift 的例句||||The leaves drift in the storm. 树叶在暴风雨中飘动。||||The drift of the icebergs in the sea endangers the ships. 海上冰山的漂流危及船只的安全。

name: beloved
interpret: adj./n.受爱戴的，敬爱的；爱人，被心爱的人
example: 单词 beloved 的例句||||She longs for the early return of her beloved. 她盼着心上人早日归来。||||She is Tom's beloved wife. 她是汤姆的爱妻。

name: infant
interpret: n.婴儿，幼儿；adj.婴儿的；幼稚的，初期的
example: 单词 infant 的例句||||Tourism was then still in its infant stage. 旅游业当时还处在初创阶段。||||I also need an infant's food for my baby. 我要买些婴儿食品给我的孩子。

name: primarily
interpret: adv.首先，主要地，基本地
example: 单词 primarily 的例句||||The advertising campaign is aimed primarily at young people. 这个广告宣传运动主要是针对年轻人的。||||I am primarily interested in history. 我主要对历史感兴趣。

name: applicable
interpret: adj.适当的，合适的，可应用的
example: 单词 applicable 的例句||||The section of the form is not applicable in your case. 表格这一部分不适合你的情况。||||This section of the law is applicable only to corporations. 这部分法律只适用于公司。

name: vibrate
interpret: vi.(使)振动，(使)摇摆；vt.摇动，震动
example: 单词 vibrate 的例句||||The rough road made the car vibrate. 坑坑洼洼的道路使车颠得厉害。||||Tom's heavy footsteps upstairs make the old house vibrate. 楼上汤姆的沉重脚步振动了整幢旧楼房。

name: verify
interpret: vt.核实，查对；证明，证实
example: 单词 verify 的例句||||Men were sent out to verify whether it was true. 几个人被派去查清事实。|||| We will verify this with a copy of payment schedule. 我们将按付款程序的副本进行核实。

name: variable
interpret: adj.多变的；可变的；n.可变因素，变量
example: 单词 variable 的例句||||People are not only complex but also highly variable. 人不仅是复杂的,而且也是多变的。|||| Our team's performance this year has been variable. 我们队今年成绩很不稳定。

name: railroad
interpret: n.铁路；vi.由铁路运输
example: 单词 railroad 的例句||||The railroad connects two cities, namely, New York and Chicago. 这条铁路连接两个城市，即纽约与芝加哥。||||My brother is working on the railroad. 我兄弟在铁路系统工作。

name: lag
interpret: vi.走得慢，落后；n.滞后，(时间上的)间隔
example: 单词 lag 的例句||||Ten minutes later, some of runners in the race began to lag. 十分钟后，有些参赛的人开始落后了。||||There is a time lag of about fifteen years. 时间上有一段约15年的间隔。

name: harden
interpret: vt.(使)变硬；(使)变得坚强，(使)变得冷酷；vi.变硬，变坚固；变坚强；变冷酷
example: 单词 harden 的例句||||They harden clay by putting it in a fire. 他们把粘土坯放在炉火里使其变硬。||||Don't harden your heart against him. 别对他硬心肠。

name: harbor
interpret: n.海港，港口；vt.庇护，藏匿；心怀(怨恨等)
example: 单词 harbor 的例句||||The harbor lies to the south of the city. 港口在城市的南边。||||At that time, our ship was tied up at this harbor. 当时我们的船停靠在这个港口。

name: halt
interpret: n.停住，停止，暂停；vt.(使)停住，(使)停止；vi.停止；立定；踌躇，犹豫
example: 单词 halt 的例句||||When the children's play got too noisy, their mother called a halt. 当孩子们的游戏过于吵闹时，他们的母亲叫他们停下来。||||No one can halt the advance of history. 没人能阻挡历史的前进。

name: election
interpret: n.选举，选择权；当选
example: 单词 election 的例句||||There is no doubt but that he will win the election. 毫无疑问，他将在竞选中获胜。||||The government will probably fall at the coming election. 在即将到来的大选中，该政府很可能要垮台。

name: deceive
interpret: vt.欺骗，使弄错；vi.行骗
example: 单词 deceive 的例句||||I think this is just a government ploy to deceive the public. 我认为这只是政府欺骗公众的手段。||||Don't try to deceive me. 你别诳我。

name: accordingly
interpret: adv.相应地，照着办，按照；于是，因此
example: 单词 accordingly 的例句||||Please inform us of your decision and we will act accordingly. 请把你们的决定通知我们，我们会照着去办的。||||He was told to speak briefly; accordingly he cut short his remarks. 人家叫他说话简短，于是他就长话短说了。

name: accordance
interpret: n.一致，和谐；符合
example: 单词 accordance 的例句||||He acted in accordance with his beliefs. 他按照自己的信念行事。||||We should make decisions in accordance with specific conditions. 我们应当根据具体情况做出决定。

name: accidental
interpret: adj.偶然的；意外的；无意中的
example: 单词 accidental 的例句||||It was an accidental meeting. 这完全是一次偶然的相会。||||Our meeting in New York was quite accidental. 我们在纽约的会见完全是偶然的。

name: shield
interpret: vt.保护，包庇，遮挡；vi.防御；起保护作用；n.防护物，护罩，盾
example: 单词 shield 的例句||||She intended to shield the child from the bad information. 她打算不让这个孩子知道这个坏消息。||||Dark glasses is an effective shield against the glare. 墨镜有效地阻隔强光保护眼睛。

name: realm
interpret: n.王国，国度；界，领域，范围
example: 单词 realm 的例句||||The king was concerned about the safety of the realm. 国王十分关心王国的安全。||||Students' interests are mostly limited to the academic realm. 学生们的兴趣大多限于学术领域。

name: continual
interpret: adj.不间断的，不停的；多次重复的，频频的
example: 单词 continual 的例句||||I am tired of this continual rain. 不停的下雨使我厌倦。||||He has continual arguments with his father. 他屡次跟他父亲争论。

name: blend
interpret: vt.&vi.(使)混和，(使)混杂；n.混合物；混和
example: 单词 blend 的例句||||Do you think these two colours will blend together? 你认为这两种颜色和谐吗？||||These houses seem to blend into the surrounding scenery. 这些房屋似乎与周围的景色融为一体了。

name: condense
interpret: vt.使冷凝，浓缩；缩短；vi.浓缩；凝结
example: 单词 condense 的例句||||Condense this paragraph into a few sentences. 把这段文字简缩成几个句子。||||The essay is too wordy, you'd better condense it. 这篇文章太过冗长，要简缩一下。

name: agony
interpret: n.创痛，(极度的)痛苦；挣扎苦恼
example: 单词 agony 的例句||||She asked the nurse how long her agony must last. 她问护士，她的极端痛苦要延续多久。||||He lay in agony until the doctor arrived. 在医生来到之前，他一直非常痛苦地躺在那里。

name: banner
interpret: n.旗，旗帜，横幅
example: 单词 banner 的例句||||The new government came to power under the banner of fighting poverty. 新政府是在对贫穷开战的名义下上台的。||||A white banner was hanging out of the window. 一面白旗挂在窗子外面。

name: assemble
interpret: vt.集合，召集；装配；收集；vi.集合，聚集
example: 单词 assemble 的例句||||Assemble your papers and put them in the file. 把你的文件归拢放在这个文件夹内。||||The students assemble for class at 8 o'clock in the morning. 学生早上八时聚集在一起上课。

name: chap
interpret: n.男人；小伙子；家伙
example: 单词 chap 的例句||||This chap can't keep anything to himself. 这人肚里藏不住话。||||This chap is quite a smooth character. 这人很世故。

name: saddle
interpret: n.鞍，车座，山脊，拖具；vt.装以马鞍，使负担；vi.装马鞍
example: 单词 saddle 的例句||||The bicycle saddle is too high for this child. 这辆自行车车座对这孩子来说太高了。||||We got the order to saddle up just after dawn. 我们得到命令，天一亮就要上好马鞍。

name: portion
interpret: n.部分，份，命运；vt.将...分配，分配
example: 单词 portion 的例句||||You are paid your portion not later than a week. 不会晚于一周你就可以得到你那一部分报酬。||||Three thousand dollars is no more than a portion. 3000美元只不过是一部分。

name: hardware
interpret: n.重型武器；五金器具；硬件
example: 单词 hardware 的例句||||He bought a pot and other hardware at the store. 他从商店买了一个壶和其他金属制品。||||That family has carried on a hardware business for five generations. 那家已经经营五金生意五代了。

name: devise
interpret: vt.发明，策划，想出
example: 单词 devise 的例句||||We will devise a way of escaping from this prison. 我们要想个办法从这些监狱里逃出去。||||Let's devise how to finish the work. 咱们来计划一下如何完成这项工作。

name: corresponding
interpret: adj.符合的，一致的，相同的，相应的，相当的
example: 单词 corresponding 的例句||||We shall take the corresponding measures. 我们将采取相应措施。||||Finally, some corresponding advices are put forword . 最后提出了几个相应的建议。

name: exclusively
interpret: adv.排斥其他地；单独地；专有地
example: 单词 exclusively 的例句||||The star has a ski slope reserved exclusively for her. 这位明星有一个专门留给她的滑雪场地。||||The modern cult of beauty is not exclusively a function of wealth. 现代对美貌的狂热崇拜并不只是财富的作用。

name: anticipate
interpret: vt.预期(料)，期望；提前使用，先行动
example: 单词 anticipate 的例句||||I anticipate his arrival at four o'clock. 我期待他4点钟到达。||||He tried to anticipate all my needs. 他设法将我需要的东西预先准备好。

name: stale
interpret: adj.因陈旧而乏味的，过时的；没有新意的，陈腐的
example: 单词 stale 的例句||||The room smelled musty and stale. 这个房间闻起来有股发霉的陈味儿。||||The bread is too stale to eat. 面包变质不能吃了。

name: widen
interpret: vt.&vi.(使)扩大；(使)变宽
example: 单词 widen 的例句||||We should widen the opportunities for adequate medical care. 我们应当使得到适当医药救护的机会更为扩大。||||When are they going to widen the streets? 他们打算什么时候把这些街道加宽？

name: dissatisfy
interpret: vt.使不满，对…不满
example: 单词 dissatisfy 的例句||||It is our belief to further expand markets and dissatisfy with existing achievements. 进一步开拓市场，不满足于现有成绩是我们的信念。||||Envy may dissatisfy us with our lot. 嫉妒可使我们对自己的命运不满意。

name: particle
interpret: n.微粒，颗粒，粒子；小品词，语助词
example: 单词 particle 的例句||||There is not a particle of truth in what you said. 你所说的没有一句是实话。||||This particle has a very small mass. 这种粒子的质量很小。

name: moisture
interpret: n.水分；降雨量；水气；湿气
example: 单词 moisture 的例句||||This tree drank up more moisture than that one. 这棵树吸收的水分比那棵树多。||||The moisture in the air makes it humid today. 今天空气中水气大，天气很潮湿。

name: quicken
interpret: vt.加快；vi.加快
example: 单词 quicken 的例句||||A good debate can quicken one's mind. 有意义的辩论能使人的大脑更加敏锐。||||Your heart beat will quicken when you run up the stairs. 跑上楼梯时，心跳会加速。

name: furnace
interpret: n.熔炉，火炉；锅炉；反应堆
example: 单词 furnace 的例句||||A blast of hot air came from the furnace. 一股热风从火炉里吹出来。||||We had better fire up the furnace. 我们最好把炉子生起来。

name: interference
interpret: n.干涉，介入；阻碍，干扰
example: 单词 interference 的例句||||I couldn't hear the program because there was too much interference. 因干扰太大，我听不清节目。||||We oppose interference by any outside force. 我们反对任何外来势力插手干预。

name: catalog
interpret: n.目录(册)vt.将…编入目录，将…编目
example: 单词 catalog 的例句||||Can you catalog all these books? 你能给所有这些书编目录吗？||||You can look for the book in the library catalog. 你可以在图书馆的图书目录上查找这本书。

name: emphasize
interpret: vt.加强…的语气，强调，着重
example: 单词 emphasize 的例句||||I must emphasize the fact that she is only a little girl. 我必须强调这样一个事实，这就是她只不过是个小女孩。||||I must emphasize the fact that they are only children. 我必须强调这一事实，即他们只不过是孩子。

name: employer
interpret: n.雇用方，雇主
example: 单词 employer 的例句||||My employer deducted ten pounds from my wages this week. 我的雇主从我本周的工钱中扣除了十英镑。||||His monthly salary is paid into the bank by his employer. 他的月薪由雇主替他存入银行。

name: maintain
interpret: vt.支撑；赡养，抚养；维持，保有
example: 单词 maintain 的例句||||He has to maintain a large family on a small salary. 他不得不依靠很少的工资养活一大家人。||||We must do our best to maintain sales at their usual rate. 我们要尽力使销售额保持在平日的水平上。

name: urgent
interpret: adj.紧急的，急迫的，紧要的
example: 单词 urgent 的例句||||He asked to see the manager for something urgent. 他有急事求见经理。||||A part of this urgent task was allotted to us. 这项紧急任务的一部分分给了我们。

name: considerable
interpret: adj.相当多的，相当大的，相当重要的
example: 单词 considerable 的例句||||He saved the child at considerable risk to himself. 他冒着极大的生命危险救了那个孩子。||||The flood resulted in a considerable reduction in production. 这次水灾造成相当大的减产。

name: hell
interpret: n.地狱，阴间；用以咒骂或表示愤怒，不满
example: 单词 hell 的例句||||It's a hell of a hike from Sydney to Perth. 从悉尼到珀斯的徒步旅行简直苦死了。||||The boss really gave me hell today. 老板今天着实数落了我一通。

name: stain
interpret: n.污染，污点，著色；vt.沾染，染污，著色；vi.污染；被沾污；被染污
example: 单词 stain 的例句||||It will remain an indelible stain on his memory. 这将成为他记忆中一个不可磨灭的污点。||||Does this material stain easily? 这种料子容易染色吗？

name: behalf
interpret: n.利益，方面；支持，赞成，代表
example: 单词 behalf 的例句||||Ken is not present, so I shall accept the prize on his behalf. 肯没有出席，所以我将代表他领奖。||||They fixed on him to speak on their behalf. 他们已经确定他作为代表发言。

name: criticism
interpret: n.批评，批判，指责；评论，评论文章
example: 单词 criticism 的例句||||Some youth today do not allow any criticism at all. 现在有些年轻人根本指责不得。||||It is wrong to turn a deaf ear to other's criticism. 对别人的批评充耳不闻是错误的。

name: correspond
interpret: vi.(with)通信；(to,with)相符合；(to)相当
example: 单词 correspond 的例句||||The translation does not quite correspond to the original. 译文不切原意。||||The two sisters correspond every week. 这两姐妹每周通信。

name: complicated
interpret: adj.错综复杂的，麻烦的，结构复杂的
example: 单词 complicated 的例句||||The poem is so complicated that I cannot make out its meaning. 这首诗太复杂，我理解不了它的意思。||||This is the most complicated case I have ever handled. 这是我所处理过的最为复杂的案子。

name: cope
interpret: vi.(with)竞争，对抗；对付，妥善处理
example: 单词 cope 的例句||||He had a lot of work, but he was able to cope. 他的活虽多，但还能应付得来。||||They have to cope with a mountain of problems. 他们得应付成堆的问题。

name: conscience
interpret: n.良心，道德心
example: 单词 conscience 的例句||||Guilt had been eating into his conscience for some months. 几个月来内疚一直折磨着他的良心。||||He was pricked by his conscience. 他受到良心的谴责。

name: corporation
interpret: n.公司，企业，社团，团体
example: 单词 corporation 的例句||||The company has gone into partnership with Swiss Bank Corporation. 这家公司已经和瑞士银行公司建立合作关系。||||The inflation did the corporation up. 通货膨胀使这个公司破产了。

name: engineering
interpret: n.工程，工程学，管理，操纵
example: 单词 engineering 的例句||||The science of engineering began as soon as man learned to use tools. 人类一学会使用工具,工程科学就开始了。||||It was the first great engineering works in the world. 这是世界上第一家大型的工程工厂。

name: exception
interpret: n.例外,除外
example: 单词 exception 的例句||||Everyone should keep discipline and you are no exception. 每个人都应该遵守纪律,你也毫无例外。||||There's an exception to every rule. 每项规则均有例外。

name: extent
interpret: n.程度，范围，限度；广度，宽度，大小
example: 单词 extent 的例句||||The new race track is nearly six miles in extent. 这条新跑道将近六英里长。|||| What's the extent of the damage? 损坏的程度如何?

name: install
interpret: vt.安装，设置，安置；使就职，任命
example: 单词 install 的例句||||They will install a heating and lighting system in our house. 他们将在我们家装上供热供电系统。||||He's going to install an air-conditioner in the house. 他要在这屋子里装空调机。

name: insure
interpret: vt.保险，给…保险；保证使...得到；vi.确保；投保
example: 单词 insure 的例句||||Check your work to insure its accuracy. 检查一下你的工作，以保证它的准确性。||||An insurance company will insure your life. 保险公司可以给你保寿险。

name: procession
interpret: n.队伍，行列；v.列队行进
example: 单词 procession 的例句||||The students entered the school in procession. 学生们排队进入学校。||||The grand procession moves slowly out of the temple. 这支庄严的队伍缓缓地走出庙堂。

name: progressive
interpret: adj.先进的；前进的，渐进的；进行式的
example: 单词 progressive 的例句||||There is often a progressive loss of sight in old age. 上了年纪的人视力逐步减退。||||It's a progressive idea. 这是一种进步的思想。

name: prompt
interpret: adj.迅速的，敏捷的，立刻的；vt.激起，促进，推动；提示； vi.提示；n.提示；提示的内容；[商]付款期限
example: 单词 prompt 的例句||||His prompt action prevented the fire from spreading. 他的果断行动制止了火势的蔓延。||||Will you prompt for us at the performance? 演出时你给我们提示台词好吗？

name: reinforce
interpret: vt.增强，加强，增援
example: 单词 reinforce 的例句||||Your positive response will reinforce her actions. 你积极的回应会使她的行为更加坚定。||||We should reinforce the river embankment before the wet season. 雨季前夕，我们要加固河坝。

name: refine
interpret: vt.精炼，精制，提纯；使优美，使完善
example: 单词 refine 的例句||||We shall have to refine on our methods of advertising. 我们得进一步改进做广告的方法。||||Reading good books helps to refine one's speech. 阅读好的书籍有助于一个人的言谈文雅。

name: respectively
interpret: adv.各自地，独自地，个别地，分别地
example: 单词 respectively 的例句||||They finished first and second respectively. 他们分获一二名。||||In this machine which items make up the software and the hardware respectively? 在机器中，哪几项分别构成软件和硬件？

name: render
interpret: vt.给予；提供(帮助等)；使得；使成为
example: 单词 render 的例句||||Any assistance you can render him will be appreciated. 无论给予他何种帮助，他都会非常感激。||||We are going to render them economic assistance. 我们打算向他们提供经济援助。

name: restraint
interpret: n.克制，抑制，限制；约束措施，约束条件
example: 单词 restraint 的例句||||Do not take our restraint for a sign of weakness. 不要把我方的克制看做是软弱可欺。||||She told me without restraint all about her married life. 她毫无保留地告诉我她婚后的生活。

name: revolt
interpret: n.叛乱，反抗，反感；v.叛乱，起反感，使...恶心
example: 单词 revolt 的例句||||The revolt was suppressed in a matter of hours. 叛乱在几小时之内就平息下去了。||||Children always revolt against parental disciplines. 孩子们总是反抗父母的管束。

name: rouse
interpret: n.觉醒，奋起；v.唤醒，鼓舞，激动
example: 单词 rouse 的例句||||I usually rouse at six in the morning. 我通常在早晨6点钟醒来。||||You must rouse yourself to action. 你必须振作精神，起来行动。

name: screw
interpret: n.螺丝(钉)；vt.用螺钉固定；拧，拧紧
example: 单词 screw 的例句||||Let's screw the two pipes together end to end. 咱们把这两根管子接起来拧紧。||||Can you screw up this handle for me? 你能帮我把这个把手拧紧吗？

name: senate
interpret: n.参议院，上院
example: 单词 senate 的例句||||They feel deeply the honour of belonging to the Senate. 他们为作为参议院的成员而深感荣幸。||||His unsuccessful senate run was his last hurrah. 这次失败的参议员竞选是他最后的尝试。

name: slender
interpret: adj.苗条的，修长的；微薄的，微弱的
example: 单词 slender 的例句||||Everybody of us admired her slender figure. 我们人人都羡慕她的苗条身材。||||The girl was pretty and slender. 那姑娘长得美丽苗条。

name: solemn
interpret: adj.庄严的，肃穆的；严肃的
example: 单词 solemn 的例句||||He wore an extraordinarily solemn expression. 他脸上带着异常严肃的表情。|||| Do not let us be too solemn on the business. 关于这件事，我们还是不要太认真了吧。

name: soak
interpret: n.浸，湿透，喝醉；vt.使…湿透，浸泡在液体中，浸洗，吸入，使某人喝醉，向某人敲竹杠；vi.浸入液体，渗透，感化（某人），无节制地喝酒
example: 单词 soak 的例句||||Let the clothes soak for a few hours in soapy water. 让衣服在肥皂水中泡几小时。||||The oil will soak into the wood. 油会渗进木头里。

name: stake
interpret: n.木柱；赌注，奖金；v.打赌，下赌注
example: 单词 stake 的例句||||A wooden stake was driven firmly into the ground. 木桩被牢牢钉进土地里。||||He put up a stake to support the newly planted tree. 他竖了一根桩支撑新种的树。

name: sphere
interpret: adj.球体的；n.范围，领域；球，球体
example: 单词 sphere 的例句||||The Earth is not a perfect sphere. 地球并不是一个完全的球体。||||I feel I have been accepted as a leader in the international sphere. 我觉得人们已经承认我是国际范围内的一个领导人了。

name: standpoint
interpret: n.立场，观点
example: 单词 standpoint 的例句||||We should look at this from a historical standpoint. 我们应从历史的观点看待这事。||||From my standpoint, this thing is just ridiculous. 依我看来，这件事简直荒唐。

name: static
interpret: adj.静的；静态的
example: 单词 static 的例句||||Don't view things as static and isolated. 不要静止地孤立地看待事物。||||What is the difference between static and non-static variables? 静态变量和非静态变量有何不同？

name: spur
interpret: n.刺激(物)，激励；vt.激励，鞭策，促进
example: 单词 spur 的例句||||Even a small success would spur me on to greater effort. 哪怕是微小的成功也会促使我做出更大的努力。||||Such stories serve as a spur to children's imagination. 这类故事能激发儿童的想像力。

name: intimate
interpret: adj.亲密的，密切的；个人的，私人的；v.暗示、提示、宣布、通知
example: 单词 intimate 的例句||||The two of them were as intimate as sisters. 她们俩处得好像亲姐妹一样。||||I can't tell them my intimate thoughts. 我不能告诉他们我内心深处的想法。

name: inward
interpret: adv.向内，在内；adj.向内的，在内的，里面的
example: 单词 inward 的例句||||I understand your inward thoughts. 我了解你内心的思想。||||I sighed with inward relief. 我心里舒了一口气。

name: liquor
interpret: n.酒，烈性酒
example: 单词 liquor 的例句||||He keeps away from liquor and tobacco. 他不喝酒，不抽烟。||||The liquor is not strong enough. 这酒不够劲儿。

name: lens
interpret: n.透镜，镜片；镜头
example: 单词 lens 的例句||||The lens of a camera forms images. 照相机的镜头使图像形成。||||You should screen the lens of your camera from direct sunlight. 你应该保证相机的镜头不受到阳光的直接照射。

name: metric
interpret: adj.公制的，米制的，十进制的；n.度量标准，公制，米制，十进制
example: 单词 metric 的例句||||In the metric system,measurements are made in metres and liters. 在公制中，用米和升作计量单位。||||The metric system is fit to all of the world. 公制适用于全世界。

name: mode
interpret: n.方式，样式，模式，风格，时兴；[音乐]调式
example: 单词 mode 的例句||||Wearing jeans is out of mode at present. 现在穿牛仔裤过时了。||||His mode of doing business is offensive to me. 他干事情的方式叫我很不喜欢。

name: noticeable
interpret: adj.显而易见的；值得注意的
example: 单词 noticeable 的例句||||The effect of the medicine is not yet noticeable. 药的效果还不显著。||||There's been a noticeable improvement in his handwriting. 他的书法有了明显的进步。

name: ore
interpret: n.矿，矿石，矿砂
example: 单词 ore 的例句||||How many tons of ore can this machine crush in an hour? 这机器每小时可以破碎多少吨矿石？||||They refined gold out of the ore. 他们从矿石中提炼出黄金。

name: operational
interpret: adj.运转的，即可使用的；操作上的
example: 单词 operational 的例句||||The airport did not become operational until May. 机场到五月才可使用。||||The whole system will be fully operational by December 1995. 整个系统到1995年12月将可全面投入使用。

name: outset
interpret: n.开始，开端
example: 单词 outset 的例句||||He was not here at the outset of the experiment. 实验开始时他不在这里。||||The novel fascinates the reader from the outset. 这部小说一开头就把读者迷住了。

name: owing
interpret: adj.应付的，未付的
example: 单词 owing 的例句||||He paid what was owing. 他付清了所有应付的钱。||||We have several hundred pounds owing on our car. 我们的车还欠几百英镑未付清。

name: perceive
interpret: vt.感知，感觉，察觉；意识到，理解
example: 单词 perceive 的例句||||Did you perceive a red colour or a green one? 你看出来是红颜色还是绿颜色？||||I can't perceive any difference between these coins. 我看不出这些硬币的区别。

name: pinch
interpret: n.捏，撮，困苦，偷窃；vt.掐，使...困苦，偷窃
example: 单词 pinch 的例句||||She would pinch on food in order to spend on clothing. 她过去常把伙食费省下来买衣服。||||He put a pinch of salt on his food. 他在自己的食物上撒了一撮盐。

name: pit
interpret: n.深坑，核，矿井，陷阱，英国剧场正厅后排，凹陷疤痕；vt.使...有伤痕，去...的核，与...较量
example: 单词 pit 的例句||||A sheep fell into a pit, and I helped it out. 一只羊掉进坑里，我把它弄了出来。||||They dug a pit to bury the rubbish. 他们挖了一个坑把垃圾埋掉。

name: preceding
interpret: adj.在先的，在前的，前面的
example: 单词 preceding 的例句||||Each generation surpasses the preceding one. 一代更比一代强。||||This point has been dealt with in the preceding paragraph. 这一点在前面一段里已经交代过了。

name: precision
interpret: n.精确，准确；adj.精密的，确切的
example: 单词 precision 的例句||||This precision instrument is worth 10,000 yuan. 这台精密仪器价值一万元。||||All kinds of precision machine tools are made in this factory. 这家工厂制造各种精密机床。

name: preface
interpret: n.序文，绪言，前言；v.作序，写前言，以...开始
example: 单词 preface 的例句||||He has written a fine preface to the play. 他为这个剧本写了一篇精彩的序言。||||This book has a preface written by the author. 这本书有作者写的序言。

name: preliminary
interpret: n.初步行动，准备，初步措施；adj.初步的，开始的，预备的
example: 单词 preliminary 的例句||||They are taking preliminary steps in preparation for a possible war. 他们正在为应付一场可能的战争做初步的准备。||||A physical examination is a preliminary to joining the army. 体格检查是参军的初步。

name: prevail
interpret: vi.流(盛)行；获胜，占优势；劝说，诱使
example: 单词 prevail 的例句||||Can you prevail on him to go? 你能说服他走吗？||||I do hope he will prevail over the rebels. 我确实希望他能战胜叛乱者。

name: proportional
interpret: adj.成比例的，相称的；n.[数]比例项
example: 单词 proportional 的例句||||The increase of wages is proportional to the rise in prices. 工资的增长与物价的上涨是成比例的。||||The output should be proportional to the input. 输出应当与输入成比例。

name: breadth
interpret: n.宽度，幅度；幅面
example: 单词 breadth 的例句||||My wife is a woman of great breadth of mind. 我妻子是一位宽宏大量的女性。||||She was within a hair's breadth of winning. 她差一点就赢了。

name: brow
interpret: n.额，脑门子；眉毛，眉脊
example: 单词 brow 的例句||||The years have set their marks on his brow. 岁月在他的额上打下了印记。||||He wiped the sweat from his brow with his hands. 他用手擦去了额头上的汗。

name: collective
interpret: adj.集体的，共同的；n.团体，集体
example: 单词 collective 的例句||||I do feel deeply the strength of the collective. 我确实深深地感到了集体的力量。||||They hold together for collective security. 他们为了共同安全而团结在一起。

name: civilise
interpret: vt.使文明，使开化；教化；使文雅
example: 单词 civilise 的例句||||Their objective was to civilize the conquered nations. 他们的目标是教化那些被他们征服的国家。||||Schools will help to civilize the wild tribes there. 学校将会帮忙教化那里的野蛮部落。

name: coarse
interpret: adj.粗的，粗糙的；粗劣的；粗俗的
example: 单词 coarse 的例句||||His coarse habits have gradually fined away. 他的粗俗习惯渐渐变得文雅起来了。||||She never wears clothes made of coarse material. 她从来不穿粗布衣服。

name: commerce
interpret: n.商业，贸易；社交
example: 单词 commerce 的例句||||Commerce binds the two countries together. 贸易把这两国结合在一起。||||They drew up plans aimed at expanding commerce. 他们拟定了发展商业的计划。

name: coil
interpret: n.(一)卷，(一)圈；线圈；vt.卷，盘绕
example: 单词 coil 的例句||||He turned off the water and began to coil the hose. 他关掉水龙头，开始盘水管。||||We suspected that something was wrong with the coil. 我们疑心线圈有毛病。

name: comparative
interpret: adj.比较的；相比较而言的；相对的
example: 单词 comparative 的例句||||After many hardships, he now lives in comparative ease. 经过许多困难之后，他现在的生活相对舒适。||||Let's make a comparative study of the two languages. 让我们将这两种语言作一下比较研究。

name: comprehensive
interpret: adj.综合的，全面的，广泛的
example: 单词 comprehensive 的例句||||He was educated at the local comprehensive school. 他曾在地区的综合中学受教育。||||An objective test can be quite comprehensive. 客观测试相当全面。

name: compress
interpret: vt.压紧，压缩
example: 单词 compress 的例句||||Wood blocks may compress a great deal under pressure. 木块受压时可缩小很多。||||Can you compress your speech into five minutes? 你能不能把讲话压缩至5分钟？

name: comprise
interpret: vt.由…组成，包括，包含；组成，构成
example: 单词 comprise 的例句||||Twelve departments comprise this university. 12个系组成了这所大学。||||Women comprise 44% of hospital medical staff. 女性占医院医护人员的44%。

name: conversely
interpret: adv.相反地，另一面
example: 单词 conversely 的例句||||He placed the box conversely. 他把箱子放倒了。||||Conversely, the universe provides a laboratory. 反过来，宇宙空间也可作为实验室。

name: consent
interpret: n.同意，准许；vi.同意，准许
example: 单词 consent 的例句||||I agree with you, but yet I can't consent. 我同意你的意见，但是我不能答应。||||My father would not consent to my leaving school. 父亲不会答应我辍学。

name: crude
interpret: adj.粗鲁的，简陋的，天然的，未加工的；n.原油
example: 单词 crude 的例句||||The cottage wears a very crude appearance. 那幢农舍外观颇为简陋。||||Gasoline is distilled from crude oil. 汽油是从原油中提炼出来的。

name: defect
interpret: n.缺点，缺陷，毛病；vi.变节，叛变
example: 单词 defect 的例句||||I don't think the importance of this defect should be exaggerated. 我认为这一缺点的重要性不应加以夸大。||||The notice shall contain a description of the defect. 通知应包括对瑕疵的描述。

name: creep
interpret: vi.爬行，匍匐；蹑手蹑足地走，缓慢地行进
example: 单词 creep 的例句||||The baby is just learning to creep. 这个婴儿才学着爬。||||I would not creep along the coast. 我不愿在岸边爬行。

name: dental
interpret: adj.牙齿的，牙科的
example: 单词 dental 的例句||||You can get free dental treatment. 你可以得到免费的牙齿治疗。||||I had undergone a major dental operation. 我经受了一次牙科大手术。

name: detect
interpret: vt.察觉，发现；探测
example: 单词 detect 的例句||||I can detect signs of improvement in your thinking. 我可以察觉出你思考问题方面的进步。||||Their instruments can detect the slightest vibration. 他们的仪器能探测出极微弱的震动。

name: detection
interpret: n.察觉，发觉；侦查，探测
example: 单词 detection 的例句||||He tried to escape detection by disguising himself as an old man. 他企图乔装一老人逃过侦察者的耳目。||||The nose is a remarkable sensitive detection device. 嗅觉是一种非常灵敏的控测器官。

name: discharge
interpret: vt.释放；排出；vi.排出，放电；n.释放；排出
example: 单词 discharge 的例句||||The water pipes discharge freely. 水管畅流。||||Some factories in this locality still discharge waste water into the river. 这一地区有些工厂仍把废水排入河中。

name: desirable
interpret: adj.值得拥有的；可取的，有利的
example: 单词 desirable 的例句||||Some reasonable adjustments seem desirable. 某些合理的调整似乎是可取的。||||Prolonged negotiation was not desirable. 拖长了的谈判并不是大家所想要的。

name: dispute
interpret: n.争端，分歧；vt.争论，争吵，辩论，辩驳；vi.争论
example: 单词 dispute 的例句||||They are trying to find a way of settling the dispute. 他们正设法寻找解决争端的办法。||||The parties to the dispute should be more polite to each other. 争执双方应相互礼貌些。

name: ditch
interpret: n.沟，沟渠，渠道
example: 单词 ditch 的例句||||With the blind leading the blind, both shall fall into the ditch. 如果瞎子替瞎子带路的话，那么两方肯定会掉到沟里。||||The water in the ditch is not very clean. 沟里的水不是很干净。

name: doubtful
interpret: adj.难以预测的，未定的；怀疑的，可疑的
example: 单词 doubtful 的例句||||Let's try to clear up our difficult and doubtful points. 让我们设法把难处和疑点解决一下。||||Everyone was doubtful at first,but his statement in detail held up. 起初大家都怀疑，但他的详细叙述证明情况属实。

name: elsewhere
interpret: adv.在别处，到别处
example: 单词 elsewhere 的例句||||Our favourite restaurant was full so we had to go elsewhere. 我们最喜欢去的那家饭店客满了，因此不得不改去别处。||||I have half a mind to move elsewhere. 我有点想搬到别处去。

name: evidently
interpret: adv.明显地，显而易见
example: 单词 evidently 的例句||||They were evidently trying to frighten the public into obedience. 很明显，他们是要吓唬众人服从。||||He was evidently too tired to go any further. 他显然太疲劳，一步也走不动了。

name: exceedingly
interpret: adv.非常地，极度地
example: 单词 exceedingly 的例句||||He drove exceedingly fast. 他把车开得极快。||||They were exceedingly kind. 他们极为客气。

name: establishment
interpret: n.建立，确立，确定；企业，机构；当权人物
example: 单词 establishment 的例句||||With the establishment of major new markets, the economy is thriving. 随着重大新市场的建立，经济越来越兴旺。||||The establishment of the business took several years. 创办这个公司花了好几年时间。

name: exclude
interpret: vt.阻止...进入；把...排除在外
example: 单词 exclude 的例句||||The university had no right to exclude the student from the examination. 学校无权阻止这位学生参加考试。||||He tries hard to exclude those opposed to him from the committee. 他力图把反对他的人排斥在委员会之外。

name: external
interpret: adj.外部的，外面的，外来的；与外国有关的
example: 单词 external 的例句||||External causes become operative through internal causes. 外因通过内因而起作用。||||The external features of the building are very attractive. 这座建筑物的外观是很吸引人的。

name: favorable
interpret: adj.赞成的，赞成的；有利的，良好的，顺利的
example: 单词 favorable 的例句||||The book received a favorable review. 这本书赢得了好评。||||Each nation suppressed news that was not favorable to it. 每个国家都扣留对它不利的消息。

name: fearful
interpret: adj.惧怕的，担心的；可怕的，吓人的
example: 单词 fearful 的例句||||What a fearful waste of time! 简直太浪费时间了！||||They are fearful of another business depression. 他们担心会再次发生商业萧条。

name: fragment
interpret: n.碎片，碎块，断片；vt.&vi.(使)成碎片
example: 单词 fragment 的例句||||I overheard a fragment of their conversation. 我无意中听到他们谈话的片段。||||She dropped the cup on the floor and it broke into fragment. 她把杯子扔到了地上，杯子摔成了碎片。

name: fruitful
interpret: adj.有收获的，富有成效的
example: 单词 fruitful 的例句||||Our return with fruitful results to the city surprised them. 我们满载而归回到城里，这使他们很是惊奇。||||The work will be more fruitful under this plan. 按照这一方案，做这工作将更有成效。

name: fulfil
interpret: vt.履行(诺言、责任等)；完成；达到
example: 单词 fulfil 的例句||||The government should fulfil its pledge. 政府应该履行其诺言。||||This company should be able to fulfil our requirements. 这家公司应该能够满足我们的要求。

name: grip
interpret: vt.握紧，紧握；吸引；引起；vi. 抓住；n.紧握，控制
example: 单词 grip 的例句||||He keeps a firm grip on his children. 他对孩子们管得很严。||||The brake doesn't grip properly. 煞车不灵。

name: horsepower
interpret: n.马力(功率单位)
example: 单词 horsepower 的例句||||The engine puts out thirty horsepower. 这台发动机可产生30马力。||||Cars are normally rated in horsepower. 汽车通常用马力定级。

name: honorable
interpret: adj.光荣的，荣誉的；可敬的，高尚的
example: 单词 honorable 的例句||||I don't think I am worthy of such an honorable title. 这样的光荣称号，我可担当不起。||||These businessmen are both competitive and honorable. 这些商人既有竞争性又很诚实。

name: intensive
interpret: adj.加强的，密集的；精工细作的，集约的
example: 单词 intensive 的例句||||I'll make an intensive study of a subject. 我将集中学一门课程。||||There we received several weeks of intensive training. 在那里我们受了几星期的集中训练.

name: indifferent
interpret: adj.冷漠的，不关心的，不积极的；一般的
example: 单词 indifferent 的例句||||Her English is indifferent. 她的英文很一般。||||His manner was cold and indifferent. 他的态度既冷淡又无动于衷。

name: steamer
interpret: n.汽船，汽艇，轮船
example: 单词 steamer 的例句||||The steamer arrived in harbor last night. 汽船是昨晚进港的。||||When does your steamer sail? 你们的轮船什么时候启航？

name: summarize
interpret: vt.概括，概述，总结
example: 单词 summarize 的例句||||I will summarize what I have done. 我将概述我所做的事情。||||They need to find information quickly and be able to summarize it in clear language. 他们需要快速找到信息并能用清晰的语言概述。

name: successive
interpret: adj.接连的，连续的，相继的
example: 单词 successive 的例句||||He won three successive matches. 他连胜三场比赛。||||In memory, instructions are stored in a sequence of successive bytes. 在记忆体中，指令被存放在一个连续的字节序列中。

name: sympathetic
interpret: adj.有同情心的；表示好感或赞同的
example: 单词 sympathetic 的例句||||He is a sympathetic person. 他是一个有同情心的人。||||They were quite sympathetic to our proposals. 他们很赞同我们的建议。

name: sympathize
interpret: vi.(sympathise)(with)同情，怜悯；共鸣，同感
example: 单词 sympathize 的例句||||Don't always rely on others to understand and sympathize. 不要老是指望别人的理解和同情。||||I heartily sympathize with you. 我很同情你。

name: sway
interpret: n.摇摆，动摇，影响力，支配；vt.使摇摆，使动摇，影响或控制；vi.摇摆，支配，动摇
example: 单词 sway 的例句||||He felt the sway of the deck under his feet. 他感觉到脚下甲板的摇动。||||Branches sway gently in the wind. 树枝在风中微微摇荡。

name: textile
interpret: n.纺织品；adj.纺织的
example: 单词 textile 的例句||||Japan imports textile materials from Britain. 日本从英国进口纺织材料。||||He haunted textile mills, and learned all he could. 他常到纺织厂去，尽可能多学点东西。

name: tedious
interpret: adj.冗长的，沉闷的，乏味的
example: 单词 tedious 的例句||||The tedious job simply ate me up. 那单调乏味的工作简直把我烦死了。||||He was not used to the tedious of life in a small country town. 他不适应这种乡村小镇的单调生活。

name: thrust
interpret: vt.延伸，挺伸；猛推，猛塞，把...插入；vi.插入；用向某人刺去；猛然或用力推
example: 单词 thrust 的例句||||They thrust themselves into the house. 他们闯进了这间屋子。||||They thrust their way through the dense crowd. 他们挤过密集的人群。

name: treaty
interpret: n.条约；协议，协定
example: 单词 treaty 的例句||||Hungary has indicated its readiness to sign the treaty. 匈牙利已表示愿意签订该条约。||||I believe this treaty will pave the way to peace in Europe. 我相信这个条约将为欧洲的和平铺平道路。

name: trim
interpret: vt.修剪；装饰；n.修剪；adj.修长的；整齐的
example: 单词 trim 的例句||||We shall have to trim our spending down to fit our income. 我们只得削减开支以使收支平衡。||||You must trim your costs if you want to make bigger profits. 如果你想获得更大的利润，就必须削减开支。

name: triumph
interpret: n.胜利，成功；vi.获胜，成功；击败
example: 单词 triumph 的例句||||The victorious army returned in triumph. 获胜的部队凯旋而归。||||I could detect no triumph in his eye. 我不能在他的眼里看出胜利的喜悦。

name: voltage
interpret: n.电压
example: 单词 voltage 的例句||||That is how voltage is measured. 那就是如何测量电压的方法。||||The electric current varies directly with the voltage. 电流与电压成正比。

name: utility
interpret: n.公共设施，效用，公用程序，实用品，实用；adj.多效用的，多功能的
example: 单词 utility 的例句||||A fur coat has more utility in winter than in autumn. 毛皮外衣在冬天比在秋天更有用。||||Utility bills didn't amount to much. 公用事业的费用有限。

name: utmost
interpret: adj.极度的，最大的；n.极限，最大可能
example: 单词 utmost 的例句||||He walked to the utmost edge of the cliff. 他走到悬崖的最边缘的地方。||||Each man is free to exercise his special talents to the utmost. 每个人都可以尽力发挥他的专长。

name: wholly
interpret: adv.完全地，全部地
example: 单词 wholly 的例句||||I wholly agree with you. 我完全同意你。||||His story is wholly fictitious. 他的故事全是编造的。

name: weld
interpret: vt.焊接，锻接；vi. 焊牢；n.焊接，焊缝
example: 单词 weld 的例句||||Where did you learn to weld? 你在哪儿学会的焊接技术？||||It takes speed and skill to weld steel at this heat. 在这样的温度下焊钢需要速度和技术。

name: wit
interpret: n.智力，才智，智能
example: 单词 wit 的例句||||Our teacher is full of wit when he has a lesson. 我们的老师只要讲课就很风趣。||||He is a man of many words but of little wit. 他爱说话，但头脑简单。

name: withstand
interpret: vt.经受，承受，抵住
example: 单词 withstand 的例句||||The walls can withstand high winds. 这些墙能顶得住强风。||||This dress material will withstand repeated washings. 这种衣料能经得住反复洗涤。

name: lighten
interpret: vt./vi.减轻，变轻；照亮，变亮
example: 单词 lighten 的例句||||The sky began to lighten after the storm. 暴风雨后天空开始放晴。||||They decided to lighten taxes. 他们决定减轻税收。
